review:
We ordered through Uber eats this past Thursday night. Since they have Art in Square going on didn‚Äôt want to deal with parking! So excited because we usually go to the restaurant until a friend said she orders out from them. We where so disappointed when we couldn‚Äôt wait to eat the carbonara, until the first bite???? It was like have salt for dinner soooo extremely salty!! My husband is Italian and he couldn‚Äôt even eat any but the first salty bite!!! We plan on taking it back after the busy weekend is over! If it was from Olive Garden we would not but this is from an authentic Italian restaurant??? As the price tag indicates! 

Sincerely,
Salty Disappointed
title: The most salty carbonara

review: I have boarded my dog with Shawnee Kennels for 6 years since I rescued her. She has received the love, attention and care there that I give her at home. It‚Äôs the only place I will board Lily. She can hardly wait to get out of the car to go in. You can tell the mark of an excellent boarding spot when you dog gets so excited the moment you turn in. I highly recommend Shawnee Kennels to anyone looking for a score loving place to board your fur baby!
title: Shawnee Kennels Milford, DE

review: My husband and I have been going to this location for years and experienced the best service , food came out quickly and on time. Daryl was on the floor helping his team and making sure he was in the trenches taking care of customers . The service and food quality has definitely improved. Please make sure he gets acknowledged !! From Cindy and Shawn- glad to see the improvement.
title: Darryl is awesome Wilson Mills

review:
This store has the worst customer service i have ever seen in my life
Order $300 worth of balloons for an event. Time we wanted them is on Sunday. They said between 1pm to 5pm they would be deliver
At 5:30 i called to see whats why they were not here yet and they said they didn't get them and they wont be able to deliver them. Spoke to manager who said her name was Dalila and she told me that it just wont happens and i can come and get my refund. She also said have a good day and hung up. 
I called again again and she couldn't give me store managers number and said her store manager is busy!!
This will be my last time i ever bought anything from this store ever and not only do i get big orders for my store also i get for my personal party's
WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER.
title: Customer service

review: If I could give this place zero stars I would. This was the worst food I have ever eaten in my whole entire life! The sauce that they use on the pasta and everything is absolutely disgusting. I wouldn‚Äôt even feed it to my dog. And the osso bucco was the worst! It was just one large piece of fat covered in disgusting sauce. The waitress was very rude and the chef wouldn‚Äôt take back the osso bucco claiming it was good when he never even tasted it because if he did taste it he would‚Äôve threw up. They wouldn‚Äôt even take anything off the bill or let us order anything else. Besides that the place is very old and smells like mold and mildew inside so if you ever dare go to this place God bless you!
title: Casa Basso is the worst!

review: I am very disappointed with the restaurant right now . My big family always order from them for trays of food whenever we have birthday celebration. This is the third time I order a tray of beef kaldereta . And I always get charged $70 . Today they charged me $75 plus tax that amounts to $82. I asked the lady in the counter why when I ordered over the phone the day before I was told $70. She said she made a mistake üôÑ so I have to pay for your mistake??? This is the third time my family ordered the same tray of dish. It‚Äôs a matter of principle üò°Holler , owner of Tito Rad‚Äôs
title: Charging you the wrong price when you pick up your food

review:
Yelp is ridiculous. They hide good reviews but let bad reviews claim the stage. Also just know, once you list your business with them, they now own the listing and you can‚Äôt remove your business from their site even if you choose to.
Then when you submit a review for false claims, they refuse to remove the review without requiring the person who left it, to submit evidence of what they‚Äôre claiming. I literally had someone claim i assaulted them with a deadly weapon at my BUSINESS. LIES. Yelp left it. But when I get good, authentic reviews from actual clients, they hide it. Total bull. Yelp Is a joke. List with Google instead.
title: Yelp is a ridiculous review platform

review:
All too often I see one sided reviews of locations without the ability of seeing the other side of the argument .

So many one star reviews of restaurants or retail stores because a manager or server is rude or did something , but without the ability to hear why .  

Today was looking at a sushi restaurant and saw two one star reviews and both had similar descriptions of servers being rude in the opening sentence , but as I read the rest of the description it was evident that they were arriving right before closing , were drunk , with a large party of (one with drunk under age kids who would t all sit down at once ) .

I wanted to respond on behalf of a restaurant that I‚Äôve never been to before that if you show up to a place drunk and the whole party doesn‚Äôt sit at once and is sandy ,  do t expect good service because your actions are rude .
title: Lots of spam and vendetta reviewers

review: I ordered on the food, the girl was very nice and helpful to explain the menu for me to order the correct items(I once called in and a fella wasn‚Äôt so nice so I ended up not ordering) neways I gave it another try as I wanted to try the dumplings which I actually call Bao as that‚Äôs how they‚Äôre called at the Japanese place in Boston I first had them at Bao Nation. They were delish! I‚Äôll def give the place more chances as long as the service stays consistent.
title: Good so far

review:
3 times I have seemingly completed a food order for take out or delivery, only to have the food order not be processed by vendor. I have no idea why this happens. There is no obvious means to communicate with customer support. Ended up wasting a lot time. I guess customers have to ensure the order was placed by email and, if not, try again.

Also, app badgers me for reviews but doesn‚Äôt accept them based on length. A good review need not be long enough to be informative and accurate. There is a certain degree of disrespect for ‚Äòthe community‚Äô by requesting members‚Äô contributions only to reject those contributions.
title: Food orders not processed

review:
I signed up for a membership agreement and 30 days later called to cancel. I was told it would be cancelled. Today I checked and my account was debited AGAIN!  I called and the representative asked if I had received email with termination authorization. Told her I was not told about this and asked her to verify my email. She said ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt have your email on file‚Äù.  How could they have sent me termination form with no email and not call me to acquire it to send termination authorization?  
Nothing against my eyelash person- she was fine- felt service a bit rushed.  But receptionist had terrible attitude both times I visited Park Rd location. Blakeney much nicer ‚Äúvibe‚Äù by the people.
title: Amazing Lash caution

review: Casey at Mountain Park was wonderful! I should say is wonderful! We have a kitty who is 18 1/2 years old, we lost his twin sister in November, and he has a sensitive stomach and needs senior food. Senior food has been very difficult to find. Casey hold up the food we were buying and found comparable foods which they carry. Our kidding Nick loves the food and has not been throwing up. I loved the customer service and the caring Casey showed to us and our kitty.
title: Casey at Mudbay Mtn. Park

review: YELP!!!! That‚Äôs  where you get your truth about places that you are seeking on going to have fun, good times, and spend money or  whatever it is you‚Äôre doing,  and I guess you can go to Google or maps, but I like Yelp!  They‚Äôre pretty accurate with position of spots and places that you like to go, also let you know what‚Äôs around there with similar words and/or related to what your into, so hands-down Yelp It Baby!
title: Yelp is a GO TO!!!

review:
Isabel is a family restaurant open for Breakfast, Lunch, & Dinner. Just adjacent to Cabo Villas now Corazon Cabo. The food is outstanding. I had the Sea Bass with garlic, Parmesan cheese and olive oil. We have eaten there for Breakfast, Lunch, & two dinners. All the food was very good & we took my son & his family. The owners are on site. The service is excellent with always courteous treatment with the customers. Sometimes they have an alto saxophonist on site for live music.

This is the best food for a reasonable price.
title: The best kept secret in Cabo!

review:
Walking down green leaf and bumped in to this spot.  Breakfast/Brunch Menu is amazing! I ordered something simple the avocado toast with egg and bacon it was really good! Loaded with avocado and generous with the bacon. Had the cafe de la Hoya and a Paloma (because it‚Äôs 5 o‚Äôclock somewhere). The vibe was nice with music and just a really nice place. Service was on point!
I looked at their lunch and dinner Menu and I will definitely be back! I‚Äôm a foodie so I wouldn‚Äôt recommend if it wasn‚Äôt amazing!! I highly recommend!!
title: Hidden gem!

review: So I bought a Groupon.  Called to make an appointment for Saturday, because like I have a job from 9-5pm. Normal working American. The lady that answered the phone is the dudes person.  Told me that Groupon customer don‚Äôt get Saturdays.  She screamed at me when I told her that is poor customer service. If you don‚Äôt want Groupon customer than don‚Äôt market in Groupon.  Is not like they are doing the work for free. Nobody forced them to market their poor customer service in Groupon.  Save your money and go to another tint company.  I‚Äôm sure you can get better customer service elsewhere. Imagine what they would have done to my car?  üòè glad I saved this headache.
title: Good luck if you buy a Groupon

review:
This app is very helpful with looking for places to eat, the pictures, the menu, the direction. Then you also got other information and services like grocery, hotel, apartments, reviews that are also helpful. 

For a couple who just newly moved to vegas and wanting to know the place more and not like a tourist, but the local hidden spots and all the hidden gems of Vegas. Exploring is really good on Yelp. 

Kudos to Yelp, the team and the Creator.
title: Must Have App

review: In addition to getting a sense of a business or restaurant before going, they often offer really great deals which I then use to generously tip person doing the work.  Loving yelp, but still check other apps for discounts too.  The fact that less-than-positive reviews are shown really helps. And when thought thoughtful owners respond, it gives an even more human experience.
title: Very helpful reviews

review: First off I want to say that Deanna was the most polite and helpful person I have ever dealt with in the mortgage industry!! Her knowledge and quick response were unbeatable . She explained every step and kept me posted on what was to be expected next. This was the most pleasant experience I have ever had with a mortgage company and I would highly recommended! I will be absolutely using Deanna for my next adventure . Thanks for a smooth refinance üòä
title: Deanna is the best !!!

review:
It‚Äôs amazing how this app gets worse with every update. It‚Äôs harder to get to simple things like the menu or the restaurants number (they add a ton of useless info and ads). 

And now when you call a restaurant, you get a grub hub agent who knows nothing about the restaurant. And they claim the restaurant needs your full name, phone number and email address just to place a pick order. And their wait times are insane. 

I called one of my favorite restaurants and got one of these agents. I had to give all that personal info, and was told it would be a 45 min wait (for 1 burrito). I googled the restaurants number and got straight through and placed my order with just a first name, and a 5 min wait. 

Why does yelp make it so hard. Just look up your info on another site. Yelp has become such a waste of time. Phoning in orders was the last thing they were good for (reviews are worthless as many companies just pay for them). 

Way to ruin your app again, yelp.
title: Worse every update

Thank you Yelp! You‚Äôre a great help
title: Yelp can you open up to hotels? Literally THE GOAT for finding information

review: Here is my review for my first visit to the Lake House on Pistakee. For the atmosphere I‚Äôll give it a five stars. For the food I‚Äôll give it a five stars. For the waiter his attitude and his personality I gave it a five star. It was a great visit we had a good time. The only thing that I would recommend is to have another waiter or waitress there to speed up the orders and the serving of the food. I‚Äôll still give it all five stars. review: They seem to not care at all about their clients. I have been waiting 1 month to get a call to inform that my glasses were ready while I had been told it would take 2 weeks. Decided to call after 3 and they told that ¬´ somehow my order was cancelled ¬ª. They then rushed the glasses order in their lab so I could have them after another week and I was told that some kind of compensation would be offered. I picked my glasses up and they were just handed to me quickly quite rudely and without fitting process and of course no mention of any compensations. If this ¬´ America‚Äôs best ¬ª, America does not have much to offer in term of eye care....
title: Terrible costumer service

review: I ordered a Ford swivel chair- the delivery folks were polite and very professional. The staff in the store had an inflated superiority attitude of they could take or leave my business. I asked a salesperson when the next furniture sale would be and she replied rudely ‚ÄúRoom and Board never has sales, we don‚Äôt need sales, our furniture sells itself.‚Äù I did purchase the over priced chair as the size was perfect and I wanted a swivel, but the service was very unprofessional. I‚Äôm using the swivel as an accent chair- the upholstery would definitely not hold up to everyday use. No arm covers come with the chair which is unfortunate as the arm fabric will wear out if used too often. Hopefully I can order a yard of the upholstery fabric to have covers made.
title: Room and Board

review:
My 2 yr old grandson wanted me to bring him a rainbow balloon, but because of Covid I haven‚Äôt been able to see him.   
I decided to have some balloons delivered and found The Sugar Snap store. 
It was 15 minutes before closing on New Years Eve!  
Deb at Sugar Snap worked with me while taking care of other customers.   She helped me pick balloons and didn‚Äôt rush me at all.  She was fantastic.   The balloons were delivered right on time snd my grandson was ecstatic!   I would recommend this shop to anyone!
title: The Sugar Snap, Maynard ma

review:
Well,

I saw some bad reviews and thought of giving mine as I felt it unfair.  In Houston, the biggest stores are in Hilcroft area. If you are looking for quality unexpired Indian items in Sugarland this is the best place.  When they started I thought it is going to be pricey, but they are not. They even crack the coconut right there so that you can return it if it is bad. People work there are some nice and new not really friendly. Who cares about that part in an Indian store?
title: Nice place for all Indian groceries

review:
Since reviews can effect someone‚Äôs livelihood when a person leaves a review there should be specific proof they work with, ate at, etc. The business. What I have seen is mostly people go to Yelp to complain about something. This could be a detriment to a business. And it could be another business trying to cancel them out. 

If I have a negative experience, I always go to the manager first then give them an opportunity. Yes people like to read reviews. However, most people on do reviews when they are mad about something.
title: Reviews should be more specific.

review: Ivan was the most unprofessional Person I‚Äôve ever met. I asked him when he would be available to clean my carpet and he said Friday Saturday or Sunday on a three day weekend. I said Friday would be fine he called me back and moved it to Saturday at 10. I spent two days prepping my house moving furniture etc. Saturday at 10 he never showed up. I called him he told me he forgot and he was in Waikiki and he would be here at 11. He showed up at 11:30 having lived in this house for 25 years I‚Äôve already given him the measurements of every room. Not only did he jack the price up he wanted me to pay in cash. I asked him if you really wanted this job? And he said not really and left. Don‚Äôt ever hire this guy!
title: Make a clean Hawaii carpet cleaner

review: Taking your car in for repairs is seldom a positive experience but at James Auto Center, it‚Äôs as good as it can be. Expert repairs and explanations are the norm. My old Saab still purrs, thanks to James, and I wouldn‚Äôt trust my husband‚Äôs classic Corvette to anyone else here. Five star convenience too: you can reserve a loaner while your car is in the shop! Drop off your car for service, get a loaner and be on your way. No need to try to get a ride back to work. Count me a loyal customer.
title: Most reliable car repair in Bay County

review: Dr. Hilleman is one of a kind!  He has the heart of a joyful & humble servant and wants to take care of his clientele.  His clinic seemed like one big happy family as clients sat in the waiting area joyfully talking to one another as they waited for their turns. Today was my first time there and it seemed that he has alot of faithful clients, and I can see why! He takes care of his clients and his prices are very reasonable.  My back feels so much better after just one visit!  I will definitely be back.  üòäüëçüèº
title: Great visit!!

On the user side of things, when I search for delivery on yelp I‚Äôm searching for what restaurants deliver and what food they have, I don‚Äôt immediately know that I want to deliver from them.

We had hair in our food, cold plates delivered to our table, items repeatedly requested without response, and when we asked to talk to the Manager at the end of our visit, she offered nothing but excuses and defensive arguments for making our experience better. We will not be returning to this ABE and we hope they pay better attention to their other customers so they can stay in business.  We‚Äôll go to the Woodlands location where they go above and beyond to insure an outstanding experience.

review:
The mobile site for yelp has extremely limited functionality because they want essentially are trying to force you to download the app. I think its so dumb, 
not to mention their app takes up a considerable amount of storage space which my phone did not have. So I said screw yelp and went and used their competitors which actually have a functional mobile site that doesn‚Äôt force you to download an app. And lastly, really take any of these reviews with a huge grain of salt. I work as a line cook at a restaurant they reviewed two months ago and several of the hired yelp reviewers wanted money in exchange for a good review. It‚Äôs honestly just a big old scam!
title: Make a better mobile site...

review:
My husband and I decided to pizza for dinner so I breezed thru some local apps for some suggestions.
We read the reviews, saw the pictures and we were hooked.
So, I call in our order and we were told it would be ready in about 15 minutes. Perfect timing.... the pizza was ready as soon as my husband stepped inside their door.  Couldn‚Äôt wait to dig in. My first reaction .... what the heck. The crust was NOT what we saw in the pictures.... there was no tomato sauce, could barely find the thinly sliced mushrooms and the sausage was crumbled up real fine almost like bread crumbs.
We ordered extra cheese... paper thin slices and it tasted awful.... it was the absolute WORST pizza I‚Äôve ever eaten.
Wish I could add pictures... don‚Äôt see where I can
title: Urban Crust in Plano

review: Who doesn‚Äôt buy things or go places anymore with looking up reviews. Yelp is a great place to find reviews.  I weed through reviews because not all reviews are sensible, everyone has a different level of what they like or think is good or bad, but generally after reading a bunch of reviews you get the general idea about a product or a place. Some people simply are complainers and are impossible to please, you can normally sense that in their review.
title: The new Norm

review:
Ah, a review of a review site. Let‚Äôs review without further ado. Only a fool wouldn‚Äôt find yelp helpful when traveling to outlying destinations. I even like using it close to home, as I forget about some of my favorites. 
I‚Äôd ask a new reviewer to rate and write reviews kindly. I‚Äôve been to some great places with some flaws. It‚Äôs fun to write a scathing review, especially if I‚Äôve been slighted but Yelp is powerful and kindness wins the day. Honesty and helpfulness for the next guy/gal will bring untold riches! 
Be well my fellow travelers.
title: Yelp

review: It is completely annoying and unacceptable to click ‚Äúmore‚Äù in a yelp browser review and be forced to load the app solely to read a review- or just not see the rest of the review. I prefer not to have the yelp app, which means I can‚Äôt read the reviews even though I have a yelp registration online. I‚Äôm not sure what the app gives yelp that the browser doesn't, but obviously there‚Äôs money in it for yelp in the app that there‚Äôs not on a browser. Seems like improper business tactics or at least tacky behavior. So I‚Äôm reviewing the app negatively because I don‚Äôt know how to review yelp negatively otherwise. I certainly can‚Äôt give yelp a negative review on yelp
title: Dislike inability to read reviews except in app

review:
The atmosphere is pleasant.  The service from the hostess to the server was excellent. Parking is always an issue at This location. The cocktails (a rye Manhattan and a Tanquery Martini)
were good but not great and pricey compared to other restaurants we frequent. The upsides:  while a bit pricey, the goat cheese stuffed peppers were divine and I would get them again. We had the Sunday gravy and the gnocchi. Both were superb and the portions were very generous. The only slight downside was my pasta was a bit undercooked. 
We will definitely return to try the other offerings. Very satisfied.
title: Nice place

review: I brought my three year old daughter to this office after being referred by a few neighbors. I suspected she might have a cavity so I wanted to make sure I brought her to a pediatric dentist who could do everything all under one roof. My daughter has been to the dentist before and sat still for her cleaning. I was shocked when they referred me to another pediatric dentist to have the cavity filled. They clearly didn‚Äôt want to do any actual dental work and referred us to an awful office in Town Lake. When I got there they had none of our records and were completely unorganized. Long story short, I left before they even looked at her. A waste of time and three hours invested over a little cavity. Don‚Äôt bother!!
title: Waste of time

review:
Jennifer and I decided to switch it up a bit and try a new place. We sure are glad we did. The atmosphere was perfect, the staff went out of their way to make sure we were catered to, and the food had good sized portions and was fantastic!  The owner, Garth came by and checked on us a few times and was the nicest man you could meet and one hell of a classy guy! Prime Rib is a classy place that we can‚Äôt say enough about.   Put this place on your list of places to go.

 ~Larry and Jennifer Marino
title: The prime rib

review: Our ‚Äò90s cooktop needed a replacement part, but the manufacturer no longer makes the part.  So we thought we‚Äôd have to buy a new cooktop. But Aaron came out today and replaced our broken switch, so now I have a fully functioning cooktop again.  He was great at explaining the repair and options.  Sure beats getting a new cooktop which would have required either rewiring the outlet to increase amps or downsizing and having a make-shift countertop.  Happy customer.
title: Repaired Old Cooktop - Avoided Replacement

review:
My daughter told me about this place last year when she came home with a bag of all these name brand clothes for an excellent price. I had it planned to go check it out myself  for back to school shopping for my son and hit the jackpot! So much to choose from and I scored. Everyone was helpful, friendly, just great overall customer service!!! I will return again for sure with no doubt. Add them on IG and FB to get weekly hours as they may change.

title: Great Deals!!!

review:
The food was amazing! The staff was great. Manager Tony Shaw was great after hearing we were on our way home to meet our son coming home from the Air Force he thanked my husband for his service and sent us home a dinner for our son as well. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone that is in Kentucky or just passing through. We have told all our friends what a great experience we had and how wonderful the food was. I would recommend you try the Butter Pie and Carrot Cake. 
Todd & Marika Wynn
title: Great Experience

review: We took out a 3-year loan and about to pay off our daughter‚Äôs vehicle. Not a one complaint about this company. We were hassled about having a 5th vehicle in the household (we have 3 kids). Something about a federal security act and financing yet another vehicle despite great credit. We took our chance on the dealership and financing company. Boy, are we happy with the service and the purchase. No hassle at all and would do business any time again.
title: Great company to work with

review:
My family has been going to Indian Springs for decades. The staff unfortunately haven‚Äôt been trained properly. Took the family up to stay the night and swim in the pool. We get there after they quoted a price for us to stay in one room double bed for a total of 5(2 adults 3 kids).
‚ÄúTHEN IT CHANGED‚Äù you have to pay for two rooms and the adults needs to stay in the inn and my kids to stay across the street!!! The cost was almost double. We paid to swim since we drove all the way up there. I decided to see if there was anything else they could do! ‚ÄúNo‚Äù you can stay at the hotel done the road??? Terrible business. Horrible manager!!! Be aware if you plan a overnight!
title: Horrible Customer Service

review: This great group of people went above and beyond, even staying late, to help us say goodbye to our precious dog. We had never been there before.  They had never made one dollar on us in the past and with the passing of our dog there was not certainty of additional visits from us. But we are DEFINITELY going back there when our hearts heal and we rescue another sweet dog. Our Lucy was treated so well there, and we appreciated their compassion more than words can say. Thank you!!!

review: Great service, food tastes and presentation were beyond pleasing! I would definitely return. Laura was an informed server who gave wonderful and tasty ideas. Margaritas were superb! The pineapple frozen margarita was tasty. The Slopper was delicious if you like a Mexican chili burger. The tamales were more than filing with the option of a verde or red sauce and in three heats! Their Homemade guacamole ü•ëwas the best along with endless light chips! I noticed they cleaned under and on top of tables immediately after each guest left. Very tidy!very reasonably priced! Hol√† Cocto Flor!
title: Cactus Flower smells sweet

review:
We are visiting from the San Francisco Bay Area, and we were attracted to the description of Wolf Run Restaurant at 3360 Wolf Run in Fairbanks.

We both enjoy Mediterranean and Middle Eastern food and this is some of the best we have ever tasted.  We started with the generous and delicious mezze plate with excellent hummus studded with whole chick peas and garnished with olives and tiny tasty tomatoes, and served with excellent warmed pita bread.  

For the next course we shared a combination of lamb, beef, fantastic chicken and the best kofta I have ever eaten.  This was served with perfectly roasted tiny red potatoes.  

We were really happy with this dinner and wondered how we could eat desert, but on the tempting desert menu we saw Bourbon and chocolate enhanced southern pecan pie.  It was delicious!
Congratulations to the chef, and the service was attentive and friendly as well.  We will go back.
title: A little hard to find but worth the search

review: Lately, Yelp hasn‚Äôt been very helpful. I‚Äôm in Lima Peru this weekend. I‚Äôd like to write some reviews of the places I‚Äôve dined at. However, Yelp doesn‚Äôt recognize the names of the places I‚Äôm entering. They also cannot find any restaurants near me. I‚Äôve deleted the app and reloaded it. I‚Äôve checked the yes box to find my location when using the app. I‚Äôm about to delete it for good and try something new. This is very frustrating.

It is meaningless to say the rest, I would gladly comeback and will try the rest of the menu one visit at the time.

review: I love the way Ms. Lara teaches my kids.  They are both in group class and they enjoy their lessons so much, can‚Äôt wait to go to the next class. During 90 min class they learn about art glossary and art history, and then apply it by painting on canvas. The school has a monthly theme and syllabus, so that the kids know what they are doing. I have never believed that my kids can create real artworks before I brought them to Pacific Art School. Highly recommend this school and Ms. Lara
title: Art classes at Pacific Art School

review:
I was in town a few days for business. Decided to take a look on yelp for what was available in my area. Found Hummus which was about a 3/4 mile walk from my hotel. Wanted to get some exercise plus eat a healthy dinner so I charted my path. 

Had a wonderful dinner with lots of vegetables and greens. I highly recommend Hummus to those who care about the quality of what they eat. Reasonable pricing too! I will definitely come back when I‚Äôm here next time.
title: Chance dinner in Henderson

review: The majority of reviews on yelp are either a 5* or a 1*. You are only allowed to leave a comment about liking the persons review, that means when reviews seem to be a bit shady or like a psycho path just decided to let this business have it because something didn't go the customers way, there is no way to downvote or leave something stating you don't agree or that the review is misleading. I literally use this app to try to help companies that get unfair reviews, rarely will i post a negative review. Yelp is a scam, i hope the creators feel good about bringing so much negativity into the world. Congratulations, that is what you have done with your life, made this world just a little bit worse...
title: Bad Reviews Only

review: Nothing beats a true experience and an evaluation you can make using your own genuine judgement.  These stars are used to make a judgment call to try something before they read someone‚Äôs lengthy rant.  If something looks interesting when walking by, try it out and make your own assessment if you appreciate what someone is providing.  No 2 people are the same.  Likes and dislikes are preference.  I understand why it is here and it is your right to have a voice, but the people who are passionate about what they do are effected by these review behind the scenes.  Nobody creates something with ill intent but most of these reviews are used to discourage others to try something new.
title: Understand but still dislike

review:
We recently had numerous jobs done around our home working with Construction Genetics. I must say they did outstanding work. They were punctual and exhibited a terrific work ethic. Working in the construction industry myself for well over 30 years I know what to expect. Eric and Edgar worked with us and stayed on schedule. The site was keep orderly and cleaned up  after each day. I would definitely use them again and would not hesitate to recommend them. 
Charles
title: Great work!

review:
Edit 2018: STILL THE BEST.  The interface has not gone any major uncomfortable overhauls, just perfect little tweaks over time that truly improve the experience. I like that the bookmarks can be sorted into lists both private and public. 

- - - - 
This is one of my favorite apps. Great interface, lightweight, easy to navigate, and reliable (I can't recall it ever crashing). Yelp itself is a fantastic site and this app supports it perfectly.  Thank you Yelp!
title: Still Love it. This is what an app should be

review:
A small buffet type setting and menu as well. The  waitresses Sandy Katie Melanie are so very pleasant. And the chefs which are married to the waitresses are AWSOME. very good people food is excellent. The guy at the register is Bao Sui he‚Äôs one of three owners and is always glad to take your money. Come on try it out I‚Äôm sure you will be back for more. 
  Open 11:00 am. To. 10:00 pm Monday thru Sunday iced tea coke sprite lemonade Dr Pepper. Fanta Orange fruit punch or BYOB just make sure you leave with it.    Hope to see you soon. Thanks for your time.

review:
This is one of the best Dental offices I have been to in over 50 years. The staff was caring, very informative, helpful, and genuinely nice. Their rates for service were comparable or lower to the rates of other offices in the area. I‚Äôve already recommended other family/friends to that office. 
I just saw a previous review about them having snacks there for everyone. Why not eat the snacks first then get your teeth cleaned or if you aren‚Äôt the patient, enjoy the snacks while you are waiting? (Some people always have to find the negative in acts of kindness. Smh)

review:
Truly one of the best pizzas I‚Äôve ever eaten.   Besides the whole pizza the owner Dottie was sweet enough to make a single slice of the white pizza.  OMG.  the best!  It had fresh spinach, garlic, slices of fresh tomato and my favorite of all ricotta cheese.  I‚Äôll be back and will be telling everyone about how good these pizzas are.  It‚Äôs the thin crust and friendly service that top it all off.  I know there‚Äôs so many to choose from but don‚Äôt give up the chance to try these pizzas, I honestly don‚Äôt think you‚Äôll be disappointed.  
  Patty
title: Pavarotti‚Äôs

review: I left a credit card behind at Docs pad on the 13 th June . it took five phone calls to the staff all offering to get the manager to send the card back via ordinary post to get the card back Not reply from him for three weeks then finally he got around to it. Gary, thanks but frankly I won‚Äôt be back  when you get too big to pay attention to your customers you should choose another profession . If you read this,  let me know. You sure as hell  have my phone number and address as I left it four times with your staff. Will be happy to send you the postage but that‚Äôs about as far as I‚Äôm inclined to go at this point.

review:
I went there yesterday and was greeted by Jay who was so nice and helpful. He checked me in got my sauna ready with a long and short towel and set up the temp for me for detoxification . He was very thorough in his service. Thanks Jay!
Then I had a 1.5 hour massage with Tiffany! Wow! She has magical hands! She let me know where all my knots were and worked magic on them. She was careful to tuck sheets in on side and didn‚Äôt fan the sheets up and down like others. I would want her all the time! 
Thanks Tiffany! You‚Äôre awesome!
Lina
title: Massage Green Chino

review: BK CharBQ is hands down our go to eatery for lunch or dinner.  The family owned and run restaurant is like going to a friend‚Äôs home for a meal.  The food is fresh and delicious and the atmosphere is relaxed and friendly.   They recently catered a party for us for 80 people and our guests raved about the brisket, ribs, chicken and coleslaw.  The meat was cooked to perfection.  They supplied warming ovens, trays and sauces.  Good thing there are plenty of leftovers for us to enjoy!!   If you love great smoked & grilled meats and salmon, give them a try.  Their sides are delicious as well!!
title: BK CharBQ - best food for the value!

review: Octagon Pavers (aka Grahame) did a wonderful job on our driveway this summer  (2017). We had multiple bids, and the price was more than reasonable. Grahame had an easy going nature, clear communication and a zealousness to see the job completed on time.  The job is not finished until every last detail was completed to our satisfaction.  To top it off the workmanship and design was great. Our neighbors ultimately used Octagon for their driveway a few months later.
title: Octagon Pavers did a wonder job on our driveway!

review:
I use yelp frequently, but have just started using check-in to get a deal, discount. I checked-in on my iPad and was told I had a discount. I went to the business and asked for my discount. They asked to see the deal, coupon.

I looked on my iPad, but it was not to be found. I could find my check-in, but not the deal. I was given the discount anyway, nice merchant.

I searched the website and used Google. All I could find was info that said to select more and select my deals. Won‚Äôt work on my iPad.

The next day I was using my iPhone & decided to look again for my deal. I found it on my phone. I went back to my iPad and tried to find it. Not there.

Bad design. Inconsistent functionality and illogical. I can check-in on my iPad but not find the deal generated by the check-in? Really? 

Wasted my time searching for the deal, embarrassed me at the merchant, put the merchant in a bad spot, and FRUSTRATING!!!!!
title: Deals not shown on iPad

review:
My husband and I have been going to Gauchos Brazilian Steakhouse in Myrtle Beach for a little over two years now

From the very first time we walked in there we were greeted with respect smiles and great personalities

The food is absolutely fabulous and I would NOT recommend any other Brazilian Steakhouse in the area.

Their prices are very reasonable considering the high cost of food today
They have been voted number 1 in the area for being an exceptional restaurant
We give it a five star rating
If I could give it a higher rating I would
The ambiance is great

It is NOT gaudy looking at all And they also have a bar

They take walk ins and reservations

TAKE IT FROM ME
EVERYTHING THERE IS GREAT
GIVE IT A TRY
YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED
We have recommended many people and they ALL loved it

Jane Bishop

A word of advice- skip the Yukon Gold potato cake and the green beans were not cooked enough for me. 

All in all a very good meal with great service! Highly recommend!

review: Was favorably impressed with two young men taking over a company started by a grandfather. Been around for some time. They advertised a soft wash so your screens and plants aren‚Äôt blown away and did a very nice job on the house. But hard to describe the wonderful job they did on our oversized driveway. I‚Äôve never been happy with the results til now. The mildew the moss the ingrained black stains gone leaving a clean white surface I‚Äôd forgotten was there. What a difference!

review: Just happened to be in Cottage Grove, Oregon this morning when my husband‚Äôs GMC Terrain windshield wipers quit working. Stopped at this dealer and spoke with William. I would definitely recommend this GMC Dealer in Cottage Grove, Oregon. Be sure to ask for William.üëç

review:
My Valentine Flower order was for a $138 large Premium flower arrangement of red roses and matching carnations.
1) the order was placed and confirmed Feb. 11th for delivery to an office building on Feb 14th.
2) the flowers were left at a loading dock of the office building at 10:30 ama day late (15th) along with a phone message to my recipient, who was not in the office that day.
3) the arrangement was not only less than premium, but did not resemble the original order with NO roses.
4) at 2:00 pm on the 15th, after retrieving the flowers from the loading dock I returned the arrangement to Purple Lotus personally.
5) I produced a picture of the original order to be able for her to compare the two. The owner was rude to me and indicated that there is no guaranty on the specific arrangement, but that the returned flowers were a reasonable replacement. No mention of the day late,loading dock delivery. Nonetheless, she indicated that she would refund my card.
6) On Feb 20th my card was refunded only $118, $20 short of my original purchase pice.
Never again
title: Purple Lotus Florist

review: I made an appointment and when I showed up it was awkward - Dr Yell was like why are you here? And, I had assumed I was there for a checkup and pap, etc. - that is why I made the appointment. Anyway at some point I end up having an ultrasound and the doctor tells me I have fibroids. I‚Äôm like wow - I had no idea‚Ä¶ nothing bothers me, although I did have difficult pregnancies, maybe, I thought - that‚Äôs the reason. Anyway - years later after moving out of state, I filled out my health history and wrote fibroids in the paper work and had another ultrasound and the doctor tells me there are NO fibroids! So - weird, the whole interaction/person‚Ä¶ everything with the NW practice.

I left and returned 5 minutes later. No text, No call, No service. Manager simply said you left; to bad! Disrespectful and rude. Don‚Äôt like your job; get another one. No way to do business.  Verizon customer for 20+years and 4 lines.  I will find somewhere else to spend my money.

review: I love Yelp! I‚Äôve been Yelping for 10 years now and it has seriously been such a lifesaver! I‚Äôm able to find a lead to great businesses, places to eat, and so many other things! review:
Yelp is purely an extortion game. You want to take down the photo that shows up on Yelp, pay $1 per day for an upgrade. $31 per month to change one bad photo of the 42 photos on your yelp. There algorithm removes 5 star reviews and leaves negative reviews posted by competitors. If your a small business owner yelp will do their best to keep your rating low unless you pay their extortion fees. Want to opt out? Nope you can‚Äôt do that either. You have no say in if your business is listed on Yelp. They hide behind federal law ‚ÄúFOR NOW‚Äù. I have contacted my Senator and State Representative and they have assured me Yelp is on their radar just like Facebook, Twitter, etc. 

The games up yelp.

review:
I have been going to Zona 78 since they opened on Tanque Verde Rd. We always had excellent food and always looked forward to going there.

Every time we visited Tucson I made it a point to go to Zona. She said different chefs at Zona each have their own way of making Tomato Basil Soup. It was horrible. I will never go back there again. So sad

review:
Have been a long term weekly customer. Historically we have had reasonable to good service. Last week we were greeted as we entered as usual but had no one acknowledge our existence for 15 minutes after being seated. Frustrated, we decided to leave.
Tonight we decide we would give them another chance. Unfortunately we had a very similar experience. After 10 minutes of not being acknowledged, we decided again to just leave. This time however, I decided I would let someone know that there was an issue (as a business owner, I would want the same). The manager, Ms Hooper, suggested I go online as there was no one that could be ‚Äúcalled‚Äù, so here I am.
title: Poor customer service

review: I called this morning with a last minute grooming request. This was my first time using Vicky‚Äôs Grooming  she was able to squeeze us in. She quoted us a price and stick to the price. When I picked up our Lab she mentioned that he was larger that she thought when we were quoted and it would be a little more the next time. I appreciated that she told me this and that she honored the original price. Our Dog looked and smelled great! I am happy and will definitely return!
title: Great Experience!

review:
I have given a good review for this location before but today just seemed to be even better. Maybe it‚Äôs because I just had a long stressful week at work even with that said the music was good, the vibe was upbeat, the gentlemen at the bar was very attentive, the stout beer was perfect, the special was a spicy brisket sandwich that was delicious, and as always the creamy slaw is perfect, even the server who brought the food out was very friendly and made it a personal encounter.
Thank you
title: Friday treat for me!

review: Longo Lexus has been a great place for me to service my Lexus‚Äôs.  I purchased my vehicles at Longo Lexus and have them serviced with Man Wong.  He has been my service advisor for about fifteen years and has given me excellent service for my cars in town along with his Longo team.  Man listens to you and makes sure your car is done right the first time.  He keeps you informed on the status of your car.  I cannot find the service he provides anywhere else but Longo.
title: Great Lexus Service

review:
On the iPhone version, when looking at bookmarks or collections, the map shows a map of the ENTIRE United States. Then you have to zoom into your neighborhood to see what‚Äôs nearby. It shouldn‚Äôt work like that. The map should default to a local view then expand to a global view if you want that. When you click on a business, then click back, the map returns back to the global view and the process starts all over again, really frustrating.

Collections and bookmark folders from the iPhone version aren‚Äôt visible in the iPad version.

review: A longing, to return to days of winters‚Äô past. A brush of arctic wind against a Norwegian boys cheek glowing wild as though telling a secret through brush and honey mead kissed lips. In the fireglow, a nettle of young White weir branches reaches out to the sky, yawning to take one last breath of cold winter air before the long rest. Then you see it. The arching gives way to another form, and then another. You brush the cold from your eye and there it is. Beading back at you. Something so subtle it could only be a whisper, but so prominent that you would never miss her again. A word. Yelp.
title: The App seems to express

review: Our recent move was quite challenging.... The new environment of the desert meant climate changes from ocean breeze to desert heat...our unfamiliarity of the pest we encountered was freighting to say the least... Emmanuel, assured us he would relieve our fears... The initial service and monthly follow ups has rid us from all things that creep in and out of our home... We rest a lot easier  knowing our pest situation is under control... Thank you for your continued expertise and dedicated service

review: The only positive thing that this dealership had to offer was a lower price than competitive like cars. From the beginning we should have gone with our gut and not used this dealership. Issue on top of issue has come from leasing a car through them including them entering in wrong information so now we are limited to how we can pay our bill. Now only ONE month into our lease one of the tires has blown out (and we didn‚Äôt hit anything and nothing was run over or found in the tire) and they told us sorry but we can give you a car wash. Don‚Äôt bother calling either to try to talk to anyone because no one will ever call you back.
title: Would not recommend to anyone!!!

review: My husband and I stopped in on our road trip and found this jewel. The food was fabulous. I had the waffles and they were the best I‚Äôve ever had!  Very light and didn‚Äôt really need syrup they were so good (and I like syrup too). My husband had the burger and he is a burger man and he said it was very fresh and very good. He also had some of my waffles and said they were the best he had ever had. Highly recommend. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. The owner was very nice as well.

review: Their reviews are a joke. I know 100% that a competitor went and reviewed a business that their ex employee now owns and I reported it. I contacted the owners and they reported it for the same reason. It brought their rating down a lot. They said they‚Äôre keeping the review after 20 mins. In other words, Yelp refused to look into it. So basically, if you want to ruin a restaurant because they are your competitor, go ahead and use yelp. What yelp does should be illegal. They‚Äôll make sure your positive reviews stay on the main page as long as you pay them. I reported a comment because it‚Äôs the owner of the business and guess what they did? They told me they can‚Äôt confirm it. This site is TRASH.
title: Reviews

review: My reviews have never show up. I do so many reviews but the reviews just show up on my phone only not anyone else . When I do the reviews I want other peoples to see it not me . I think yelp is doing some business with the owner of business. So they decide what reviews will be show on yelp. If the business owner pay for them they will let the good reviews go , and stop the bad reviews, if not pay for yelp , yelp will let the bad reviews go and stop the good reviews. If you don‚Äôt believe me, just try do a review and then borrow your friend‚Äôs phone to search on the store you just reviewed to see it but you need 2 people to do it , 1 do a bad review and 1 do good review . You will see it

review:

review: Highly recommend this store. Has everything you need and more. Prices are great and customer service is great too. Reward points decrease your prices on top of the the great prices they already have!!! No crowds in the store or in the lines. Otherwise they usually open another cash register! All you have to do is ask! Great customer service too. It‚Äôs a nice, clean, very orderly and well stocked store! There‚Äôs something for everyone and everything! Love that Kmart!

review: My Dental office titled Meadow‚Äôs Dental in Temecula, Ca.  is one of the best operated office I have seen. The receptionist and office Managers explain the dental procedures and costs including your insurance accurately and efficiently. My particular Dentist Dr. Chu is such a nice person. He is calm and caring. He made sure I received my medication and followed up later that same evening to make sure I was feeling alright. The staff is absolutely wonderful and very professional. I highly recommend this dental location for any dental needs you require. Thanks, Carol S.

review: This is a definite must if you enjoy the thrill of music cement through nature on rutted roads and mud splashed clothes. We were especially lucky that there had been some good rains the days before and during our adventure so the puddles were plentiful. If there are more than two driving age adults in your party I would pay the up charge for two drivers. If you are lucky enough to get Josh and Troy it will be that much better as they add a REAL dimension to the local feeling.
title: Princevlle ranch ATV

review: I like the Yelp app a lot, however this recent redesign of bookmarks (now part of collections) has rendered them a lot less usable. I don‚Äôt mind the redesign, but when I look at my bookmarks in map view, it no longer loads all of them! It only loads some subset of what‚Äôs near me or recently bookmarked. Even when I pan the map it doesn‚Äôt load the bookmarks that correspond to the new map area. The result is that I can only look at bookmarks near my current location, not for example, the neighborhood where I will eat dinner tonight. Please fix this! Thank you.
title: Bad update for bookmarks users

review: This is the MOST annoying app. Not only are you REQUIRED to download it just to use it but the reviews are shady. In the App Store it shows thousands of good reviews for this app, once you read them however many of the reviews are for specific businesses, not a review of the app itself. This is concerning to me and it makes me not trust many of the reviews made on Yelp for the actual businesses. How come so many people are being fooled into reviewing the app and thinking they are reviewing the restaurant/company they used. It seems like a very dishonest way of inflating their app rating and I cannot trust a company that would allow that.
title: Why are some of the reviews about businesses and not the Yelp app?!

review:
From first-hand experience, yelp removes legitimately negative reviews and experiences that you may have with a business, specifically with their advertisers. I had a competing service steal my work and try to falsely market their business with my work, and the work of others. When I tried to review the business with this information, yelp would not allow the review to stay. When I attempted to contact yelp, absolutely zero response. They even threatened to shut down my account if I continued to try to post the negative review (I even have screenshots of all this nonsense to prove this business‚Äôs actions). 

However in my experience as a business owner, when I had someone who was not a client posting falsified reviews, creating multiple accounts to do so, they refused to remove the reviews until I got a lawyer involved.  Even then, it took MONTHS.

Yelp is the devil. Don‚Äôt trust any of the reviews. Trust personal recommendations from those you know instead. 

Up yours, Yelp. I can‚Äôt wait until the day you shut down!
title: Yelp is the devil

review: Cody did an awesome job on my tattoos. He was super friendly and easy to talk to and easy to work with on placement and designs. The vibes in there was super cool! review: We came when they opened a week ago and the restaurant was cold. There was 6 of us--3 couples. We asked that we have 3 checks, but the man didn't understand and didn't speak much English. We got one check. I think he also got the orders mixed up because he brought dishes we didn't order. Mine was ok, not exceptional, just average. One guy in the party didn't get anything at all and they had trouble understanding that they were trying to charge him and that his order should be taken off the bill. review: Amber did an awesome job organizing my chaotic shelves!!!  I had so much stuff that I wanted to store on the shelves, but I still wanted them to look presentable. review:
Mediocre salad with lots of brown. Slow service, although I was the very first lunch customer. I'm a widow traveling alone and I was seated in Siberia.

Everything else was outstanding. I had the plated lunch and chose Windsor Court salad, crab cake, green beans and potatoes. They don't offer dessert.

I actually came to this hotel for the high tea, but found out only when I arrived that it was by reservation only. It was a blessing in disguise; the high tea is $65! The plated lunch is $28, with certain upgrades. My crab cake was an upgrade, so it was $38. Bottom line, about $50 with tax and tip.
title: Grill Room, Windsor Court Hotel, New Orleans

review: I would NOT recommend this place. The lady that did my pedicure was rude, impatient and she cut my big toe nail too short and it bled. review: This location was very impressive, very clean and organized. Customer service was superb! Everyone was friendly. review: Our family of six spent one day climbing in and out of our van to see the historic sights in Nauvoo. THEN we rented the 6 person golf cart on the 2nd and 3rd day and it was so worth it!! review:
Quite literally one of the worst places I have ever attempted to stay in.  I checked in with my family, and immediate noticed everything was grungy.  Sheets had stains, mattresses had cigarette burns, most of the furniture was broken and it appeared to have black mold on the ceiling.  We did not feel comfortable putting our luggage on the floor.   

The bathroom did not appear to be clean, and was in horrible shape.  Rusted, dingy and some unknown substance on the faucet.   We asked for new pillow cases, and they never showed up.  I asked the front desk for a new room due to the construction and they said they were sold out.  

When my family had enough of the banging, machinery and dragging of construction materials OUTSIDE our door, we were told that we had stayed there too long (a couple of hours) and they couldn‚Äôt do anything.  

Definitely a lesson of check the reviews before you pay anything!!  And fair warning, this place is well know among competitors and guests often leave early.

review: If i spend the time writing a review it should be published, if I feel passionate enough about a topic to make a statement i didnt make that statement to be put in a deep dark corner of the app.  I ised to believe in leaving reviews but when they ‚Äúfilter reviews‚Äù then its not really the entire picture, if my voice isnt heard then the time I spent writing the review is wasted.  I wont bother posting anymore reviews here and if i were you I wouldn‚Äôt either, it should be up to the reader to determine what reviews are relevant and which are not. I will never come back to this place , awful customer service..
title: Extremely rude

review:
I have stopped supporting Yelp. I used to write reviews of businesses, but when some of my and others low-star reviews were flagged and removed at the same time other users directly insulted me and others by name in their 5-star comments, it became obvious the entire enterprise exists solely to push 5-star reviews.

If users‚Äô bad experiences with businesses (1- and 2-star) can effectively be taken down by petty insults, instead of countered by the good experiences (3-to-5-star) of others, then users are mis- and uninformed.

I have seen 5-star restaurants dip to 4 due to low reviews (too dry/sweet/gritty/salty, wrong/lost orders, got sick, lost reservations, etc.), all of which were better written and more clear in their complaints than the vague 5-star comments, only to see those reviews removed or otherwise ‚Äúnot counted‚Äù days later.

So Yelp definitely appears to have considerably more than just a streak of favoritism, but a core of capriciousness that renders its entire rating system untrustworthy.
title: Capricious

review:
The order was placed over the phone for pick up. The $15 Gyro was ready when I arrived. After noticing that the establishment was truly dedicated to Greek menu items I inquired about grape leaves. I was told that they indeed did carry grape leaves. 
An order of 4 would be $4 and an order of 8 would be $10. 

I enjoy grape leaves so I ordered 8. 

I ate one without looking into the box. 
Upon looking I saw withered red onions, a few cucumbers and decaying grape leaves which were withered and torn. 

Was this another patron‚Äôs doggy bag to take home I wondered. 

It would have been a decent experience if only the server would have had the respect not to rewrap already plated food and then sell it to me for any price. 

The server was Latina The owner was Greek I am Black. 

Do not go to this establishment if you are Black is my recommendation. 

You will be mistreated and taken for a fool by the Latina server. She will sell you food from another customer‚Äôs plate. And the owner will allow it to happen.
title: They sold me another patron‚Äôs left overs

review: Last Friday I had an issue with their work on the wheels they were still dirty. I called back and spoke to the cashier who promised me to come back the following week and they will take care of it. Kerri the cashier and Marcos the manager went above and beyond to accommodate me. I ended up buying the monthly package because I was treated so well. If you‚Äôre in the market for a car wash I recommend Jacksons on Scottsdale Road they are the best! Brendan

review: Tanya @ Haven, took all of my daughters $200 she saved to get her hair done and delivered the exact opposite of what she asked for. She asked for color treatment. She asked for help bringing her previously died hair back to her more natural lighter tone. Tanya advised her that might not be easy or could even damage her hair. Instead she took her hard earned and saved money of her own and died her hair even darker. No doubt easier for her, and of course she still made her $200, but delivering my daughter a more drawn out process and not at all what she was asking for. #Greedy  do yourself a favor and find a professional not just an opportunist who takes Advantage of people

review: I have used this app, for many years now, to find out the best place for dark hot chocolate in Nashville to the best surgeon for hip replacement in Sam Francisco- in other words from the frivolous to the freakin serious needs! Then I can maintain my stellar reputation as a valuable resource to my friends and familyüòäThanks so much, YELP!!

review:
My family has been loyal customers of Toyota and Longo since the early ‚Äò70s.

We continue to rely on Longo for all our car purchases in large part due to the value & professionalism that can only be found at Longo Toyota.

We had the pleasure of working with Jimmy Phan, Digital Sales Manager, on the Jan. 11, ‚Äò22 purchase of our new Toyota Highlander. 

Important to note; the price he quoted us was the price we received, no gimmicks or sales pressure. He has worked diligently and at times during his non work days to see that our needs were being addressed to our satisfaction. 

I believe it is Associates such as Jimmy that make Longo Toyota the #1 Toyota sales leader in America.

We look forward to letting anyone that has an interest in the purchase of a Toyota about Longo.

review: I appreciate Yelp so much.  I come here often before getting certain services or going to places. I find it very helpful reading others experience.  People take each other for granted often. review:

Today was no exception when I brought my car to them after my muffler came off my car last night.  Nick immediately referred me to someone less expensive.  I THANKED he & his wife Jamie & asked if I could get an oil change.  
I received a call from Jamie stating after Nick looked at my car, he suggested not to put another dime into it because whatever I hit totaled the car.
I LOVE their honesty, I mean, who does that!!!
Firestone & Brakes Plus would have taken the money & ran because they are THIEVES, but not Big Nick‚Äôs Auto, they REALLY care about their customers so I just want to THANK them for SAVING me a lot of money!!!!!!!
Oh, their Boxer Chaos is AWESOME as well.

My daughter suffered a head injury while trying to finish the job and dr Ruth twisted it and tried make my daughter believe that it was me that came back and hit her on the head. Espinosas

review: I think most people with any awareness at all about marketing and review platforms, have realized by now that yelp is a fake one that tries not to let businesses look good (hiding real customer reviews if too many are positive, etc. unless they will fork out ridiculous money for marketing services, which are no good. review: Yelp says that featured reviews (those which actually contributed to star ratings) are those which are posted by bonafide Yelp users: those who have multiple reviews and contacts on the site. Many reviews are back burnered because that reviewer is maybe a ‚Äúone-timer.‚Äù This is fine, except that the algorithm isn‚Äôt even consistent: often I see people with multiple reviews who are obviously real and are on Yelp a lot have reviews demoted while a bad review by a user with NO contacts and NO other reviews who hasn‚Äôt been on the site or app for a year STAYs on featured reviews and drags down the rating. The site doesn‚Äôt even play by its own rules. üò†üò†üò†
title: Why does algorithm favor bad reviews?

review: Professional and very knowledgeable of their business. Scott is very good in responding to my inquiry and sent his tech and resolved our AC issues. review: As a career restaurant manager and overall celebrator of all things food, I am very grateful for yelp. review:

The night shift must be on crack..

review:
Kyle M. And Ray O. have consistently shown customer service towards my animals and I being truly genuine. 

I get a response ASAP when I reach out which I personally respect considering larger companies take messages and who knows when they will get back with me.

review:
So I have always used Yelp, I felt it was the best place to find reviews.
Then all of a sudden I wasn‚Äôt able to use it unless I downloaded the app. So I downloaded the app.
I finally get to use it (this was maybe my 3rd review on the app) and its an important cause:
I was scammed out of money by a local contractor. 
All I wanted to do- since it was clear I wasn‚Äôt getting my money back- was to WARN PEOPLE. They had a handful of 5 star reviews (probably by robots or their own employees) and I felt more people would be duped into giving them thousands of dollars, like I was.
I posted a long and thorough but calm review. I didn‚Äôt swear, I wasn‚Äôt threatening, it was professional. 
The next day, my review is gone. The contractor emailed me- laughing and saying ‚Äúleave all the reviews you want, we can delete them!‚Äù

Yelp is a JOKE. If I can‚Äôt warn people about bad businesses in an honest manner- what‚Äôs the point!?

Put up a review on google and found that he CAN‚ÄôT delete those. I recommend using google reviews. 

Bye yelp. üëãüèº
title: Yelp Lets Businesses Delete Your Review.

review: No matter what city, state, or nation perhaps done‚Ä¶ Yelp is to the rescue. It has real votes on real places whether it‚Äôs something to eat, drink, or wear out for the night. People have their honest opinion and they‚Äôre not getting paid for it so we know what‚Äôs real. Also the businesses can‚Äôt hey yo do you have bad reviews taken away I like that as well. To sum it all up yelp Can‚Äôt find you dinner or a Pair of socks,  one star socks five star rocks. Thanks yelpidy yelp yelp ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è~Yelp Rating!üçæü§ôüèºüôè

review:
Review is just for the app, not the service.

I HATE how when I‚Äôm on Yelp on my phone and click on a photo or specific review I‚Äôm forced to open the Yelp app and I automatically get sent to the Yelp app home page; not the page I was just previously looking at so I completely lose my place. Drives me nuts. This is the only app I use that does this. All others ask if I want to use the app, I click yes and the exact page/item I was looking at in the browser is then opened in the app. This can‚Äôt be that hard for Yelp to figure out. review:
Open opinions on nearly every business.  We rely on Yelp consistently to evaluate businesses, products, and services both local and away.  Many of our decisions are made based on our research done here.

The app is simple to use.  Leaving your own reviews are just as easy as finding them.  Imagery and well thought out customer reviews make for a great product.  There‚Äôs really no negatives to provide.  Download it and enjoy your research.

review: This place is a gem. The Food, Service, and Ambiance is STELLAR. So so so glad I chose to come here for lunch with my little girl. Her 1st words after her 1st bite was, ‚ÄúMOMMY! Have you ever been here before?!?‚Äù Her eyes were as big as saucers. We will make the trip back all the way from Downtown Dallas. I‚Äôll definitely be bringing back friends and visitors from out of state. We split the Chicken & Not-A-Waffle and fully loaded Tots. review:

Mark was very professional - did a great job - went above and beyond to make my project perfect. We had a contract and agreed upon price - absolutely no complaints and would highly recommend.

review: I love yelp! It seems to be so much more accurate than google. Love the real time and honest reviews. I like how you can also view reviews that didn‚Äôt make it only certain business‚Äôs... Helps so much trying to find good food and places üò¨

review: Sheila - I came into the Brentwood location and was greeted by Sheila.  She had a smile on her face and made sure I got my order right away. I hardly ever see this and complimented her.  She asked me what I did and found an opportunity for catering business. She made sure that I knew she would take care of me.  A great hostess and I will return based on that experience alone.  I go to other locations where there is no customer service.  Sheila should be training your staff.  She‚Äôs terrific!!

review:
I Would like to highly recommend the law practice Henness & Haight, during a very challenging time for me following an injury at work Mr. Brian Nestor and Ms. Amanda Roop were a tremendous help, the process which I was unfamiliar with was explained to me clearly and they were always available for any questions or concerns,

review: Dr Bernstein and his entire staff have been incredible.  They have always treated me with the utmost care listening to whatever my needs may be.  It has been a wonderful experience.  While I am still receiving care we are almost 100 percent completed.  Scheduling has been very convenient and if I run into problems the office is always willing to work around my issues. review:
My washer and dryer went out. Then the dryer vent plugged. No one could come to the Long Beach Peninsula in Washington until the end of October. Meanwhile I had an urgent family event that I needed clean clothes for.
I explained the situation on the phone. 20 minutes,after, I got a call that they had a repair person on the peninsula who would come if I could wait at least an hour. They came, did a great job and will be my permanent heating and cooling people.

review:
Never again! 
Miscalculations by designer, Sylvia, altered the amount of storage I was finally able to get in the garage. This necessitated not only a change in design and storage space, but also required several follow up trips for bringing the correct materials. Not once did the installers arrive at the times they said- usually between 2-4 hours late - and WITHOUT notification of the time delay. Very inconvenient and frustrating! The installers did a nice job in the end, and their tardiness did not appear to be their fault, but rather poor planning and scheduling of the timelines of other customers ahead of me .

Think twice - before booking with Closets by Design!
title: Garage storage installation of cabinetry and drawers

review:
The app runs near perfectly. The interface and functionality look great on iPhone X and the app runs as if it was a native app. I‚Äôm thoroughly impressed. 

Now, I really love Yelp I think it has a great system down for filtering and understanding reviews and not only does it help businesses, but it as helped me connect with other people and create healthy routines for writing. I have now worked yelp into my everyday activities, and it helps me find some zen!
title: Runs like a dream

review: As a business owner yelp is a dreadful and corrupted place for most business owners out there. Yelp will never help you out but only when you will be asked to pay for their outrageous ad prices which are 10times more expensive than any other social media app. It only cares about the customers which are the ones Ofcourse who write the reviews and bring traffic to their app. If i could give 0 stars i would. This company deserves the least of sympathy and i am surprised how this app is still running wild. With fake reviews. Unverified accounts and spammers. Yelp is the ‚Äúinternet‚Äù back in the early 2000s. Dont bring business to this app. It destroys many hardworking businesses and families
title: Money hungry

review: I spent two hours placing an online siding order only to discover at checkout that they do not pull or hold it even after you pay.  When you arrive you wander the store for paperwork then get in line in the yard where there are two employees to service the dozen vehicles waiting.   You climb up a deck to find and pull your own siding and building materials, carry them down the stairs and load them yourself.  Two and a half hours after arrival you must then be inspected and counted at the gate before you‚Äôre allowed to leave.  Do yourself a favor and go straight to Home Depot online where they have excellent service and pickup when you order online

review: As a person who works for a healthcare facility, I find that reviews are false and yet they continue to be posted daily (to various facilities) and there is literally nothing we can do to prove it and have the false reviews removed. That makes the ratings false and damaging to our practices. This is my main reason for only giving 1 star to yelp. I am sure there are many other healthcare providers who would strongly agree with my opinion. If yelp is concerned about their site...maybe they would set up a way that we could dispute a false report and have it removed. Healthcare may be the only business unable to respond but it is extremely important

review: I love yelp! No matter where I go I can always count on reading people's honest reviews of different establishments. Some of the reasons I go to establishments are simply due to how the management responds to complaints. I feel if I contribute a review I am helping others and making a difference. I also love that the app provides closest destinations directions and phone numbers to any business you are looking for. I highly recommend downloading this app!
title: Super helpful

review: The app is beneficial when needing to find nearby restaurants but two things I hate about the app is ‚ÄúYelp sort‚Äù being the default and not being able to sort by the newest reviews. Developers, we the users do NOT want to see reviews from years ago (Yelp sort). We want to see more recent reviews. If you want to keep ‚ÄúYelp sort‚Äù (which is terrible) then at least give us the option to see the most recent reviews! The latter reason is why I avoid the app and use Yelp from a computer. This should be an easy fix that should drive positive reviews and more downloads up! Make it happen!
title: Website > App

review:
They don‚Äôt let you look at reviews unless you download their terrible app. Also most of the reviews are filtered. Also most of the reviews are very poorly written, it‚Äôs all amateurs that don‚Äôt know what they‚Äôre talking about. Never buy advertisement with Yelp I‚Äôve lost over $4000 on Yelp advertisements because it‚Äôs so overpriced. I‚Äôve never generated one lead from Yelp. It‚Äôs a waste of money and time.

Google reviews is way better and accurate. And they don‚Äôt force you to download some stupid app or by their terrible ad space. Yelp is not even profitable, they are drowning in debt. They‚Äôre going to go out of business
title: Yelp is a terrible app. They spam you until you actually download their app.

review:
We stayed here with 2 children.  It is an older hotel where the door to the rooms are accessible from the outside (like a motel) instead of a hallway (like a hotel).  We loved this!  The pool is in the center of the property surrounded by rooms on all 4 sides with some green-space.  We felt safe especially with the lighting and cameras.  The beds were comfortable and the room we stayed had been updated with granite countertops new tub and tile in the bathrooms.  

I have no idea what people want in a hotel.  However, we will stay here again.  We really liked this property.  It is unique and just our speed.

There are newer hotels close by.  If you need new they are available at 2 times the cost of staying here.  I can‚Äôt say it loudly enough. This is a quite, safe, clean hotel with comfortable beds.
Than you.
title: Quiet, and comfortable

review:
Here is another diamond in the rough. Or maybe even more than that. It's not so much a place you visit for chow, but a place that makes you really want to move here in the vicinity. I wish it didn't really. Hard to go back where you come from when you have this. Many a Thanks to Joshua! Manager I believe there. Making my stay one of too much to remember. I felt at Home :)

You Philly Cheese Steak explorers off the beaten Path, don't forget this gem!

review:

We both decided to go to Delfinos tonight. The veal Salrimboca was the best ever. The sauce was creamy and yet something like a flavorful cheese taste in it. Delicious. The special Arugala salad was one of the best ever. Delfinos is on my go to places when I want a specially delicious meal. 
Also, a great menu.

review:
This place is fabulous from the owners down to the staff. 

I have had my dog bathed here many times and she smells delightful and the staff are patient to her nervousness. 

I had a food consult with Jason and he was very knowledgeable in the dense science of dog nutrition. I felt I could nerd out for hours and appreciate it expertise and advice. 

I took his nutritional advice and my dog has huge improvement in her autoimmune symptoms. 

I frequently visit the store and on one occasion asked if they carried a particular supplement. They told me they do not. I didn‚Äôt expect it but the employee did further research and called me to let me know where I could order it. I appreciate the extra mile without me even asking. 

I highly recommend this place. Thanks again Just Dog People for helping me navigate being a dog mom. üêïüíï
title: Above and beyond

review:
Yes covid has left many restauranteurs scrambling to find competent staff but I am afraid some are playing catch up at the expense of the consumers good heart.
My buddy and I ordered the 26-30 ounce Tomahawk ribeye to split and really needed a chainsaw instead of a steak knife to cut our way through it. We both knawed on a bite and decided to bring it to our waiters attention. The owner gave us a whopping 15. off the 85. price tag. Not to mention it wasn't more than 12 ozs. excluding the 3 lbs of bone.
To keep from breaking the spirit of our hard working waiter we paid the check and wished the owner the very best.
Advice. Buy a really good cit of meat and a great bottle of wine and grille it yourself.
title: Left a bad taste in my mouth!

She responds that they are not ready and has multiple excuse which include, ‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt here yesterday‚Äù, ‚ÄúI am not in the back‚Äù, you can cancel your order or wait.......  no apology, no accountability and the expression in her face clearly stated that she could care less. It is a shame.......good cookies but service that will keep me from coming back.

review: Last week I drove from Fl to NYS during the COVID-19 crisis and made a gas/rest stop at the Sheetz right off the highway in Grove City, PA.
