review:
These people are on it. They took me in immediately. Diagnosed and repaired the problem within an hour. I could not ask for anything more. This is the best repair service I have ever had. I recommend it for anyone needing Their car fixed. 
Not only were they good @ their jobs but they were very pleasant and polite too. I was totally shocked @ how small the bill was. Absolutely shocked. I love these guys.
I recommend Seany B‚Äôs for any kind of auto repair work.
Great work guys.
title: Seany B‚Äôs Auto repair shop

review:
They remove all good reviews and leave the bad ones unless you pay them. The BBB does this exact same thing. Unless you pay them they won‚Äôt give you a good grade. The whole idea and premise that these companies are supposedly built on, is honesty, Right!? We go to these sites and apps because we want to try get a feel from others‚Äô experiences and honest opinions before we decide to utilize and pay for a service. BTW, YELP forbids anyone reviewing yelp on yelp. Hypocrites and non-transparent with their own business practices. 

In addition, their staff is nasty too if you should ever call and complain. 

This is a sad company and I hope someone steps up to their malpractices. ü§ô
title: Yelp is Totally Corrupt and Greedy!

review: Visiting from California... arrived on Saturday January 12th.  Customer service experience was horrible!! We thought after a ful day in Vegas it had lost its customer service skills. Felt like tourists were a given.  Sunday night went to Hofbrauhaus in Vegas.. our waiter Cole turned that all around.. for the better!! The service he gave us was amazing.  I guess it‚Äôs not where your at it‚Äôs where you go   Well he going back !!! That‚Äôs Cole your customer service is amazing!!!! Cheers to you !!!
title: Hofbrauhaus Las Vegas

review: They came to my house looked over the yard -sent us a quote-we paid for services each time a bill was sent- they really never kept in good contact with us -mulched half our property-said they fixed our sprinklers then -nothing- every time they said they were coming they didn‚Äôt!  Now after all the rains we have weeds so high and the property looks like we never had anything done.  So now we have to start all over!  They‚Äôve come across as being very flakey, showing up only when they felt like it.  Would not recommend them ever!! I‚Äôm very upset that you can‚Äôt trust people and their word!!
title: Green Gardens Landscaping

review: I am new to Buffalo and have temporary housing in a sketchy building on the East side of town. I randomly picked Love Joy Pizza off the internet and was extremely pleased! Everything was a 5 star from the guy who answered the phone, to Anthony who delivered my order and had the patience to figure where my door was and then took a little more time to chat with me about the neighborhood, to the best Stromboli I have ever had. I still have half left for lunch today and I can‚Äôt wait!!!
title: Love Joy Pizza

review: I cannot recommend Mike and his guys highly enough. Need more stars. I called them this morning about a tree problem. Mike scoped it out an hour later, and an hour after that, three guys were here and resolved the problem in under 30 minutes. I‚Äôve had problems in the past getting nationally known arborists to address other tree-related problems on a timely basis. File this under ‚Äúpatronize local businesses.‚Äù
title: Coryel Tree Service; too good

review: There is a load ringing in the pipes in the wall an almost impossible to sleep. We have called and called but they don‚Äôt fix it. The pool is closed for renovation in September. We were told on Monday it would be open Thurs morning but it is Friday evening and still no pool. No taxi service. No casino and no shuttle to strip. You have to call a cab and wait. There is almost no service here.  One person at the counter at times but sometimes no one. The Room service takes 45 minutes minimum. Don‚Äôt stay here. If you care about your employees put the in another suite hotel. This one is absolutely terrible.
title: Not much good about thus place

review:
This is an excellent restaurant ! Very plain and simple. Very clean ! Excellent waitresses/waiters! 
The food is very tasty ! I frequent this place with as many of my friends I can bring. Love the salad bar  the pizza, garlic bread and yes the wine is good. The owners are very nice. I love the olive oil too. It's real unlike so many other restaurants in the area whom do not supply real olive oil. 
The atmosphere is friendly and inviting 
If you want excellent cuisine in the tri-county area whether you live here or just visiting ABC is the place to go!
title: The Portuguese family

review:
We are used to having a very good experience at Bonefish Grille in Lakeland. Tonight we took our granddaughter there for dinner and I ordered my usual fish dish with a salad and it was good as usual but the salad lacked any extra accoutrements and was just so-so. 

My husband ordered a ribeye steak and was told by the waitress that it was her favorite however it lacked taste and seasoning and contained a good bit of gristle and fat and was not a good choice. The potatoes that came with it were dry. 

My granddaughter ordered a sushi dish and was very pleased with hers.  We were pleased with the service but disappointed in the overall food experience.
title: Disappointed tonight

review:
What an amazing experience .
I arrived on time and within two minutes I was sitting in the chair. 
The warm and friendly staff greeted me with smiles (even though it was very early in the morning) .
Dr bendik was great. He addressed my concerns , had me checked x-rayed and out within 20 minutes .He even told me I would feel better within 24 hours and not to worry . Well I was better within 5 hours and happy that he was able to put my mind at ease.
Pegi M
title: Great Morning At The Dentist

review: Our experience at Nissan of Reno was extremely comfortable and a pleasure. Our sales representative was Izzy. We called ahead from California to insure the vehicle we were interested in was available at approximately 9 AM. We told Izzy we would be there by 1:00 PM. When we arrived the vehicle was clean and ready. Our transaction took less the two hours. We were treated professionally and courteously. We were back home in California by 6PM with our new vehicle. A very pleasant experience üëç
title: Nissan of Reno

review:
First I can‚Äôt enjoy my food if I‚Äôm literally sweating while eating it.  Can you get some air conditioning please?  The ceiling fans are decorative not cooling.   My metal chair was wet from sweat.  I usually need a seater in restaurants but not here 
The burgers were ok.  5 of us agreed, over cooked and nothing special but not terrible.  Same for the fries.   Didn‚Äôt try them but the chicken strips got rave reviews, surprising for a burger joint.   I liked the salad better than the burger bowl.   $5.00 for a soda and fries to go with a $10-$14 Burger is TOO much.  $3.00 for a soda is too much too.  Burger Lounge and Mooyah are WAY better and 30% less go there instead
title: WAY overpriced.  Lobster prices for average food

review: Victoria Loza is so kind & Sweet I was Really stress out because this was my first time filling Bankruptcy but each & every time I would call Victoria she took the time to listen to me it was like working with my family all of the people at The Attorney Group was very nice But Victoria was my little Angel I told my Family & coworker that if they ever need a Attorney the Attorney Group I think is the Best because they make you feel like part of the Family so Thanks you Very much Attorney Group üòá
title: The Attorney Group

review:
Started using Yelp 6 years ago. As I found out how Yelp can work for me.  I now check every place on Yelp.  Have appreciate fellow Yelpers. 

I only found one place that was awful. Other then that great reviews. When I'm out of town and no idea where to go. I use my Yelpers to guide me around. I have found a restaurant and immediately check them out. Bad reviews and low stars I will drive off.  Thank you Yelp and my fellow Yelpers. Keep reviewing. So help
title: My every day helper!

review: I took a friend to Pelican Isle at Pete‚Äôs Landing in Huntington Beach and just want to say the food was amazing!  I‚Äôve been there many times and they do not disappoint. I had the seafood salad and there was so much fresh seafood I had to take 1/2 of it home.  There prices were still very affordable, and the service was great, friendly, and very welcoming.  If you haven‚Äôt tried Pelican Isle, you should.  Just a note, weekends are very busy.
title: The best food in town!!

review: Barbara is one of the best kept secrets in San Antonio!!  Nestled in Monte Vista, the century old  building has much character and is lively with a mix of professionals, professors, and young aspiring actors and actresses. The manager has his careful eye on the crowd and is checking in with everyone. The staff and bartenders are friendly and very helpful, as well as unobtrusively attentive. The food and drinks are outstanding and festive! A total fun and  lively experience! Let‚Äôs just keep it our secret!!
title: Best Neighborhood Bar/ Restaurant

review: My wife and I went to Foxcroft tonight because we have always loved it.  With virtually no contact with any staff or patrons, we were told that they wouldn‚Äôt serve us, allegedly because we we arguing and because my wife‚Äôs eyes were closed ( because she was trying to hear what was being said ) Needless to say, this was a ridiculous allegation, which no one cared to address with us.  We are so offended and can‚Äôt believe a legitimate business would allow their employees to behave in this manner.  It is so disappointing and we will never be back.   Go to any of the myriad of other great Greenville restaurants who truly want your business.
title: Foxcroft wine bar Greenville SC

review: I am reporting them to the bbb they are so unfair to new small businesses! all reviews get taken down within 1-2 days which makes it impossible to get new jobs. they need to fix this system. funny thing is if you look at the stimulations for their filter system, they say they keep Most reviews and the system is made to be fair to small businesses but they‚Äôre the only ones they‚Äôre hurting. waste of money when you get no leads. review:
Yelp used to be a place with where you could look up a local place in hopes that you could find real feedback on a business from the community. Nowadays, they are a pay to play algorithm‚Ä¶ If you were a new business and you claim your business on yelp, they aggressively go after you to Join their paid services and if you don‚Äôt, you are sure to have negative reviews added, or genuine reviews deleted. 

I beg everyone to please stop using Yelp for your local business Look up‚Ä¶ you are no longer getting the honest reviews they sought to bring to the Internet..
title: Please remove them from your App Store

review: First time to Birks came in for a work lunch . Service excellent , lots of parking.   The clam chowder soup was the best I have ever had in my entire life . I honestly ordered a salad and it was great however after seeing what my lunch companions ate . I will be back soon and trying more items from the menu . I eat out a lot for work and eat at some great restaurants but this place will be a frequent place to go moving forward .
title: Excellent

review:
I've been negligent in reviewing Yelp, the app. Actually, I never considered it before. I find it more than useful and easy to use. I was approached to be a member of the Yelp Elite Squad after I left numerous reviews. The only caveat, it was requested I leave an actual photo of my mug which, I prefer to remain anonymous. I will give excellent reviews when warranted and at the same time I'll make my thoughts known when a restaurant or place of business fails to meet expectations. So, I'm not of their Elite Squad. 

This app has helped us make decisions when in the past it was guesswork and sometimes that wasn't kosher. 

The app is easily maneuverable and user-friendly. 

So far I don't have any suggestions or requests.
title: I just realized I had not yet reviewed Yelp‚Äôs app.

review: I‚Äôm 88 and dine out regularly. This Italian resturant is one of my all time favorites. I live in Oregon but visit Southern California a few times a year. Each time I‚Äôm there, my priority is to take some friends to La Bella Pinseria for dinner. Every visit has been a total success. The food and service are always wonderful. The restaurant is always clean and a joyful place to dine. In particular, the pizza is especially tasteful. The friends I take always go back.
title: La Bella Pinseria

review: In the past, I have received and sent some spectacular flower arrangements from this business, so imagine my disappointment to receive flowers from family on my 70th birthday, only to note that they appear to have been sitting in the florist‚Äôs cooler for a week or more, based on the algae in the glass vase.  The flowers were a basic armload of assorted varieties without thought to composition or arrangement. And two days later, the flowers are dying.  Also received chocolates with the flowers.  Suggest the supplier try to eat them, as they are extremely unpalatable.  Hugely disappointing overall. üò¢
title: Wildflowers of Tolland

review: I really have enjoyed my years with Yelp. At first I just wrote reviews, but as I started to get more serious, I added friends, and tried to go to new places instead of the old standbys. Yelp has really helped and encouraged me to try new restaurants, business, and services. Others reviews have helped me tremendously. I hope to encourage others with my reviews as the years continue.
title: Best community

review: My friend‚Äôs son is at the Randall Children‚Äôs hospital and today is his birthday.  I could not find anyone to deliver balloons same day until I found Clearance Walker!!   They were amazing to work with and delivered the balloons to the hospital same day and even called back to make sure the hospital brought them up to the room.  What a blessing!   I am thankful my friend and her son felt my love from afar.   Great company!!   I highly recommend!!!
title: Saved the day!!!!

review: We had a slight veneer mishap & needed an emergency dental visit on a Friday a day when most Dentists are closed. Catching a flight to Paris on Sunday for our Anniversary so time was of the essence! I was assisted by  Bessie who facilitated an emergency visit quickly & in the time frame we needed. These are Caring Kind people I must Highly recommend Dr. Chong Lees practice at the Galleria of Dental Aesthtics in McLean (Bessie is the hero) & also Dr. Makarita of Tysons Aesthetic Dentistry in Vienna Va. Fixed up in less 30min.
userName: Real food instead of road food
title: When you are in Need YELP it!!

review:
This place is pure trash. Untalented hair cutting people that need to go back to school . Awful haircuts every time. You make an appointment and staff doesn‚Äôt stick to it . It happened to me multiple times. The hair cutters are to busy having endless chats about nothing and they will rather be posting pictures on instagram than working. I was waiting around while the woman that was supposed to cut my hair was taking snaps of the street posting on her stories on instagram even though she was reminded that customers are waiting. THIS PLACE NEEDS TO CLOSE DOWN AS ITS UNSANITARY GARBAGE PIT WITH GARBAGE PEOPLE WORKING THERE . Disgusting. 
I will never go back and I won‚Äôt recommend this garbage place to anyone.

review:
Only great things to say about Davis Air Conditioning Company! Called to set an appointment because my a/c had been out for a few days. They were able to get me in same day with minimal wait time. They were friendly, courteous and respect my home while finding the issue. They diagnosed the problem and had my A/C back working in no time. Will definitely use again for any future issues. 
~ Angie
title: Heat Saver!

review: I am a fairly frequent MacKenzie River patron, but my most recent experience may be my last one. We arrived after lunch time and were seated in a booth in the bar, which wasn‚Äôt a problem. The Cobb salad and pizza we ordered were good and the server was pleasant and efficient. The background music canceled out all the positives, however. It was heavy metal? Grunge? Angry men screaming their angst? I complained and the server said the music had been chosen by the manager and suggested I leave a review . I requested to speak to the manager and she just walked away, laughing and shaking her head. So, here you go‚Ä¶
title: Food okay, background music horrid

review: After being involved in an accident, the other person‚Äôs insurance company sent us to Enterprise. Initially, I was not happy with the SUV provided, but after letting Chloe know that we couldn‚Äôt accept the proffered car, she allowed us to swap for a car that accommodated our needs, quickly prepped the car, and let us know it was ready. She was a champion, and so was her colleague who assisted us. We will return!
title: Job Well Done!

review: Very convenient but the cashiers and staff are wonderful, beautiful people and make all the difference.  Smart courteous, lovely people.  Sure it‚Äôs a bit more expensive, but you can find some reasonably priced items and they don‚Äôt sell spoiled or damaged items.  Good selection of foreign foods too.  The milk lasts the longest from this store vs any store I have been to in nyc. The dessert and pastries are very good too.
title: The People are the Difference and Fresh milk!

review:
When you visit Inspired, you enter into a space with a warm welcoming vibe, relaxing music, great displays and a fabulous array of clothing ranging from basics to imported handmade dresses from Italy and Turkey- all at incredible prices. Inspired has 
distinctive gift items;  candles, amazing essentials oils, plants, baskets, terrariums and even charcuterie boards, books & utensils. The staff are happy to style and create the perfect outfit for your event! Be sure to stop in today!!!!
title: Unique Personalized Shopping Experience

review: Yelp is so easy to use and I use it all the time to check my it new restaurants and whether they‚Äôre worth trying. 9/10x yelp reviews are accurate and show me really great new eats. If you become a yelp elite you can also get invited to great free events in your area and meet with like minded foodies!  Everyone on yelp is also super sweet and helpful and I love that I can make reservations for restaurants through yelp as well!
title: Awesome!

review:
Bathrooms had no toilet paper, no hand towels, or soap and floor was full of Pee and shoes would stick to the floor.

Poor service, brought the wrong food, three different times, and the restaurant was freezing with many portable heaters keeping restaurant cool at best, very cold. That was my third time in and my last, and recommend anybody going to eat their check out the bathroom before eating. if their bathroom resembles their kitchen, they should be closed down immediately.

If you are anything, but Asian service is poor add best and recommend going elsewhere for better service and quality of food not to mention cleanliness.
title: Should be turned in to the health department

review: Have eaten there many times in the past. Today the food was terrible. The only good thing was the salads. The salad was fresh, crispy and all of the toppings were fresh. The potato salad and pasta salads were also great. The entrees were horrible. The pot roast was dry, the meat was not mixed in with the gravy and veggies, the fried chicken looked like two day old chicken, the creamed potatoes were lumpy (not smooth and creamy), the French fries, onion rings and fried okra were all stone cold, the ice cream machine was broken, just to mention a few of the issues encountered. Many trays were empty and not replenished. If this continues, I can see this location closing really quickly. Very disappointing experience.
title: Golden Corral - Rogers, AR

review: Every time I get on a waitlist at a restaurant that uses Yelp and it sends a link on my phone, even though the Yelp app is installed, it never opens the app. It always takes me to a webpage that says I don‚Äôt have the app installed, which redirects me to the app store page. Even after opening it through the link in the app store page, I still always get sent to the Yelp homepage instead of the page in the app that tells me what my place in line is. This bug has been an issue for a very long time now, and happened on both my current phone (iPhone 13 Pro Max) and my old phone (OnePlus 5T)
title: Waitlist links do not redirect properly

I asked if there was a problem with our order & she canceled it. Never have we been so rudely dismissed from a restaurant we have faithfully supported once or twice a month for over 10 years.

review:
I had a 2 hour wait / no exaggeration in a long line of customers waiting to pick up their cars at Avis at JFK
Only one person behind the desks. He mostly helped Avis preferred customers. Only went back to regular customers when Preferred were filling out forms. Avis had to know they had reservations for all these customers (more than 20 some with kids)Why did they not have enough staff on hand to help? Having that long a wait for a car that had been reserved AND checked in online (they said to do that if you want to skip the line at the counter but obviously NOT) after a long flight. review: The owner, Daniel, is extremely communicative and knowledgeable. This is hard to come across in south Florida. His pricing is affordable. His team worked in a timely manner and truly cared about the plants and surroundings of my house to ensure no damage or issues. I will hire them 100% again when needed and recommend to any one for pressure washing needs. Thank you again! My roof and from walkway/driveway look great.

review: I have been using Yelp / Eat24, OpenTable, and a bunch of food delivery service apps such as: Grubhub, Door Dash, 7NOW, Caviar, Postmates, UberEats, Chow Bus, Toast, InstaCart. This is consistently where I find the most restaurants and mom and pop places. I always browse the pictures and read Yelp reviews for food recommendations. Sometimes delivery here is pricier than using other apps. So I just use other apps to order food, and use Yelp to find food.
title: Best Food Finder App

review:
I have done reviews at Yelp only to have Yelp tell me that my review is not important enough to affect the overall star rating of a business.  Well, Yelp, I do quite a bit of consuming, be it in stores or in restaurants, and my opinion means just as much as the next person‚Äôs.

Another thing you do - which is openly racist, by the way - is that you promote black businesses.  The color of a business owner‚Äôs skin has never even mattered to me.  Why do you want to draw attention to the skin color of business owners?  Do you not see how stupid that is?  Do you not see how far that is from the teachings of Martin Luther King?

review: I read positive reviews of the above cleaners but have had terrible experiences with them for two weeks. They are extremely expensive and did a rotten job on my laundry. Socks and underwear were everywhere, including in pillowcases! They told me the delivery man could take my next order but then when he came he kept me waiting 10 minutes and was impossible! Worst of all I came home three days in a row for a pick-up and Sky Blue cancelled every day! I had no clothes! The phone rings and rings at this cleaners and no one ever picks up! There are no apologies and the cleaner just wants your money. Luxury cleaners- what a joke! Pls spare yourself the stress!

review: I just moved  to Naples and me and my hubby were looking for a good bakery to have breakfast. review:

It would be great if they opened another location near Wesley Chapel! *wink*wink*

Ra√≠les they are. I love this particular store. Alway find help if I need it

review: Scott and his assistant Tate did tremendous work at my home. Scott is a strong communicator who was very easy to work with. It was much more complicated than I expected but Scott was able to come up with a solution quickly and made the room look brand new. I highly recommend Edge for their great performance.

review:
This small mom and pop is the best place to get your authentic Lao fix. I got raw beef larb (minced beef salad), gang keung nai (intestine soup), and papaya salad. 

The larb was perfectly seasoned-a good spice and some bitter iykyk. The soup was LOADED with all the goodies üòã. And the thum (papaya salad Lao style<‚Äîbc they have Thai style option too) was üî•üî•üî•. You know the saying, boh phet boh saap. 

Lastly, the service was great, timely, personable. The turn around time on my order was good since I stopped by during my lunch break. I found this place on a whim since another restaurant I usually go to was closed. Just yelped papaya salad and man I‚Äôm telling you, this is now my new spot!! I can‚Äôt wait to return to try out other items on their menu. 

Support small businesses. Support your Asian community. Try new things.
title: Authentic Lao Cuisine

review: Rick‚Äôs RV is a great service.  Rick is very prompt, professional and comes with his mobile service well prepared for the work he is doing!  He is reliable, friendly and outgoing and is knowledgeable RV repair and maintenance.  I am very pleased with his work and he works hard.  His prices are reasonable and he shares his service call and hourly amounts before the appointment is made.  I will use him again and recommend him without reservation.

review: On a golf trip with 20 guys, made reservations and ate here last night service and meals were great.  So good we came back tonight. The service from waitress was good.  The food was Horrible, Horrible!! Ordered halibut and it was a shriveled, dried piece of fish.  When requested the manager she never came out to our table. Substituted 3 small 2‚Äù pieces of perch dried up.  Extremely disappointed!! I have pictures to back up the review if interested.  Manager could have come and said they were out of halibut and asked to order something else . 2 of use ordered halibut and they were the same.  If you live or are visiting Oscoda I recommend not dining at Wilstes restuarnt!
title: Wilstes brew House, Oscoda, mi.

My truck is working awesome!!!

I recommend them 100%

review: No matter where I‚Äôm located at any given time, Yelp always makes finding great restaurants/shops super easy.  Little spots I would‚Äôve never known existed, are now some of my favorites thanks to Yelp and reviewers. The community gives it to you straight, so you know what to expect and in turn you can pass useful information to others. I‚Äôve been a using Yelp for years and will continue to use it. Thanks for all you do!
title: Great app. 1 of my top 3

review:
Oh, ok. Well. I keep it real. If it‚Äôs not obvious, well then you‚Äôre just a hater. Really, Yelp helps- me make decisions about where I spend my money! I am careful about he reviews I post- and I appreciate it when others leave thoughtful reviews as well. Thank you Yelp. Hopefully you can start a task force to weed out the 
‚Äú KARENS‚Äù - I‚Äôve been victim of them at my previous work places and it would be great if the haters could be researched and statistically kept from appearing.
title: I‚Äôm hilarious?

review: This place tried scamming me twice on prices. Literally drive to the next closest place and thank me later. I went in for a nail in my tire and they said I needed a brand new one for $115. Curious I drove to the next closest one that patched it for free and said that it was a tiny nail that was 0 issue. (Also you could find new tires for around $75) Next I needed help just changing my tire since I didn‚Äôt have a jack and they said it would be $35 for ‚Äútime and effort‚Äù THIS PLACE IS A LEGIT SCAM. I don‚Äôt write reviews but this place treated me so horrendously that this‚Äôll be my first. I wish I could give a negative review. If you ever shop here it‚Äôll be out of your laziness to just view other prices.
title: Literally go anywhere else!

review:
So excited to try out this new place for my birthday, and what a shock. Atmosphere, so so, ordered the salmon dinner, I received a salad with maybe 1 cup of greens, then came the main course.  It was one piece of salmon no bigger  than my palm, no bread, no rice, no potatoes.... nothing...just salmon.  So the salmon  ‚Äúdinner‚Äù is a tiny house salad and small piece of salmon.  Really?!?   So I thought well I have room for dessert.  All I can say was it was nothing short of gross.  It was a chocolate cake of some sort with a white blah middle.  It had been cut days before and stored in a cooler uncovered.  Tasted like the fridge.... horrible.
We have told all of our friends, we will never go back.  Could have done so much better elsewhere and for a LOT less money.
title: chef Lances

review: Not only do you get the variety of options for whatever you‚Äôre wanting but also multiple ratings to consider for your info and entertainment! I always love reading the problems with the ‚ÄúWorst Place Ever!‚Äù comments and wonder what they were expecting! Others give a more balanced view so in the end I get a realistic idea of the place plus the entertainment that paid advertising can‚Äôt replicate.
title: Great info, entertaining reviews !

review:
I highly recommend this dealership. They are customer centric, have quality cars and trucks, as well as a competent and professional service team.

Recently I purchased a clean low mileage Ford Ranger pickup at a fair price and received a satisfactory valuation on my trade in vehicle. The sales representative Travis was friendly and straight forward on the entire transaction. It was comfortable and painless throughout the process.

After delivery of the vehicle I noticed a couple of things that I requested they repair in the truck. Nothing was purposely neglected by them, but when I brought the two items to their attention they immediately corrected them without question. 

I have purchased many vehicles over the years being 72 years old and can honestly say this is the best outfit I have dealt with . As a matter of fact I have never felt compelled to write a recommendation for any dealership in all those years. They are deserving of it. Ron. Mount Vernon, Washington
title: Pacific Coast Auto Sales

review:
Sent flowers to a friend for her birthday. When they arrived, she immediately called me to tell me how beautiful they were. My friend has fabulous taste and is not easily impressed. She was IMPRESSED with their design. I was so happy that she was happy! 

I cannot thank them enough for their floral arrangement design. This is not your ‚Äútypical‚Äù florist. They choose orchids, hydrangeas, roses, and other stunning flowers that complimented the arrangement. If you want to send something special this is the go to florist in the NW burbs!
title: Stunning floral design

review: So, now all that‚Äôs required to ‚Äúcancel‚Äù a business is an accusation of an ‚Äúism‚Äù? Where‚Äôs your proof? Ah, you‚Äôre ‚Äúwoke‚Äù, you don‚Äôt need proof. Neither did the Nazis in 1938. That sounds rather racist and sexist to me, since the business you will label will likely be owned by someone of color and non-male. That would make Yelp both racist and sexist. And now that you will have to label your business as both racist and sexist, I have no choice but to ‚Äúcancel‚Äù you without proof, since you will be canceling businesses without any proof whatsoever. Live by the sword, die by the sword. Get woke, go broke. You have heard of the Constitution, right? Due process? Innocent until proven guilty? Sorry, I forgot, your ‚Äúwoke‚Äù.
title: I can‚Äôt use a racist sexist app

review: I was immediately and professionally received and checked in when I arrived.  I only had to wait about three minutes before the technician greeted me and escorted me to the exam room, introducing herself and verifying who I was and what procedure was to be performed.  She explained each step of the CT scan before conducting a step in the procedure and made sure I understood what was occurring.......very professional.  I would have no problem returning to this facility for additional procedures.
title: Great Service

review: We went to Brick works for dinner shortly after the grand opening in the Long Neck location.  The waitress was fine at first until we started asking questions regarding how one of the dinners was prepared.  We asked if the vegetables that came with the dinner had sugar in it.  Her response to us was ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt have time to know what is in every dish‚Äù.  It took her 20 minutes to bring back one beer.  We asked to speak with the manager, who she never brought back to our table, we had to ask another waitress to get the manager.  She was rude and unprofessional.  I have never had that type of experience with a waitress in all my life!! I would never go back to that place again.
title: Horrible service

review: We came in at 9:30 for walk in appt.‚Äôs. The store opened at 9. They could only do one of us because the other workers weren‚Äôt there yet. My daughter got her pedi started.  I waited about 10 minutes and then they were able to do my manicure. The pedi was perfect! Very relaxing and a great service! The manicure is the worst I‚Äôve ever had. Paint on my skin and cuticles, needed an extra coat on 4 of them, 1 nail was filed crookedly. I went back and asked for it to be fixed after I put on my glasses and could see the mess. It was better, but still messy. I was very disappointed with my manicure. But, my daughter was thrilled with her pedi.
title: Terrible manicure, terrific pedi

review: My family and I highly recommend Dos Kiwi Studios!! Our family has known Dane for years and he‚Äôs done many family events for us !! Dane is so friendly , professional and listens and delivers exactly want you want!! Loved how he was patient and helped entertain our little ones when we did the photo shoot and when we were in his studio ! Most of all we love his quality of work in his portraits! Thank you for helping us capture beautiful memories !!!
title: Love Dos Kiwis

review: Yelp is corrupt. They constantly take down valid comments about businesses criticizing what they did wrong and how they treated customers. All a business owner has to do is throw some money yelp‚Äôs way and yelp removes the comment even thought it was completely valid. Yelp silences voices and could care less about the people using their app. All they care about is money. I had a very close friend threatened and had racial slurs thrown at them by a manager at a fast food joint. When my friend posted their experience on yelp, they took it down within a day because the fast food joint is huge and threw some money Yelp‚Äôs way. What a disgraceful app. They should be ashamed of themselves
title: Greedy company

review:
I just had Patrick, from Pacific Plumbing and drain repair my leaking toilet. I‚Äôve had a leaking problem for some time and several different plumbers, from different companies, attempt to fix this problem. Other plumbers recognized the problem, but basically only put a band-aid on the problem. They did that because quite a bit of manual labor was required to properly fix the leak.
  Well, Patrick didn‚Äôt hesitate to do the right job, which required a lot of grinding and sweat equity. He explained everything that he did and actually put in some extra protection to be absolutely sure it wouldn‚Äôt leak again. 
  I highly recommend Pacific Plumbing and Drain. If you can, ask for Patrick! He is a very polite, conscientious person.

Thank you,
Eric Skjeie 
Forest Grove, OR
title: Excellent work and very conscientious plumber

review: Seriously, the BEST app! It‚Äôs one of four apps I literally use every single day. I live and work in Manhattan, and in addition to using it to find things (mostly restaurants/coffee), I often use it for navigation, I like how it always shows me my proximity to the spot I am heading to. The visuals are informative, from the photo‚Äôs of the places/food (and categorized inside/outside, etc), and it‚Äôs an easy app to navigate! Keep up the great work!!!
title: I can‚Äôt live without you YELP!!!

review:
I used to love Bay Haven in Cornish ME
Especially the prime rib dinner, however we ordered a to go dinner to share a few minutes down the road, it was disgusting. For the most part we could have had a better meal at Burger King . The meat was supposed to be med/rare more towards rarer side; it was grayish brown - it was a captains cut & mostly fat, grizzle & rather tough meat.  We were shocked. Altho the mini cup (@ 1/2 cup size) of coleslaw was 1/2 full was very delicious but the 1/2 baked potato was cold inside (very peppery) ... either there are new owners or management or their standards have dropped dramatically - this will be our last visit we will find another place with better food. $30! 
Sickened

Sent from my iPad
title: Terrible meal so disappointed

review:
We met Rosie back when she had a restaurant off San Jose. Her food is authentic and absolutely wonderful! When we walked in, she knew who we were from many years ago. It honestly felt like we had come home after a long absence. The cannoli cake was superb and our dinner was the BEST!!!!! We took a friend from Miami there and he said it was the best food he ever had! He has requested we go back when he comes to Jacksonville! If you want great food, you need to visit. 
Jason and Margaret
title: Rosalias

review: Certain elements of good Chinese food preparation are difficult to achieve and really stand out. This restaurant has this level of quality. Vegetables are done separately from their dishes and added preserving their individual flavor and crispness. Vegetable lo mein, beef and broccoli, General Tsao chicken are examples. Meat is also prepared separately before integration with sauces which in Chinese cooking can add the right texture and flavor.  The hot and sour soup is on a par with a higher end SF or NYC Chinese restaurant. Can only quote Billy Joel, ‚Äúman, what are they doin‚Äô here?‚Äù
title: Beyond Take Out

review: Alon(one of the staff) came to offer help right from the parking lot. My friend is handicap and we just needed somewhere to eat and relax before her next appointment. Alon opened the door and served our food while I was helping to sit my friend. The service was great, all the staff were good and Alon was awesome. I just want people to recognize an act of kindness given to my friend and I, not all KFCs are like this. Your store is outstanding! We are really grateful. THANK YOU!
title: Great service from Alon and the rest of the staff

review: My favorite steakhouse takes reservations, and to confirm I have to go to a URL they text me, which forces me to app store to download the app, even though it's already installed and even if it's open.  I end up having to call the restaurant to confirm because this pileware app won't do its job.  Yelp's website and service is great, but this stupid app is nothing but annoying.  They need to hire some competent developers to write them an app that actually does what it's supposed to do.  Or better still, if they want to use SMS to send me reminders, just give me the option to reply to the text to confirm and not even have to deal with this stupid app!!!
title: Love Yelp site but HATE this worthless app!!!!!

review: Scam Company!!! never once was told that they were out of network with my insurance. Spoke with someone from the company twice and was asked to submit insurance. Thought everything was good until a year later i get a bill in the mail for $7,000!!! I didn‚Äôt even know the amount or knew we were out of network until this came in the mail a year later!!!  Mind you had already spoken with two reps from there company months ago, who said everything should be good once insurance was submitted. Had i known it was going to be this much or be out of network with my insurance i would‚Äôve opted out of the testing or used another company.
title: I would give zero stars!!!

review: I have been living here for 10 months now. My husband and I relocated from NY. It has been absolutely delightful. I was so worried only having seen the property online but Ms Lisa Cummings assured me we would love it. My instinct told me to trust her she was so kind and polite with our many conversations. We are retired and Lakeside truly fits the bill for all our needs. It‚Äôs a beautiful property located near many stores and not far from I 20. We absolutely love it here.
title: Living At Lakeside At Arbor Place,Douglasville GA

review: I am a member and honestly wish I was not! Once they have your money they do not care anything about you! They butter you up and make you believe the world is full of rainbows‚Ä¶ I cannot even get a room calling two months ahead‚Ä¶ They change the rules From what you were told because ‚Äúit is subject to change without notice‚Äù. The sad thing is, they change the rules and do not notify any of the members by paper or email‚Ä¶ Then just tell you you should‚Äôve looked on the website to see if anything‚Äòs changed‚Ä¶ How sad ......They start taking things away from you... they will bold face lie to you !!! I love the Jockey Club for sure, but sapphire and Geoholiday are horrible!
title: STAY AWAY !!!

review: I don‚Äôt know what kind of people are rating businesses on yelp but these recommendations are not reliable whatsoever. These ‚Äúyelpers‚Äù who are so readily trusted by yelp are obviously sitting in their parent‚Äôs basement writing false reviews with no real job, no money, no life, and nothing better to do. Please start screening your trusted yelpers better because as it is now the app can not be trusted. Also, the app itself is hard to follow.  It‚Äôs often difficult to find the place we are looking for. You can be one letter off and get results in another state. Also it‚Äôs inconsistent. Sometimes businesses show up in search and sometimes they don‚Äôt. Don‚Äôt waste your time on this app.
title: Who writes this stuff?

review: I give you guys five stars because a lot of people trust most of the comments and reviews about the topic. I personally enjoy reading all comments because I can know if something important needs to be changed. what's going on in my city is very life changing and to me is important because from this I can learn that locals and people that want to enjoy there surroundings the right way have the freedom and right to judge poor business.
title: I care

review:
We lost all power on Saturday night after an fuse blew close to the outside meter on a Saturday night. The local power company determined it was a homeowner issue and recommended we find an electrician.  Saturday night we called David Electric and left a message ,  or expecting anything before Monday! Within minutes the owner returned our SOS call.  Gary, the service manager, arrived at our home early Sunday morning . He was cheerful, efficient and quickly repaired the complex problem. 
Nora Sarich
title: David Electric

review:
Was in this morning for a specific dog food and they were extremely helpful. I called first to make sure they had it. April answered and checked and offered to keep it in the front for me.
We also were looking for a certain treat and she was helpful finding it also. I go there at least once a month when I need to stock up. They are great!!! I recommend this place to anyone looking for any type of pet products.  Thanks.
title: Great store

review: This tour operator is worth every penny! This is a top notch organization. From the first book the follow up after the excursion. They take care of every detail and it‚Äôs luxurious. The vans are air conditioned and we were well fed and hydrated. They  don‚Äôt offer lead in prices and then have a bunch of hidden costs like many others! The guides are friendly and adjust to the interest of the groups. We learned so much about the area and I highly reccomend them.
title: Coba and Cenote Snorkeling

review: Worse experience ever!!! I went in today after seeing the play Waitress with about 12 women for a couple drinks at the bar when the girl in charge of seating Megan told us to move from our seats at the bar to accommodate 2 people that needed to sit when there was tables available for them. I never experienced anything like this before after sitting in a spot for about an hour, ordering drinks with our friends and we are also over 60!. I approached her and she she said ‚ÄúI am sorry ‚Äú. Totally unacceptable!! After spending mucho $$. We left to go somewhere else! What kind of customer service is that! You should revamp your front desk person. Poor customer service!
title: Mean fiddler

review:
Yelp gives false ratings based on only there recommended reviews. I have run a family business for 35 years and we take great pride in providing excellent costumer service. We have an A+ rating with the BBB and have been awarded many outstanding service awards. My company ratings on google, Facebook and Houzz are all 4.5+. 
Yelp wanted me to advertise with them and when I said I couldn‚Äôt afford it, my rating dropped overnight from a 4.8 to a 1.5. They hid ALL of my positive reviews at the bottom of the page under ‚Äúnot recommended‚Äù and didn‚Äôt count them anymore. I called them and they said it was the computers algorithm that decided to do this and there is nothing I can do about it.
title: Extortion!

review: I just read a review about how some people use yelp as an extortion tool. I believe that this can happen, but don‚Äôt you know all tools can be used for good or bad, and unless it is a machine gun, the use is usually good. You can‚Äôt blame yelp for people who misuse it, it is your responsibility to use it responsibly, and your brain is not advanced enough to filter the real from the bull then you shouldn‚Äôt be using it at all.
title: Unlike some users I think yelp serves a purpose

review: Because it‚Äôs your own opinion and your opinion does not dictate the world!! It‚Äôs a part of business and take the good bad and the ugly. But it doesn‚Äôt mean that people need to see is the negative right when they look up something because that‚Äôs one thing I‚Äôve noticed they could have 10 grade it experiences there in the one bad when they have to write a review about it And having a small business is hard work.
title: Barberlife

review: I got a new phone and had to login to my account again and couldn‚Äôt remember my password, my bad. I attempted to reset and when I tried to login to the app it did not work. Party. I was like maybe I misspelled my new password twice while resetting it, I‚Äôll try it again. I reset the password but this time allowed enabled the Face ID password memory while setting that password. Tried logging in again both typed and auto fill options did not work. I don‚Äôt want to link my account to Facebook or login through my email account. The app seems to oddly push these options. There‚Äôs got to be a better way to access my account.

review:
Now I don‚Äôt generally get my nails done on a Sunday, but today I just needed them done today.  It couldn‚Äôt wait until tomorrow,  I got to Vergis Sage Salon around 1pm.  When I got there it was a bit busy.  I almost left.  I should have left.  They just take everyone who walks through the door, whether or not they have technicians to take care of them.  I sat for 30 minutes before I was attended to.  All in all I was there over 2 1/2 hours for a pedicure and gel manicure.  3 different people worked on my nails.  Pedicure was fine.  I will never ever ever go back there.  
VERY POOR service.  People there are not very friendly.  I gave one star only because you have to give a star to complete review
title: Cheryl

review: I like reading others reviews.  Being in the food business it lets me know how customers react to their food experience.  Read reviews instead of going by the star rating.  Remember we all have bad days and most people are more likely to talk about their bad experiences than there good ones.  So if it has a low rating due to service I will always go, remember we all have bad days.  Make sure to review the great experiences too.
title: Very helpful

review: I have been with Dr Vijay Patel since early 1980s and would never go anywhere else.  He is the best painless dentist I know.  Just had a root canal done by him and by Dr. Steve.  Even with all the infection I never was in pain for a single minute.  They are so human.  They care about person not how much they can pay.  I know that they constantly upgrade their knowledge with training and learning.  I will never go anywhere else.  When you have the best why to change!
title: Claremont dental institute

review: Have been going to casino & grille for many years. As menu has expanded food has gotten progressively worse. Servers are wonderful, but no matter what we order it‚Äôs terrible. For 6 months , I had 7 free meals a week, could barely eat there once a week . Was spending lots of money in casino, all service people there are fantastic, but when something simple tastes like it came out of the microwave, it is time for a break. Since there are no comment cards,etc. maybe someone will read this. It makes me sad that I can‚Äôt get the simple food we like tasting good since this is the only local casino we like to play at. Tim,hope you  read this review .  Carol ‚òòÔ∏è #8863
title: Emerald island grille

review: If you ever wanna venture out but are worried the reward may not be worth the risk (like eating at an expensive restaurant but not knowing if you‚Äôd like any of the boujie stuff and don‚Äôt wanna spend the money or going horseback riding and not knowing what to expect). Yelpers always give you a bit of insight as to what to expect or how their experience was. Highly recommend yelp, your insight and experience can help others too. I know I appreciate being a bit prepared :)
title: Need help? Go to Yelp!

review: Went here for a bachelorette party and we were told we could not be seated at regular tables for our group of 18. We were required to do a family style menu. Ok, fine. However, when we got there we were literally served one TINY slice of beef per person. I‚Äôm talking like 1/100th of an inch thin...as thin as they can slice it. And one chicken breast per 6 people plus three small dishes of pasta for all of us to share. I don‚Äôt know how that is worth $40/person, but even after complaining, we were only given one extra dish of pasta. It was overall very disappointing and I DO NOT recommend coming here in a large group. You‚Äôll leave hungry and disappointed.
title: Not enough food for large groups

review:
Went midday on a Thursday so no wait. Simple order of chicken tenders & fries plus a lobster roll and two soft drinks.
First the girl tried to charge me $53. When I complained she kept trying to figure out what went wrong.
Finally it became $32  because the lobster roll was $20 incl. tax.
Unfortunately, in my opinion, it was over priced for a salad of shredded  lobster meat. If there was supposed to be chunks of claw and knuckle meat it was hidden beneath all the body and leg meat. Too much mayo ( required to bind all these bits together I assume ).
I‚Äôve had lobster rolls from Maine to Amagansett, NY ,and so I know the good and great from imitations.
title: Boondocks can be better.

review: At the pig n whiskey in ferndale.. my first choice for awesome bbq is woodpile. I got there early, about 11 so burnt ends had about 15 mins left before done. I told them I would be back, then,  Oh boy, sugar was low nd I needed food. I made the mistake of my life nd went to Detroit BBQ next to them. Got the (yesterday‚Äôs) burnt ends. So tough and dry that I couldn‚Äôt even put a fork in them without it breaking!  Long story short , I tossed them nd went back to WOODPILE for the ribs nd burnt ends‚Äî so deeeeelish. Don‚Äôt waste ur time at Detroit BBQ.
title: Off the hook

review: I visited this bookstore on Sunday July 16th,  and walked in to hear a speaker very loudly bashing evangelicals with very broad strokes.  He said they don‚Äôt go to independent bookstores,  aren‚Äôt interested in rational dialogue, that they hold to such a legalistic view of right and wrong they can‚Äôt discern right from wrong,  and that they are letting nostalgia get in the way of progress.  There probably are people who fit this description.  I am an evangelical and I‚Äôm none of those things.  I don‚Äôt identify with the Republican Party (what!!!??),  and I was really offended by this speaker‚Äôs innacuracy and blatant negative stereotyping.  His speech did nothing but cause division and hate.   I was sad to discover Quail Ridge bookstore promoting this speaker.
title: Supports inaccurate authors with hateful speech

review: I love writing about my experiences as I travel around the country. I have to eat everyday, so I might as well write about the many flavors of the world I encounter on a daily basis. I also like to see what other people have to say about restraint want to try. There is nothing like getting a good recommendation and then going to try out that restaurant. The good reviews are pretty much spot on. That is what I like about yelp. You are reading honest reviews from real people.
title: Great app

review: Our good friend took a new job and was having an open house. We ordered flowers from Carruthers in Marietta, Georgia for this occasion. We were offered three different prices which were dependent on the size of the arrangement that we chose. We chose the largest which was $149 before taxes and delivery fees. We attended the event and this was what we got! We were expecting something at least twice the size! We could not believe how small the arrangement was! I would hate to see what their smallest size looks like! I would not recommend ordering flowers from this florist.
title: Beautiful but very SMALL

review: Arrived 15 min prior to closing. Pulled up front and spent 5 min gathering bottles. At 10 min went to recycle machine and was told he had to go to lunch. There was nothing polite or professional about this male who works on Saturdays at Vons in Marron road. If the place shuts down at12:50 and not 1:00 it should be advertised as such. As I walked away the worker opened the door to the can recycling machine and literally pushed me out of the way.  It doesn‚Äôt take much to be professional and courteous. If you hate your job or other people are rude don‚Äôt take it out on your patrons. This was my first attempt to use this facility. It is the last.  The less work this employee has to do I‚Äôm sure he will be happier. Find new employees.
title: Rude Lazy

review: I had them install a very expensive navigation system in my boat . They were paid in full , even though there was setup of the auto pilot left to be done . It could not be done the day they finished the installation because it was blowing 15 knots. And the instructions say calm seas for set up.  It was agreed they would come back in the spring and finish . I have called them three times, and the owner says he has no time to come out a half hour drive and do it . He told me to take a hour and a half run into Shinnecock canal and he would do it . Great service. You have my money now I have to chase you. I would never use them again for anything. Word to the wise
title: Shinnecock electronics

review: Before I decide to do business with a company I check them out on Yelp. I try to help others by reviewing those businesses that were an exceptionally good or exceptionally bad experience for me. For example there are a lot of restaurants. Why bother to go to one that will probably disappoint you? Life‚Äôs to short to deal with bad businesses or rude people. If you use the app you should pay it forward by adding your reviews also.
title: Yelp is my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù app

review: It‚Äôs a fun way to rate and get to know your community. As a Life philosophy tho it‚Äôs better to complement rather than complain. Remember people have bad days sometimes, it happens! If you have something bad to say about a business why don‚Äôt you tell the business and be reasonable about it. Being critical does it make you great. Being encouraging or critical is the lens that you chose to see life through and it will echo through every facet of your life.
title: Right on

review: In order to read comments posted online, searchers MUST agree to be sent to the app, which, mysteriously, is NEVER open. Instead, you have to go to the Apple App site, select ‚ÄúOpen,‚Äù and then the YELP app opens to a generic page that beats NO relationship to your search, much less the comment you were intent on reading in the first page. The only other internet presence more annoying is the ubiquitous Pinterest, which does the same thing (and worse). YELP shows up pretty high on most searches, so the ordeal is frequent. Lately, I just skip checking YELP, cause I just don‚Äôt have space left in my psyche to devote to being annoyed. Politics has filled up my daily quota.
title: Unresponsive

review:
I‚Äôm in the military and move around all the time. Yelp is my go-to app when I‚Äôm in a new area and want to know good places to eat. Honestly, I use it in my home town every time my wife asks where I want to eat. It is a good app to filter out all the one star places in any town. I use it for many other things other than food too. 
Although there may be bugs, I have not experienced any software issues. 
User for 5+ years.
title: Satisfied Military User

review:
I am not a business owner but i am a business owner 's daughter.  We never used internet for our business. Somehow I found yelp let people to write comments without our permission. We didn't register yelp how yelp let people to write comment.  Sometimes business owner made mistakes. Same time customer made mistakes too.   Some angry customer can't understand no matter how business owner explain about issues. That's how some aggressive customer write bad comments with hate. These bad comments effects on business and some people think everyday had issued on business. 

*** I didn't register yelp and I didn't give permission to let customer write comments!!!
title: About business review

review:
Yelp is great. As it is today most essential app. Wish it was invented when I was in college 15 years ago lol. 

But I have been getting this problem. When I browse through the pictures, when it goes back, always start from the top. Some restaurants have 2-3 thousands photos, it does get really super annoying. It wasn‚Äôt like this before. I don‚Äôt know if the developer would see this. But please!!! Fix this!!!
title: Great but please fix...

review: It‚Äôs pretty good putting a review on here of some of the restaurants that we go to some of us are not food critics  but we want to get our moneys worth so why not be able to put something on here so that we can be able to let other people know how good the food is The atmosphere the people, the hostess the bartender every little thing so that we know where to spend our money
title: Personal review

review:
Why does it seem like people can easily leave a bad review as opposed to leaving a good review and it sticking as a recommended review. 
This is how yelp makes money of your business. But Yelp is such a huge force in business they take advantage of it. 
Anytime you call to find out why your review did not stick, they will never be transparent as to why or why not a review shows up as a recommended review. They ambiguously tell you it's the programming but we really don't know.... 
a transparent business would give you a different and helpful answer. On top of that , try finding a phone number to Yelp or anyone that has anything good to say about getting issues resolved.
title: Not transparent

review: Jaidyn and Neal both helped me in the appliance section several times during the last couple of months for purchases for our remodel.  Both were so helpful and knowledgeable and I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews but they both were so well deserving. They are definitely assets to Home Depot when it‚Äôs difficult to find good customer service these days!!!
title: Wonderful Customer Care

review: Met some friends at True Foods because the food meets our dietary needs plus it has been good ‚Ä¶ IN THE PAST! The food was poor and 2 of the meals were sent back because the fish and chicken were ice cold. The AncientbGrain bowl was super spicy! My vegetarian burger was loaded with salt and burnt! Besides Luke warm. The squash pie excellent. Our server was gracious. But the kitchen is off its mark. So sad because this use to be the go to place for use who care about what we eat. Should have gotten the hint that something was off because at 6:30pm on a Sunday the place was dead. Gave 2 stars because of the help.
title: What has happened!

review:
You know how ‚ÄúGoogle knows all‚Äù?  Well, Yelp knows all about places to go eat, see, visit, peruse, learn & love. 

If you‚Äôre like me - LOVE food, can be rather picky (trust me, my family isn‚Äôt too happy about it), not totally afraid to try new things/places, but have my preferences/staples, are indecisive about WHAT to eat (my family isn‚Äôt happy about that either) -, USE YELP TO YOUR ADVANTAGE. 

It‚Äôs the prime Co-Pilot of the ‚ÄúFood Airlines.‚Äù It‚Äôll be VERY helpful.
title: The Google of food

review: As a small women owned business, who had to file a police report for a male harassing her and part of that report was false reviews on my business Yelp page- that Yelp did not fully remove. Yelp emailed me and told me that customers are allowed to write reviews under false identities, and they will leave those reviews up even with zero proof of interaction with the actual business. Meanwhile, Yelp will also call you monthly to convince you to pay for advertising. So they take your money and leave up false negative reviews while deleting real ones from clients who actually interact with you. Awful company.
title: Women owned business

review:
I love working here and knowing I‚Äôm able to help any child of God ! We have patients that are 6 months old to 102 years old . I appreciate the fact we don‚Äôt say no to the hardest cases we say YES and try our best to help that person and their family live the best life possible from home and not the hospital or nursing home ! 
The lord really laid our path out for us & I'm thankful for that everyday !
title: Best agency in SC for in home health care

review: We came here for Father‚Äôs Day with a group of 7, it was nothing short of fantastic. Ordered different dishes & all of them to perfection. The short rib is unbelievable on a bed of  vegetables that they slice very thin and it‚Äôs just perfect fall off the bone. The seafood medley and scallop entree to die for! Appetizer buratta salad was a work of art! Actually all the dishes were. No idea who this chef is but watch for big things here
title: If there was a 10 star I would give it

review:
Today we took four bags of both men‚Äôs and women‚Äôs merchandise which many were designer labels such as guess, Calvin Klein, Levi, not your daughters jeans, Hudson jeans, under armor, etc
We waited an hour and a half‚Ä¶ and we were told nothing works for us. Many of these items still had tags on them and we‚Äôre never worn. maybe they should get new buyers in their stores that know a little bit about fashion. We were shocked that they could not find one piece after shopping in the store and seeing what they had on their racks. would definitely not recommend taking your items to their store for resale.
title: Uptown cheapskate, consignment stores

review:
I started using Yelp way back in 2007. 
I use the platform all the time made several reviews and four years later I became an ‚Äúelite yelper.‚Äù And then a few short years later, the rules changed or somebody changed within the company of Yelp and I was told my reviews were too biased so I was kicked from the elite status.
I no longer use this app and have transferred all of my reviews to Google or TripAdvisor.
 
**As I said, it‚Äôs an OK app but it‚Äôs not an app. I rely on anymore like I used to 10 years ago.
title: It‚Äôs an all right app

review: My 1st grandson was being baptized & we wanted to gift him his fathers gold baby ring that I have kept for over 30yrs. Needless to say it needed a little TLC-I was pressed for time but Brian understood how sentimental it was for us to have in time.  He got it done that same day & made it look brand new. I‚Äôve been a customer with your family for over 30yrs & will continue to bring You my business-You're the Best!!!
title: Heirloom Baby Ring

review:
2-3x per year diners at Osteria... my wife and I have previously been accustomed to a slightly chilly dining room, but tonight's rainy wintery evening was an absolute delight.  Huge yacht parked just outside the window was lovely to view... capturing our imagination of being at sea.

Our waiter was terrific... "invisible service" when we were enjoying our conversation, but "there when you need him" when we were ready for more.

A Kendall Jackson chard and the Pear Martini got us started off nicely, along with the Clam Chowder and a Lentil soup.

On the specials list... Scallops with Truffle Spinach on Ravioli... was our selection.  Every bite was delicious.  

Finishing up with the cheese cake and coffee ended our supremely delightful meal.

We highly recommend this quiet, spacious restaurant near the Monterey Coast Guard pier.
title: Osteria Al Mare

review: It was really easy to book an appointment online. I have seen their commercials for many months and been saving for the implant dentures. I even got a Saturday appointment.  I‚Äôve been calling now for a week trying to get questions answered about consult fee if any among other things. They never call back. I tried to do their chat but it disconnects every time. I‚Äôve called 4 different numbers they list on the website.  I‚Äôm surprised with such poor service. This is an out of pocket expense for thousands of dollars. I guess my money isn‚Äôt green enough for them. Dont bother with this company at least not this location.
title: Aspen Dental Fairfield

review: Called to see if they had any canes available and was told they had 2 both metal at $7.99 each . After sending someone to walk over and get one before closing there wasn‚Äôt any canes to be found . The cashier that answered the phone as well as another female employee didn‚Äôt say that they had just sold 2. I should have suspected something was wrong since the cashier immediately told me they had 2 and knew the price . They need to know what poor customer service they are giving, even at a 2nd hand store.. and that they staff it with work release people or developmentally disabled people
title: Very poor service

review: I had fallen and hurt my back with severe bruising. The normal chiropractor hours did not fit my schedule. The joint was open on the weekend so I went for a session. After a quick questionnaire I was brought back to the chiropractor. He discussed with me each step of the therapy as he worked and told me why. I left feelings that they understood my problems and knew how to help me. I‚Äôll return next week.
title: Fantastic Session

review:
I had dinner at Piattis yesterday! My daughter thought that would be fun! I ordered chicken Marsala and my daughter ordered petro sole 
For dinner. When our meal was served we both got the fish dinner! After about 19 minutes the server came by and I told him I ordered the chicken  and  received the fish! He apologized and said nthe kitchen got it wrong!? My daughter said it was ok but I said it‚Äôs not ok! The server should have brought me my chicken Marsala!  He did nothing but told me my bill had the chicken Marsala price ! I am so frustrated all I ask is to credit me my chicken Marsala
I love your restaurant but would hate for you to lose customers over a $30!meal! It‚Äôs just the point!
title: Dinner

review:
My husband and I went to Shari‚Äôs in Medford, OR.  It was a little late, the restaurant was very near where we were staying and very close to a Truck Stop. So we thought Shari‚Äôs would be a good place to grab a late dinner. 
The restaurant was not busy, but we had to wait a few moments to be seated. Once seated, service was slow. 
My husband and I ordered one dinner as neither of us wanted to eat a big meal. I eat very small meals due to health and dietary needs. 
We ordered the Lemon Chicken Dinner. 
Our piece of chicken was so small, no bigger than 3‚Äù square and the meat was over cooked, tough and had a quarter inch membrane across one side of the piece of chicken that was completely not edible! The mashed potatoes was the smallest little ice cream scoop of potatoes I have ever seen served at a restaurant. The broccoli and the roll we‚Äôre the only real edible and properly portioned parts of the meal. 
My husband and I will never eat at a Ashanti‚Äôs again. This really was the absolute worst meal we have had in our extensive travels.
title: Worst meal Ever

review: I called several junk removal places for pricing and availability and Junk Tigers Hauling turned out to have the best pricing. The 2 guys that came to clear out our rental condo unit and garage were on time, super friendly, and very fast. They moved a few things from the condo to the garage that my wife wanted to keep and we move to our house. Joe is the owner and he guarantees the best prices. You can‚Äôt go wrong with Junk Tigers Hauling!
title: Junk Tigers Hauling

review:
Do you have a business?  Well guess what if you have a yelp business listing you‚Äôll have zero control of it. You can even display your business logo without having to pay for it. Yelp is 1000% all about the money. Untrustworthy reviews and horrible customer service. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend using Yelp for any business marketing what so ever. 
And if you have a negative review that‚Äôs a total lie. Good luck getting it taken down from your business profile.
No issues with Google. Deleting the Yelp app now and won‚Äôt be looking back.
But I may come back and make sure they leave this review up.
title: Wouldn‚Äôt recommend

review:
I can‚Äôt imagine why anyone uses Yelp. Their recommendations are nonsense, they‚Äôre constantly trying to steer you toward irrelevant results, and the reviews are more often than not written by people who don‚Äôt know what they‚Äôre talking about. Plus, the information is just plain wrong (I know for a fact the closest Vietnamese restaurant to me is not 3.7 miles away because I can see it when I walk out my front door). Yelp was great and useful a decade ago. Now they‚Äôre just old and in the way. 

Update: After I posted this review, Yelp sent me a link to get further assistance. Thanks, Yelp, but I‚Äôm good. Fix you app. Then I‚Äôll update my review.
title: The Worst

review: My husband and I decided to try this place cause it‚Äôs so close to our home, and we regret coming. Our order  consists of Carne asada and camarones for my husband and a combination plate of chili relleno and enchilada for myself. Right away the waitress came and said they were out of chili relleno so I ordered another enchilada. My enchiladas were not good, they were sweet and cold and the tortillas were hard. My beans were also cold and had meat in them rice was also cold and flavorless. My husband did not get carne asada that he ordered he received a chuleta that was 90% fat, his beans were gross tasted like soap our bill was over 60 dollars . So not worth it, we will not be back.
title: Not with what we payed.

review: I‚Äôm born in America, but worked in Trinidad and Tobago for 3 1/2 years as a missionary. I lived in Tuna Puna, Taqueria. El Dorado Village to be exact. I have to tell you I‚Äôve been to Numerous Roti Shops, and this one by far is the taste most similar to my friends in Trinidad. My curry Chicken with aloo and pumpkin had that right spicy kick to it. Also, the roti is those chucks and pieces of peas in it as it should be. This is my favorite. Let‚Äôs keep her in business. She does it right! Support! üëçüèºüáπüáπ

review: My son want to try new sandwich shop due to good reviews on Yelp. The lady said you have three choices of sandwich right now. We order the choice she give us and then she said let me ask if previous customers want to pick up her sandwiches. She then told us ‚Äúwe out of sandwiches because the customer still wanted her sandwich.‚Äù We came at 1pm. What kind of sandwich place sells out of sandwiches that early?

review: I contacted Mike‚Äôs Appliance Repair for help when nothing I pressed on my GE oven/range control panel worked. It was late in the day but he agreed to come by and take a look. He ordered the part needed and returned a few days later to complete the repair. I was late getting to the house but he graciously agreed to wait for me. I would highly recommend this company for any appliance repairs you made need, I know Mike has experience with all of them!!!

review: Great/shores to let others know just how service quality of food, and the business in general is bravo! I wish you was easier just to leave a review. Thank you yup so much for your services
title: Yelp

review:
I read the 1.5 star review and was skeptical about ordering and picking up my order however i was up for a challenge.  I was expecting two rude female workers and was pleasantly greeted by a young man who was easy to talk to and accommodating.  The entire process was great.  I ordered on line, picked up the completed order and went home.  Rest assured, perhaps these mean, rude females are long gone.  I picked up my order at 5:30pm fwy.

Carol
title: Pleasant experience

review: Went to Leo pizza in west palm what a awesome place friendly staff the pizza and Lasagna was great what a great value during these inflationary times.I travel as a sales rep I have pizza throughout the state and I enjoyed there pizza and lasagna flavors were good they really care about making there customer happy.I will be looking forward to my next visit.I recommend supporting this restaurant because we should support hard working caring people.
