review: We hadn‚Äôt been to Mama‚Äôs Country Kitchen for awhile and started coming back about a year ago.  We go about once a week and bring family members when they visit. We know we‚Äôll always get great service & good food. The lemon rice soup is authentic along with the Greek salad (my favorite) just like downtown Detroit area.   Also, a good variety of chicken, pork, meatloaf, burgers and fish. Breakfast is fantastic and the specials are good and include their good coffee.
title: Mama‚Äôs is my favorite

review: Went to have lunch there & was expecting everything to be better. Staff was very nice, but food was not good at all - I say this as a vegan of almost 15 years who has eaten at tens of different vegan restaurants. I really wanted to like this place since vegan restaurants are few & far between in these parts, but I won‚Äôt be back. We had 2 lunch specials, neither of them good, an appetizer (was so so), & a salad which was fresh & had good ingredients but the salad dressing was basically just oil of some sort & was not at all appetizing. Sad to say our overall experience was a big thumbs ‚¨áÔ∏è
title: Really disappointed

review: We have used YELP the world over. We are well travelled and use it as a reference to find good restaurants and 5 star businesses. We‚Äôve also used it to steer clear of businesses with crappy reviews.  It has been invaluable to us. I‚Äôve read that some reviews are business generated but I‚Äôm not sure how those get weeded out if at all.  Just go with the majority and hopefully you are successful.
title: Yelp is Invaluable

review:
My husband and I enjoyed a fun date night here. Ambiance was nice and quiet. I liked that there weren‚Äôt very many tables..it gave it a very low key vibe, and everyone was dressed very nice! 

Their martinis are some of the best I‚Äôve ever had! And their eggplant pomodoro was out of this world too. They make their own pasta in house and it tasted super fresh. Their eggplant was parmesan crusted and literally was so crunchy and delicious! Fried to perfection! 

I‚Äôm craving it again! Thanks Ninos!!
title: Date night at Ninos

review: I go there all the time because of the attention and respect these workers give us. They are knowledgeable and friendly. One day I went there to get my window screens redone ( we have a cat who likes to sharpen her claws on them) and they got them done in record time. They‚Äôve got a lot to look at and a lot to buy. Help keep this down town pinconning place going. These gems are hard to find!
title: Helpful workers

review: I am so very thankful for the amazing people at The Hair Tailor! They take such great care of me EVERY TIME! I love the customer service, attention to detail and pure talent that they all exhibit. I see Jenna Fossum, the owner, for my haircuts, highlights and recently added in a ‚ÄúMalibu‚Äù treatment, which I would absolutely recommend. I am happy to know that This hair of mine is completely taken care of! Thank you for all you do, and I‚Äôll see you soon!
title: The best place!

review: Signing up for my future medical plan involved a lot of reading and researching, which I thoroughly did. Once I read as much as there was available, I reached out for some expert advice and was connected with Carter over the phone. Polite, knowledgeable, explained each step and each selection flawlessly, and so easy to follow. I would definitely recommend Carter to others ~~~ already have!!
title: Call Carter!

review: The whole team at Console & Associates were amazing to work with. They were very professional, and responsive. They were able to help me clarify every step of the process and were able to get a very good outcome of my case. They couldn‚Äôt have done a better job. I definitely recommend them and would go back to them if i ever need them again in future.
title: dedication

review:
I have been taking my cars to Ewing‚Äôs for years. I am happy to take it to a business that treats me right - as a single woman , I can trust them to do good work , reasonable, and be honest with the repairs. 
One time in a snow storm , I had a dead battery at a shopping center and they came right away and fixed it . 
I recommend them in car repair to be honest , fair ,  professional, and reasonably cost. These guys Rock! Thank you!
title: Ewing‚Äôs towing Service

review:
What a gem of a coffee shop located along the river front in downtown Little Rock, AR!

I was visiting Little Rock on a work trip, and my engineering team finished up its field work ahead of schedule. 

I just wanted to chill for a bit and tidy up on some administrative tasks, so I set my eyes scanning for a local coffee shop, not expecting for much of a find, to be honest.

Boy was I wrong. I‚Äôm not much of a coffee connoisseur, but all I can say is that their coffee was perfect (at least for me).

The environment within the shop is equally amazing & inviting. It‚Äôs apparent that a lot of local creatives socialize here and retreat from life‚Äôs maladies in such a quiet & reflective, yet buzzing, atmosphere.

If you‚Äôre in downtown Little Rock, I highly recommend checking out Nexus Coffee üëç
title: Nexus Coffee & Creative (Downtown Little Rock, AR)

review:
Yelp has saved my family trouble of finding a place to eat while on vacation that the whole family would like.  

I‚Äôve just started to explore the service ratings.  Wonderful that it is al in one app.  I really like how some restaurants will allow you to place a reservation through the App.

If you don‚Äôt already have this App, get it!
title: Great App for viewing and leaving reviews!

review:
This is a great overall app when wanting a little more information on anything.  Love people post pictures and their experience.  We travel all over the United States and have children too.  We use this app almost always if their is a link to see if it‚Äôs kid friendly and to view pictures of the food and inside/outside of restaurants.
Great also for attractions, parks, beaches and anything else you can find on Mapquest.
title: Overall

review: I‚Äôve been a client for over a year now. Bayside is walking distance from my condo so very convenient but also the women and men who work at bayside are extremely kind and professional. I tend to make all of my appointments with Mimi but have had pedicures by other artists. Everyone is skilled and cleanly. I would recommend this nail spa to anyone. I have purchased gift certificates for family members and friends as well.
title: Love this nail salon

review: I love how unique all the topics and business ventures are organized and displayed for use of a search engine as well as a tool for finding out the best details of your future purchases and where to be spending your money with real people rating. I don‚Äôt have a false sense of direction from this browser, plus you can‚Äôt go wrong when it has a category for the best deserts in LA!!
title: First time user

review: Strong arming businesses to pay you, with bullying tactics using the reviews to force businesses to pay to change how we see those reviews. (Making even the worst business look good.) Fake internal reviews paid for by bad businesses to improve image. Guess what your reviews equal junk. AND If anyone from the public would like to join the farce or see full list of reviews you Must have invasive App! One day Yelp will have to change the name. Once the public knows that your reviews are edited and selectively placed to force good companies to hide bad reviews and make bad companies look good. They will realize Yelp is twisted.

review: Hansen's Hyundai had the car we were looking for and we felt fortunate to not only get the car we wanted but to also find a dealership with top notch customer service. We live in Kansas and located our car in Iowa one day and drove it home the next. Will and Jerry went above and beyond to make the process go smoothly. They provide great followup and I would highly recommend this dealership and their employees.

review:
Food and atmosphere are generally excellent    We come here because the patio is great.  On weekends there out side music.  It is usually nice and soft as the space is actually small.  Tonight, September 18 there is band playing that can rival the North Central band.   The sound is good but the volume is simply over whelming.   People all around us complaining.  I said something to the waiter and she spoke to the manager, the response. ‚ÄúI can move inside‚Äù
If this is the aditude of Sahms management I will not be back

review:
TERRIBLE SERVICE! 
I placed an order at 9 am for an arrangement to be delivered today to my sister in Indiana on the occasion of her husband‚Äôs death 1 year ago today. 
The order was accepted. I specified delivery for TODAY. They tacked on an additional $20 fee for same day delivery (thats on top of a delivery charge) even tho they advertise same day delivery. 
At 3:00 i got a call asking for me to call them because they had a question about the order. I could not understand the phone number by the person who left it. Finally found their number and after waiting about 10-15 min on line, i got a person. Found out that they wanted to ask if they could deliver it on Monday. ‚ÄúAbsolutely not!‚Äù
I asked for complete refund. That took another 15 min to get approved.
What I learned is that they pass the order on to a ‚Äúlocal‚Äù florist. What a scam!
Ava‚Äôs flowers is just a front that gets the customers interested with great deals but makes it up bogus charges and really poor service! 
Stick to small family owned business.
title: Ava‚Äôs Flowers

review: We had a problem with our Dyson vacuum cleaner and we went to the Dyson store in Tyson‚Äôs Corner to fix it. review:

It seems I paid more money for less oil here at Pep Boys, because my engine seized yesterday. There was very little oil in my engine, and NONE on the dipstick. There is no evidence of my car leaking oil. 
I should‚Äôve known when I experienced the unfriendly customer service, that this is not a trustworthy company. Employees are happy when they‚Äôre being treated well, and they believe they‚Äôre truly helping their customers. 
It will cost you a lot more in the long run if you allow Pep Boys to work on your car. My ONE visit might‚Äôve cost me my car.

review:
If I do a search for a business on google, some yelp reviews show up, which would be great, except :

A) ‚Äúrecommended ‚Äú reviews for unrelated businesses pop up after about two relevant reviews.  I‚Äôd like to see the reviews for the specific business I‚Äôm researching, thank you.

B) after a couple of lines, the reviews are cut off with a ‚Äúread more‚Äù link - I‚Äôm then asked I‚Äôd I want to open it in the yelp app.  This takes me to an ad for the yelp app (which I DO already have) and then back to the App Store.

C) if I click on the ‚Äúread more reviews‚Äù - Same thing.  At no point did it open the same business, let alone review, in the yelp app.

D) I finally went to the yelp app directly (I‚Äôm a glutton for punishment I guess) and it took me about 10 minutes to even find the business I was looking for, and again with the unrelated (sponsored) reviews all mixed in.

This app is useless, so frustrating, and a huge time waster (and not in a good way).
title: Yelp app makes everything so much more difficult than necessary!

review:
Stayed there for 5 days before Dorian Hurricane and over Labor Day weekend. There better restaurants were closed, leaving only David‚Äôs (a bar), the Bistro (same menu as room service), and small breakfast/ all day pizza etc place

The food was mediocre at best requiring us to go out for all of our major meals. But more critically , they upped the price for hotel rooms 3 times in one day prior to Labor Day when it was announced FL might get hit by the hurricane. 

I will never return there but also I would discourage anyone who needs to stay in Orlando to go to one of the Hyatt‚Äôs - much better food and a guarantee against price gouging

review: Yelp will allow fraudulent reviews that are full of lies to be recommended but will not recommend truthful reviews to add to the overall star rating. review: I‚Äôm an avid Yelper, and clicking through friends‚Äô pictures is a daily social media stop for me. after the most recent update, any photo uploads with more than two photos aren‚Äôt able to be opened. this is a huge bug, and I‚Äôve tried restarting my phone, closing down the app and restarting, as well as refreshing the activities feed multiple times without any changes. review: John Karnik pretends to be a 1031 expert but in fact he lacks even the basic understanding on 1031.  He used it as part of a sell to buy strategy involving 3 properties.  The effect was desteuction of my balance sheet (which happens when you sell assets) coupled with an incrase in debt -- a double whammy. review: Yelp only publicly displays paid reviews by family and friends for dentists and medical doctors. I left a lengthy honest review about a dentist who had caused me trauamatic injury due to his negligence, and the review was filtered so viewers or future patients are unable to see it. I also posted photos and ‚Äúreceipts‚Äù of the incident, but am told that Yelp ‚Äúautomatically‚Äù filtered my review. review: I have a business as well as I use Yelp when I go out of town what I can say about Yelp is that you are able to leave an honest review based on honest feelings and they do not sugarcoat nor do they protect your business due to loyalty. review: What a beautiful place to stay!  Very clean, well supplied with toiletries (hair dryer, curling iron, soaps, shampoos). We also had condiments!  The beach chairs, towels, snorkeling gear, and pool toys were a great convenience. The condo is in an excellent location with a beach, pool, and 2 restaurants within walking distance. We were also made aware by the owner‚Äôs guide on the best beaches, restaurants, and excursions to go on either day or night. All in all the best vacation spot I‚Äôve been to.

review:
Paid over $200 for a pric fixe dinner tonight at Indian Accent in NYC. Such a totally underwhelming experience. I have dined there prior to the pandemic and couldn‚Äôt wait to go back! What happened Chef Vikas Khanna?
The amuse bouche soup was tepid and the flavors of the coconut milk clashed with a tart ingredient I couldn‚Äôt put my finger on
The first course appetizer chaat spheres were good but could have used a little more of the peas
The second course pav bhaji had red chili powder that was way too much and more importantly raw - I had to request butter (which they didn‚Äôt have) but were nice enough to provide yogurt to temper the taste of the raw chili prefer
The main course I ordered the Arbi with veg nihari- had some uncooked/ dry rice
I passed on dessert as I didn‚Äôt want to be disappointed further
Sad as I really looked forward to going back
Trying Gupshup on Saturday
Will try to get into Bungalow - cannot get reservations
Hope I have better experiences there.
title: Deeply disappointed diner

review: I appreciate finding hot new eateries, good cuisine, and sharing it with friends and family. However, I think there are a-lot of reviews that are very negative and empty and some ratings are higher than the actual quality that I find in star reviews. If you like a place, post if not, you should keep the negative experience specifically o. what the place is known for not an emotional dumping ground.

review:
We were very impressed with the restaurant, staff and especially the delicious food.  The calamari appetizer was very delicious and presented well.  We shared a calzone that was so wonderful and tasty that I have to go back for more.  The crust was chewy but light and the cheese and meat that filled this heavenly pocket of dough was more than I could have ever imagined.  
It is definitely worth the drive from the North Hills and I plan on bringing my neighborhood lady friends with me.  üòç

Great App and I do not leave home without it!

review:

Being able to substantiate my claims reviews are sound.

For the record, you can‚Äôt silence this!

review: The Beaches Treatment Center is an excellent program with friendly, kind staff and a curriculum that is thoroughly focused on recovery. review: All staff members were wonderful!!  All people involved from office to all persons working in the home were patient, kind, informative, and ALL PROFESSIONAL IN WHAT JOB THEY PERFORMED! review: Yelp says...our trust is their top concern, so businesses can‚Äôt pay to alter or remove reviews. HOWEVER, they removed one of my reviews and sent an email about some kind of media attention! I received an email from them today stating one of my very honest reviews was just removed from their site bc it violated one of their criteria‚Äôs.  My very poor review of a complete tourist trap in Miami was from over 5 years ago!  5 years!!!   You‚Äôre telling me you just now stumbled upon this breach in your posting policy?

review:

  Prices are high & we get sick of a $47 meal. we will never return and I recommend you don‚Äôt either.

review: I love yelp! I use it whenever I don‚Äôt know where to eat, get drinks, or get desserts. Besides places to dine in, there‚Äôs places that you can go like dry cleaning places, pool places, and etc. I‚Äôd you have no idea where to eat because your new to the area or your just looking for something new, i recommend using yelp!

review: This laundromat is open 24/7 so it‚Äôs very convenient for business travelers. There is a staff person all the time to help if needed. It‚Äôs clean and it‚Äôs very lit up. I recommend this laundry mat. Also, if you‚Äôre thirsty, there are bars nearby on Calle Ocho! Win all around! üòéü§ôüèΩ

review:
I have been a user of yelp since launch, so I appreciate the app for its service. However, there are too many negatives that come with it for it to be useful. The app desperately needs the ability to provide negative feedback to other user reviews. Not doing so is creating an entitlement culture as well as inappropriate and often straight up incorrect facts being shared. I understand that they don‚Äôt want businesses downvoting negative comments but there are easy ways to figure out when that‚Äôs happening. 

Also the advertising has gotten out of hand. No longer can businesses naturally flourish on the app. Nowadays it requires adspace to be purchased directly from Yelp, and once they do they shove them down every users throats. 

Lastly, the search function is entirely broken. Searches for specific location names provide entirely useless results, with again promotes restaurants being shoved to the top. 

It‚Äôs been good yelp, but you are no longer what you once were. Goodbye.
title: Not good for the community

review: Went into this Pizzeria to order a takeaway Pizza and was pleasantly surprised. The owner engaged us in conversation and told us a little of his history. Then he gave us a sample of his Sausage and Lentil Soup which was excellent.  He also gave us a sample of his wings which were crispy and delicious.  They also specialize in Italian Beef. They have a nice variety on their menu. We were impressed. We took our Pizza home and enjoyed every bite. Definitely a place we will be returning to.

review: Went with another couple and two of us ordered the Seafood special which had a half of lobster. The dish started off well until we tried the Lobster and other shell fish. All was cold and still near frozen! The waiter brought it back, apologized and returned later with both my and my friends original lobster piece on ONE PLATE! Unbelievable.. the Manager came by and was useless... did nothing. The Manager had the managerial skills of a child. When we were leaving, 2 couples dining behind us had the same issues; frozen shell fish. Again the Manager did nothing. Vic and Angelo‚Äôs were once the best around. Sorry to say the Glory days are ling gone. They will be out of business soon

review: I was rear ended by a CVS employee driving a CVS small truck  on March 16, 2018.  My car was stopped in rush hour traffic.  Sedgwick/CVS paid for the damage to my car but only offered me a $100 CVS card for my pain and suffering.  This is so unfair.  On March 17, I was admitted to the hospital with lower back pain and congestive heart failure.  I was in the hospital for 12 days.  A doctor suggested that the accident may have been a flashpoint for the congestive heart failure but it was not in the medical report. What can I do?

There is a nice, eclectic group of people who frequent the restaurant. That helps to create a nice vibe. I would definitely stop by again in my travels.

review:
The optometrist rush through my exam for ‚Äúfloaters‚Äù in my eye.  I told them that dilation made me motion sick and sometimes gave me headaches.  But they told me I needed the dilation at least in one eye.   I got a brief, fast explanation of the floaters and handed a brochure. They told me on my return visit both eyes would need to be dilated (not sure why?). Later that day I got a bad headache on the side of the dilated eye. 

The next day I found another office that offered medical eye exams without dilation because they had more advanced equipment to do what needed to be done for a deeper exam!  

We all have many choices and do need to settle for poor experiences in medical offices!
title: Impersonal experience

review: Since I don‚Äôt trust advertising or so called ‚Äúrecommendations‚Äù within the advertising, since these can be selective. I look at Yelp to provide real honest evaluations of businesses. review:

review:
In a Covid ghosted Key West, I was delighted with the total experience of dining tonight at Bistro 245.  

Sitting waterside with the KeyWest sunset sinking into the sea, we not only got the unobstructed ocean view, but an amazing meal, complimented by the excellent  service from Emily, our server.  

3 of us shared the saut√©ed crab cakes appetizer with an aioli sauce.  Superb! Moist and meaty.

The fresh snapper was the best I‚Äôve tasted,  prepared with a light sauce, pan baked potatoes and broccoli.  From the first mouth watering bite, I savored every bite getting sadder knowing each bite drew me towards my last.  I did not want this meal to end.  

My friends both had Mahi  served in a light creamy caper sauce.  Perfectly cooked flaky Mahi was served on top a  Gruyere Mac and cheese stack with crispy asparagus.  

Do yourself a favor and make sure you‚Äôre not in a rush.  Savor every bite along with the ambiance of the Key West sunset.
title: Fabulous.

review:
The issue seems to have resolved itself.

Original:

I opened an account to leave a simple review for a local business which did a great job. 

Yelp asked me to confirm my email upon creating my account. When I click the ‚Äúconfirm email‚Äù link in the email, it opens the yelp app and resends the email, but does not confirm my email. This is reproducible (6 times so far) and there seems to be no way around it.

Separately, I would recommend having a support team linked on either the website or in the app so that others do not need to leave a review like this in the future.

review:
I reviewed a business. I was less than satisfied and received a comment from the owner. I still needed time to consider. A few days later I get an email from Yelp that they‚Äôre trying to remove my review. I go to look, and they already have removed it and I am unable to speak with the business about having the matter resolved. 

So Yelp has no problem removing reviews, I‚Äôve heard this but I‚Äôm actually seeing it. 

It‚Äôs too bad. Instead of allowing the chance for a consumer and business to communicate, the business will continue to affect other uninformed consumers. 

Now my review of the business will be posted somewhere else, along with their insistence on removing poor reviews. Yelp has hurt themselves and the business in question. 

Let‚Äôs see if Yelp can get Apple to do the same.

And I see why Yelp app has high reviews. For some reason Apple allows Yelp reviews of businesses to post as high star ratings of this Yelp app. Just scroll down, you‚Äôll see it.
title: Inserting themselves

review:
In my life I seek out things that are special. Special people, experiences or moments. Tonight, at LongDrop Cider I found something completely special and unexpected. 

I came in and asked,‚Äù Eo you have a beer?‚Äù Carissa says,‚Äùyes, but I‚Äôll talk you out of it.‚Äù She smiles and began asking me questions about my taste preference. 

We settled on one and it was amazing. I‚Äôd never had cider before, and to be honest, I doubt I would have discovered its sweet and complicated flavors without the intensely passionate presentation that Carissa gave me. 

LongDrop Cider is family-owned and operates right here in Boise. It‚Äôs an Idaho family building a legacy. Filled with long hours and moments of uncertainty, this beautiful American business is an amazing example of the best of Boise. 

Thank you for making my evening so enjoyable. I‚Äôll be back soon.

review:

Point is, either you open at 4:30 or not, if you can't open when you say you do, don't have an attitude when someone ask if you're open. You are dragging down your own business or someone else's with your negative attitude. Use this as your wake-up call to change and do better or do something else. Get it together Mr. Bad Attitude. review:

I‚Äôm so sick of these tech companies thinking they know better than all of us. You don‚Äôt. Your role is highly replaceable. You will change and start working for us or you will go the way of the Dino‚Äôs. Stay neutral on these topics or you won‚Äôt be allowed on my phone.

review:

The quesadilla as well was empty and just a grilled tortilla shell hard as cardboard and over cocked . The onion rings were mushy. I could not eat more than the one that was bit into. Boom boom boneless wings were tasty, which account for 1 of my 2 stars.  
The restaurant was quite empty so not having the order to satisfaction was very dissatisfying.

review:

review:

‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want Italian‚Äù

review: Dumpster did not get delivered. After several phone calls and after being put on hold each time we finally were told Budget Dumpster‚Äôs are a brokerage. review: I stepped into Sally‚Äôs today. I purchased 2 small items but I was shocked when they told me a small bag would be 15 cents and asked if I wanted one. I asked if they had any free bags but I was told ‚Äúno.‚Äù  If they raised their prices a few pennies to cover a bag, no one would be the wiser. The price was not that much but it is the principal of the matter. I know that Aldi does not furnish bags but their prices reflect a discount price that more than covers the inconvenience of bringing your own bag. Whoever had the great idea to charge for a bag to carry your purchases in at a store that is not a discount store could not have thought it through.

review: Since I didn‚Äôt plan on using Yelp by paying the yearly membership. From my understanding if you pay for the yearly membership they will keep the positive, but if you don‚Äôt pay they will hide the new positive reviews and keep the negative reviews.  This shows what Yelp is all about. And I will never use Yelp and I recommend that everyone stays away as well. Word of mouth.

review: I only use yelp when going out to eat and trying to find a great experience rather it‚Äôs a night out with the husband or girls night out or brunch with my favorite daughters are use so look for new and exciting adventures and it never disappoints I love the idea that real people are creating reviews based off their experience and it helps me decide if it‚Äôs worth the risk... or just part of a adventure.. it has not steered me wrong yet.

review: It‚Äôs 2020, and otherwise smart people have forgotten that it‚Äôs wrong and discriminatory to single out anyone based on race. I wish to embody MLK Jr‚Äôs maxim that all would be judged by the quality of their character‚Äîand not the color of their skin‚Äîbut Yelp is pushing the option to selectively search for and patronize businesses whose owners happen to be ethnically black. I love my black neighbors, black friends, and black business owners, not because of their race, but because of the value they each contribute to our shared communities. Yelp has knee-jerked to single-out certain businesses for preferential treatment, which is fundamentally wrong. I will no longer partake of their platform.
title: Discriminatory Enabler - deleting Yelp

review:

The finance department sold me a service when I signed my lease for $20/month for 39 months that grants me a full change of breaks when needed.

review:
No one should take the app seriously. Tons of people on this platform put themselves on a pedestal and act as if they are the voice of reason for businesses. This platform gives many unreasonable people a voice, and they choose to slander businesses based on their establishment's ability to bend rules for them, and not based on merit.

If anyone wants to know what the "common man" believes, just go on the Google Maps reviews. This platform has become obsolete because of Google, and in this case, I can't be happier.

The two stars goes towards the people monitoring the platform because of their unwillingness to help businesses eliminate inaccurate reviews, and because the app itself is incredibly clunky and crammed. The search option is also buggy, but that's not much of a big deal compared to the UI

tdlr; this platform is filled with pretentious "reviewers" and anything in this platform should be taken with a grain of salt
title: Platform is awful

review:
Yelp has been my go to app for finding new places to try all over. I have been using it for years. It‚Äôs fun to see what people share about businesses. I usually use it to find restaurants, bars and breweries. 

If you want an app that helps you track down new places to try and gives you the opportunity to give and read feedback, you should definitely download the app.

review:
Yelp is so easy to use and crazy helpful to find anything you need! 
I mostly use this for adventurous date ideas (i found Smash Therapy on this app) and restaurants. I love the feature where I can redo a search on the maps and newer results will populate based on that area! (hope that makes sense)
Besides activities, I found a great place to get my glasses which was super useful :-)
this is a great app and i highly recommend!

review:

It was unfortunate when they began to allow business to buy their ratings but I can also understand the abuse and cattiness of people falsely rating their competition. If you are diligent and read the reviews and make sure they sound legit, you can avoid being duped into selecting a mediocre business that bought their 5 stars. 

In alternate, give the lesser stars a chance too ! Read the reviews and find the gems

review: It‚Äôs relatively easy for a search engine to find the specific information and location of what I‚Äôm looking for, but yelp for whatever reason (advertising dollars) directs me to other locations sometimes including what I‚Äôm searching for but mostly pushing me where I don‚Äôt care to go. Yelp makes it hard to do something so easy. I would use this app much more if it would do what I wanted it to do rather then what the algorithm that directs me to an advertisers website wanted me to do. Strange concept for an app on your phone to do what you want it to do. So for me yelp gets 2 stars.
title: Give me what I‚Äôm searching for....

review: I‚Äôm a big Mac‚Äôs Speed Shop fan. The food is great and NORMALLY, the service is good as well. However, the Matthews location has some serious issues.  Tonight they were hardly crowded and we had to hail our server for beverages, they got the drink order wrong, and when I asked for a cold glass for my beer, the response was,‚Äùdo you know how hard it is to get a cold glass. Really?   Bartender was not a happy camper and processed her tickets with a lack of enthusiasm I‚Äôve never experienced at Mac‚Äôs.  Never cleared the table until we asked, and if we didn‚Äôt ask, we didn‚Äôt receive.  I‚Äôve owned a restaurant, so I have a different outlook on service, but this was sad.
title: Big Mac‚Äôs fan, but Matthews has issues

review:
Ducked in with our family of 4, warm welcome & friendly. Our food arrived & our simple fare of burger, salad, BLT, & penne a la vodka arrived & each dish was perfect! BLT had the right crunch & balanced with l & t, & a $2 upgrade to a delicious side salad. Burger & fries equally good, & the pasta made a trip around the table-& everyone enjoyed.
Don‚Äôt be surprised by the low key decor, but embrace the friendly staff & the taste of the food! Great job Carlos (kitchen!) & Diana our server! We‚Äôre adding 5th & Mad to our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù list!
title: Delicious, low key, & friendly

review: Yelp is widely known for their borderline mob-like business practices, so it came as no surprise when I realized I would have to download the app to do something as simple as confirming a reservation. Similar to their policy of forcing you to download the app to look at recommendations, this constitutes a serious breach of ethics. Under no circumstances is it worth it to download this app. The data they glean from even passive usage of this app is worth more than what you, the user, gains. Please believe me when I say that any urge you have to install this app is tantamount to a trap. If for some reason you need to download the app, do what I am doing now and delete it immediately after.
title: Shady company, shady app

review: John Jenkins the owner/manager and Dave ‚ÄúBulldog‚Äù Waters his sales manager were very honest, straightforward and professional and won my business to buy a Honda motorcycle from them! I would say compared to other motorsports dealerships in the greater Phoenix area, this shop in Anthem AZ, is the best. I highly recommend them to anyone wishing to buy a new toy! Thanks John and Dave, I will see you guys often to get my bike serviced at your dealership. You have a loyal customer!
title: Best Motorsports dealership to do business with!

review:
I have had a company on here for now about six months I have been getting reviews but send the people that are leaving the reviews are not active as much as yelp would like them to be so they will not post to my page. This is a joke how am I suppose to get my business to grow on here. Yes some propel are new to yelp but one of my reviews the lady is plenty active. 

I have another business one here for many years and will be removing and going to a better app and website! I‚Äôm sure that yelp will pull this down as they want to. Cause they only want people to see what they want! I would much rather have it be real than a front that they make
title: Reviews

review: Yelp reviews are biased. Hey them more than 300 a month and you‚Äôll get all good reviews. Refuse to pay and they will mess with your reviews. I have a dentist friend who got pressured to pay them and then got negative reviews. We also have a hairdresser friend who paid monthly and got all positive reviews and the negative reviews were removed. My own experience is Yelp pressured me to pay and then ‚Äúsequestered‚Äú our positive reviews and kept two negative reviews from more than 10 years ago so that our average looked bad. I think in some places they might call this blackmail. So if you want really truthful reviews try some other service. Forget Yelp.
title: Yelp is now pay to play

review:
I would like to highly recommend Fredrick Brown at AutoNation Acura. He is a true professional. He goes out of his way to make sure all your needs are met. He makes the dealership which is part of a huge corporation seem life an a
one dealership Independent. It is the kind of personal touch that humanizes a car dealership and makes it comfortable and pleasant from start to finish. I trust Fredrick and would not hesitate to refer him to anyone looking for a vehicle of any kind.

review:
Was in Maui and was looking to get some artwork, walked into Sweet Trade Tattoo, Adam was currently working on a customer and took the time out to come speak to me. Went back to the condo and did some research like he said and went back at agreed time as a walk in and had some beautiful artwork of a Honu put on my forearm. Adam is an amazing artist and his line work and shading is outstanding. Very pleased with the tattoo and will be going to Adam in a few months when back in Maui. 

Thanks Adam

Mark from Sacramento
title: Sweeeet Honu Tattoo

review: We stopped by the Toma Restaurant Bar and love, love, loved the food and the service-our server Cullen and Blair were excellent they made our evening.  Cullen‚Äôs approach was so warm and pleasant.  My husband had the Braised Short Ribs which melted in your mouth.  I had the rigatoni which was rich and had an awesome flavor.  Blair was quick and right there if we needed anything.   Thanks for making our late evening dinner a pleasant one...we will tell others and we will be back!

review: We first started taking our mini poodle to the hoboken dog wash when Mercedes was recommended by a friendly neighbor.   Our dog always came out smiling and smelling so clean.   She was able to pluck his ear hair when no other groomer was able to.  Last time we went in for a much needed haircut.  His poodle cut is adorable and again left very happy. Throughout the haircut Mercedes txted video. We appreciated the updates and how kind she is to our dog.! Thankyou hoboken dog wash we will be back !

review: I almost always use Yelp as one of my sources when looking for any type of services, restaurants, etc. So far I have not had any regrets. I understand that comments written in the app are just people‚Äôs personal reviews and like anything else there will be good and bad ones. But every view helps you make your own decision and entitles you in the turn to leave your own review after your experience.

review: I will tell everyone that the experience I had from the first call to the company and the conversation with Jason left me with a good feeling. On the scheduled day of the short move I had a call from the crew that they were on the way and arrived right n time as scheduled. The crew was very polite and very careful when moving the pieces. I give 5 stars and would recommend their services. The quote was the final cost to me  and no surprise additional fees. I am a happy camper

review: Unfortunately, due to funds we were stuck renting here for 4 years. 3 different management companies have taken over so far. It hasn‚Äôt gotten better. Late fees get charged at their discretion. They put whatever charges they want on u. 10 day? Don‚Äôt count on it. Doesn‚Äôt mean anything because they go by the 3 day. Cops are here almost every week, sometimes more than once. SWAT team had us leave our place because of a guy who wouldn‚Äôt come out. Scariest experience ever. This place will take u over, and not in a good way. Can‚Äôt trust nobody. Cars always get broken into. Ur better off renting somewhere else. This place will just leave marks against u.
title: Worst place ever!!!

review: I love Yelp for what it is but I hate the placement of the "check in" button in the redesign. It needs to be changed. Whenever I simply want to look at a page, the button is right where my thumb hits to scroll and it sends me to the check in page. I also don't like how I have to go to my own page, then hit check in at the top when I want to search a business to check into. It was better when it popped up from the center button on the bottom.
title: Good!

review: This is an app I use weekly.  When traveling, I can find places to go that I never knew existed and would have never found.  Knowing what I am walking into and reading others experiences, helps direct where I spend my time and hard earned cash.  I love looking at menus in advance and having the ability to easily access websites.  I use for venues, stores, experiences, not just for restaurants.

review: At Lonetree LoDo Bar and Grill and the waitress Katrina (name badge) told me and my friend we had to order drinks or food or leave! We had just sat down no more than 15 minutes with water and were chatting! Had plans to eat in a little while - although a patron had a dog on a leash inside the restaurant down stairs, we were shocked she was so rude! She walked by two more times and flared at us so we left ! Don‚Äôt go there- rude and terrible reputation!
title: Better drink or leave Lodo bar and grill

review:
I wish there were many more stars.......they are simply the very best in the country.....I‚Äôm 67 and travel often out of south Florida, so I feel I can be somewhat of an authority:)
I had an eye problem and it was escalating after arriving. The fabulous receptionist made room for me to be seen within a couple of days. 
The doctor understood my issue almost immediately and I was treated with the utmost care....given the proper medication and I left with great peace of mind.

review: I love constantly trying new places to eat as does my girlfriend, yelp has enabled me to find great places to eat no matter where I am. Though I do use yelp for all kinds of things, primarily for food. I am originally from a small town so usually it‚Äôs just word-of-mouth but when you‚Äôre somewhere new that‚Äôs not very easy so yelp to the rescue. Wether you‚Äôre in your home town or on vacation yelp is a great app to have

review:
This is how I try new places. Before I go I like to see some of the reviews. I try to give businesses the benefit of the doubt when it comes to 2-4 stars and stay away from 1 stars. I try to rate and review the places I go. But looks like I tend to only review places I either really loved or loathed. 

Pictures are a great way to look at the businesses to give me an idea of what the atmosphere will be like. 

Keep at it Yelp team!!
title: Rates tend to be accurate

review: Apple has the worst excuse for support imaginable. They refuse to allow you to make reservations for the Apple Store by continuously routing you through the automated system, only to have someone over the phone give you wrong advice and make the problem even worse than it was. I wish it was as simple as changing phones, but with my incredible address book size and other information stored in the Apple format, there would be no way to transfer all the data. What a racket they have created! It's making me rate there service by stars, but won't allow you to select no stars, for the service I never received.

review: I'm a regular Yelp user to review restaurants, services, etc. that I've never been to. Yeah, some people are natural complainers but these are few and far between. You can pretty much tell the serious reviews with the app showing how many reviews each user has done. The lower the number, the less creditability I give the reviewer. It's a great way to give kudos when they're due or let the business know what you didn't like.
title: I ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è Yelp!

review: I have used Yelp often on for a couple of years, but having moved recently to this area I have found it to be nearly invaluable. I use it to find restaurants, shopping, golf, recreation‚Ä¶ And I find of the reviews are the most helpful of all. It is really the community of reviewer's that make this the most useful and helpful. So all of you reviewer's, continue to do what you're doing to ensure Yelp continues to be a reference for us all!
title: Helpful

review:
I‚Äôm able to post my content when I have the chance to, plus, I enjoy the fact that there‚Äôs events and other places rated in here other than just restaurants. For example other services like cleaning or handy man services. 
Nevertheless, it‚Äôs  overall helpful to have yelp. Not only it shows you your options but it provides a visual aid of it all.

review:
I feel like customer service doesn't exist anymore.  Companies have embraced the policy that bad customer service is more profitable than good customer service.  So I'm trying Yelp.  I'm trying to share the good not just the times I'm fuming.  I'm also using the app to help support the business that are doing right by their customers.  

Let's see how this goes.

review: I took my car to Crash Champions to get some bodywork, and they did a great job. Very friendly staff. The young man at the desk with the dimples was super friendly and knew everything that was going on with my car and answered every question. I was very impressed with him, and he was so young. Overall, I like everything about crash champions. I highly recommend them.

review:
Certa pro did painting in our home. We give them the highest mark you can give. The painters were totally professional. Extremely friendly. They were organized and completed their jobs in exactly the time frame they promised. By far this was the best work we have seen. Pricing was very reasonable. The house was cleaner when they left. Beautiful work. Use them. 
Bill

review: My first time going there and their soup dumplings were on of the best around. I also tried the scallion pancakes and the udon noodles and it was the best dim sum I've had in a while. Shoutout to Julia for being helpful and giving us the best recommendations for food and sake!!!! Service was very good and food came out so fast. Definitely will be coming back for more and would recommend to anyone craving dim sum :)

review: I use yelp for many things! Finding the best places to eat, searching for good car mechanics, tire shops, I even use yelp to help me find markets that sell specific international items. Just type in what your looking for and yelp will help you find it and direct you to its location. Find honest reviews and read peoples experiences! This is where decisions are made easy.

review: I write a review explaining a company will cancel on appointments and not reschedule for you but if you do then they charge you.  Explained that the company bailed on my appointment the day of and didn‚Äôt do anything to fix the situation other than tell me to get over.  The company replied confirming this to be fact but rants on about family issues and takes a jab at me on a social high horse absolutely validating that nothing in my review was dishonest at all.  It‚Äôs the only review and you guys magically don‚Äôt recommend it‚Ä¶.  What is the point of this app if I can‚Äôt tell others great places to use and warn them of horrible ones?

review: My family has a tradition of having lamajuin for our Christmas Eve family gathering. We tried getting our order filled for the first time at Araz Bakery and we loved the service and the food!!! The matriarch of our family is Armenian, and she wants us to get our food from Araz Bakery from now on. They are friendlier, make the best Armenian food and care about customer satisfaction. review: What an awesome experience I had with this company. 1st my dog was having issue with her mobility, Josh was able to help her with some message techniques and now she runs around like when she was a pup! 2nd I asked if he could help me with some behavioral problems. We were able to do a virtual training, and resolved the problem. I recommend Ruff nay to is looking for help with there best buddy. My pebbles and I are so happy.

review:
I (used to) use yelp to find someplace neat to eat. When I would travel to a new city, I could look up places, see some ratings and get some basic info. 
But then Yelp takes that and decides to give you recommendations‚Ä¶a week later. I got notifications for crap I was looking for last week in a city I‚Äôm no longer in.  If I were them, I‚Äôd fire whatever PM is responsible for that Innere give advertising. 
Oh hey, you were in Amsterdam last Tuesday, here are some recommendations for Italian food there tonight. Even though we know you‚Äôre in Honolulu today!

review: I only drink hot black coffee. Many times I order hot coffee in the afternoon hours and get coffee that is stale and old. review:
Pharmiscists,  are always on top of our Drugs. They call on renewals to make us aware it's almost time. Let us know if we travel they transfer to different locations so we don't ever have a break in the drugs. They have even called a home to inquire if there might be a drug interaction.

review:

I definitely recommend this company and will do business with them again.

review: So dissatisfied. Reservation clerk did not put that we needed a roll away bed. I‚Äôm 68 and I slept on the floor. Asking for 2 pillows, Front Desk seemed put out. I‚Äôll be back to Waco many times but I won‚Äôt stay here.

review: We‚Äôve had Hytech Solar for almost a year and a half. It was the best decision we made. review: I wish the map of collectiin stays where you are located without expanding the map each time. review:

review:

review:
This review is not biased. My business did not get affected by Yelp (default review API used by Apple‚Äôs map for iPhones)

None of my relatives or close friends whose business got affected by inaccurate reviews on Yelp so I did not get biased in any way.

I noticed that yelp have less accurate open hours on their page, sometimes it‚Äôs wildly inaccurate.

I‚Äôve heard it‚Äôs easier to bring down a business reputation with fake accounts, Yelp don‚Äôt take reports seriously or have implemented safeguards for suspected account.

I don‚Äôt like anything Google but I have to use it over yelp reported misleading info for at least 5+ times due to inaccurate information when I tried it out.

Suggestions: give users a trust level for uploading reviews or photos, it might work after a while, now you have their trust level in a database.
title: Poor quality control for fake reviews destroying businesses

review:
We purchased a motor coach and had a few items that needed to be fixed. We have delt with five different people at this location only to find out that the repairs were not completed.

We then re-scheduled and on the morning we were to pick it up, there were still items not fixed. This has been going on for over five weeks. 
There is no communication on their end to us what so ever. We have to call every time to find out just where they are with the repairs.

Then when they tell us its ready to be picked up it is nit ready yet again.
AND we are told that they didn't know we were scheduled to pick it up when they made the appointment / day / time.

Absolutely NO customer service, Absolutely NO communication, Absolutely NO professionalism, Absolutely NO concern for the client!!!!!

Four trips to Lazy Days RV, our time is worth something however Lazy Days RV does not believe so. 

I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND LAZY DAYS RV TO ANYONE! Buyers Be Ware!!!

review:
Hi, 
 Creepy thing happened to me tonight around 7:30pm at the Target by
 I 70 and Kipling.  
When I got there, a tall, white man in his early 30‚Äôs, was on his phone, standing by the entrance.  He followed me inside and then started shadowing me. He wasn‚Äôt looking at the fruit or vegetables he just kept following me real close. There weren‚Äôt many people in the store. Almost like it was about to close.
 I got a bad feeling and moved to where some other shoppers were.  Then, I stopped, turned my cart around, and looked directly at him.  He stopped moving. I kept watching him and he was Not shopping! He was on his phone and wouldn‚Äôt make eye contact with me. He walked past me and then I didn‚Äôt see him again in the store. üò≥
 The nice cashier had someone walk me to my car thankfully.  I don‚Äôt know what he was up to, but it was no good! He was NOT shopping and he was gone as soon as he knew I was watching him.
 Be careful!

review: I went to Firestone‚Äôs for my birthday yesterday thinking that I would have a delectable meal. This place has gone downhill in the past year. We ordered oysters and asked for crackers to go with it. We were served about 8 oyster crackers to go with two dozen oysters. review: Yelp is the first stop I make when researching anything.  If I'm visiting a place from out of town, I search Yelp for places to eat, places to sleep, and place to hang out. I usually will take the really bad reviews which use outlandish claims and derogatory language with a grain of salt.  I opt for the ones which take an objective view, reporting the facts of their experience.  This app has been a staple in my life and I will continue to use it indefinitely.
title: Yelp is goat

review:
Hi there,

One of the ways we try to help Yelp users discover local businesses is by using automated software to showcase reliable reviews. This means Yelp doesn't recommend every review from every user and is automated so that it can apply the same objective standards to every business and every review. This is very different from other sites that tend to feature every single negative rant and positive rave. The software looks at dozens of different signals, including various measures of quality, reliability and activity on Yelp. What is recommended can change over time, and a review that is currently not recommended may be recommended on another day.
title: Review on yelp means nothing

review: The service was terrible and the food was way too spicy because of the way our server placed the order. She (Desi) said that she would split the bill between the two of us and then she didn‚Äôt. We asked for mild curry and she turned it in as medium (2 stars) and then tried to argue that 2 stars meant mild. Even when I showed her on the menu that two stars meant medium, she still argued that 2 stars meant mild. She brought dessert for two of us to share with only one spoon. Her attitude was very unsatisfactory and the food was practically inedible and she never apologized for anything. I will not go back there again.

review: While it's not perfect in all markets - at home in the US it's great in most large and medium size cities! I can show up to a new place and type in "organic restaurant" or "co-working space" and this tells me all the options, how much other ppl liked or didn't like their experience - plus hours, contact info, and location! It's definitely one of my favorite go-to apps!! Now we can all make educated decisions with ease :)

review:
Yelp helps me figure out places to avoid. Yelp could also inspire places to take notice, change what you can.  
If your business is in the service industry really should understand that yeah while everyone has an opinion, sometimes too many bad ones unresolved can put you out of business. 
Public opinion and the way issues are handled makes or breaks a place! I resolve to use Yelp responsibly.

review: I love Yelp but I wished the app version had the same keyword search function that the desktop version has. Often times I need to search for something specific within a vendor's reviews and I can only do that on my computer. I'm on the app version 99.9% of the time so that is frustrating. I hope they can add that. Additionally, I would appreciate the ability to bookmark a vendor simultaneously under different bookmark categories.
title: Great but need a search function

review:

title: Issues with update/ cannot add new photos

review: But I challenge anyone to look at the "not recommended reviews" for any restaurant. All 1 star, all negative. So unless you do some digging, it would seem like every restaurant gets mostly positive reviews. According to the yelp people a automated computer algorithm select which reviews get recommended, and they make no effort to hide the fact that negative reviews are selected by this program for "not recommended status". So if you are only looking for positive reviews ( of every restaurant) this is definitely the place. If you want to know what people really think, maybe get your reviews from someplace else.
title: So a business can't pay to remove reviews....

review: Do not go here. If you do make sure you have a person with you that knows something about car buying. They will take advantage of you and screw you over! My friend has yet to drive her car after a month of supposed repairs and they NEVER showed her the credit report they ran on her for the car. They said her credit was ‚Äú0‚Äù. Then gave her a 26% apr on her loan, after she already put $6000 down. We told her get her money back and shop elesewhere. They told her they cannot since she signed the paperwork. But she hasn‚Äôt even driven it!!!! Is there something I‚Äôm missing here??? Please stop these people!!!!

review:

review: Do you remember the days when you felt a business listened to you and responded with dedicated customer oriented service? review:
The new version features a local feed. This is way overdue for yelp. Great addition and makes discovering new places awesome.

review: When you work all day and talk about a bbq and you pass the place you should have stopped at. review: My rent was increased by $60 with no notice. They said contract says they can do that. They also said a letter was mailed. Letter was never received. He said only by appointment I made an appointment and showed up before my appointment and no one was there. Appointment was at 12:50. He said he was only there until 1. I was there at 12:45. review:

You may be saying, ‚Äúbut it‚Äôs toast?‚Äù Yes indeed, but this is the best toast ever!  Who makes great toast?  Little Duck.  That‚Äôs who!!

review: I‚Äôve been a customer for a very long time but lately I stopped going.  I would get just a venti iced coffee that comes with classic syrup but for the past few months, my drink would taste like lipstick‚Ä¶plastic taste.  Not sure if the syrups are getting mixed up..maybe dragonfruit?!? But it tastes absolutely awful.  Thought I‚Äôd leave a review since it keeps happening.  I only get Starbucks when I‚Äôm inside target now since it taste great‚Ä¶taste like iced coffee and not rancid.   Make the drink, do a taste test.  It awful üò¢ Not sure what is happening.

review: Literally came home to a Republic vehicle parked in my shoveled parking space in front of my shoveled sidewalk, talking on his cell phone. Why?!! I had to parallel park over the neighbors snow berm to back in in front of him, and he still didn‚Äôt care to back up and let me in. He just continued to talk in his cell phone like it was his purgative to park there and have his cell conversation. There is no reason for him to take cell calls at my address.  Is this really the quality of your service providers.  Common sense and common courtesy go along way.

review:
This afternoon I placed an order on line for my supper for my family‚Ä¶. 
8 piece chicken, and 2 sides.  Paid for it and at the end I was told it would be ready between 5-15 minutes.  Since I live about 15 min away and rush hour traffic is about to get under way I figured I would leave.  
I arrived 15 min later.  Went in to pick up my order.  I  was told it wasn‚Äôt ready.  They were waiting on chicken.  Then when that was ready now they are waiting on biscuits!  Which by the way we didn‚Äôt get!  Nor did we get the Cajun Rice either.  We received chicken and a small box of fries!  
I walked out of there an hour later!!!! 
This was 3 o‚Äôclock in the afternoon!  Supper time is approaching, what happens then?  
If Popeyes was smart they would figure this out!  There was also a woman waiting before me that was late picking up her child from school !  Popeyes service had made her late! 
I think from now on I‚Äôll go elsewhere !
Figure it out Popeyes!!!

Needless to say Julie was very knowledgeable about alternatives and the cake definitely exceeded my expectations. review:

review: Normally love yelp to find places but you could miss a gem over there ‚Äúrecommended reviews‚Äù. At my place of work there are only bad reviews that are recommended and if you go to the not recommended reviews there‚Äôs tons of good/helpful ones. review: Wow!  We‚Äôve been looking for an outdoor seating place since we got here. The atmosphere was great and the service much better. Chris was attentive and so friendly. review:

review:

review: It‚Äôs satisfying to write a review when we go somewhere we love and want to spread the word.   On the flip side, it‚Äôs also satisfying to get the word out when we go somewhere and have a poor experience.    It gives the establishment a chance to hear what the average person has to say and hopefully make some adjustments.   It‚Äôs not meant  to be terrible but just constructive criticism.
title: Love writing reviews

review:
As a small business owner, I get calls from YELP monthly, asking for $$$ in order to ‚Äúput me at the top of the list‚Äù‚Ä¶ this is not only an injustice to small, local businesses who don‚Äôt want to or can‚Äôt fork over $400‚Ä¶ but to consumers looking for honest reviews of local businesses! 

It‚Äôs absurd. 

My gluten-free, dairy-free, organic, mostly vegan, small restaurant should pop up first in our quaint  mountain town, and yet when people search for ‚Äúvegetarian and vegan options‚Äù‚Ä¶ you know who does pop up first? The Burger Place (delicious burgers by the way) across the street because they offer a freakin ‚Äúveggie burger‚Äù amongst the chicken wings and fried bar food.  Oh! And because they paid the money. 

What used to be a helpful tool to use on order to find what you wanted‚Ä¶ is now nothing but a ‚Äúmoney first‚Äù sham. The best way to find what you want in a foreign place is to just ASK around! Actually talk to people‚Ä¶ have an adventure ;) 

End Rant. ü§ôüèº
title: YELP is NOT a helpful place anymore.

review: Man finding good reliable help can be though. Even finding a new place to eat that has good food and service can be a challenge. Thank God for Yelp. review:

I never know if it‚Äôs a white thumb that hasn‚Äôt been liked or a blank one that has been liked. It makes me spend FAR more time than the old system!! And it uses more data.  The blue thumbs up was much easier to see. Please fix this!

review:

review:

The app is easy, colorful, not too busy and fun to use. I‚Äôm a fan!

review: We went there Sunday late afternoon for dinner. Hostess was very nice and we got a nice table.  The waitress was terrible.  She looked like she‚Äôd been in the sun for light years.  She got the drink orders wrong and didn‚Äôt offer to replace them.  Had to ask for ice for the drink on the rocks.  Steak was too cooked for blood rare order .  Swordfish was dry and over cooked. Shrimp cocktail came with no lemon and the cocktail sauce didn‚Äôt have horseradish but rather Chile sauce.  We would ask for lemonrepeatedly, finally brought it after 10‚Äù then another waitress took it away.  They were not busy so service should have been better but the food was terrible and the waitress just couldn‚Äôt get anything right.
title: Dukes restaurant Huntington Beach, CA

review:
Kimberly, the lady on the phone, is so helpful and caring, I absolutely loved dealing with her. 
Junior and David, the repairmen, were equally fantastic. They repaired the problem, and added silica sand and my four year old turf looks brand new. 
I would highly recommend Easy Turf to anyone looking to install artificial turf. It may be a bit more expensive but they back you 100% with steady excellent repairs. 
My dogs love this turf and so do I. The best investment I ever made. 
Pauline
title: Fantastic repair of my Easy Turf

review: Every time I try to read a review in safari that‚Äôs on yelp, it prompts me to open the app or cancel. If I cancel bc I want to stay in my safari search for other reasons, I can‚Äôt read more than 3 or so lines of the review. If I agree to open the app, it brings me to app main page that doesn‚Äôt carry over what I was trying to read. I guess yelp wants it to be an with or situation where I have to do all my searching in yelp and not have easy access to the variety of info the internet offers. Clear voice for me, yelp is out. Now if only I can remember to stop clicking on yelp when I search for a restaurant and stay with the alternatives.
title: Unusable

review: When i am looking for a place to eat or a service to enjoy. Yelp helps me do that whether I‚Äôm in the mountain west; the desert SW; or the east coast. If I can‚Äôt find a place thru Yelp I certainly will try to make sure I review the place. Good bad or indifferent; credit where credit is due. Yelp helps us all make better buying decisions and helps businesses know what‚Äôs right and what‚Äôs wrong with their business.
title: I read almost all the reviews...

review: This app saves me so much time and money by sorting out the best places! It‚Äôs not just food reviews but clubs and gas stations and literally everything! One thing I don‚Äôt like the rating of certain places is lower because of a few mediocre reviews while everything else is 5 stars. So even if you see 3 stars, make sure you read the reviews! Really helps out decision making between places!
title: This app is a necessity

review: Ladies if you are having the problem when you sneeze, cough, laugh, or exercise you have to wear a pad because you pee, then you need to try the new procedure called Emsella that Dr Deborah Wilson offers. I have had 5 of my 6 treatments and I am so happy with my results! No pain, no downtime, no surgery! It is high intensity focused electromagnetic technology, it sure worked for me already! I would totally recommend to everyone who has the problem!
title: Urinary incontience

review: I have been using yelp for multiple years and absolutely love it. It gives me reviews on businesses as well as suggestions on places to go based on where I am or where I'm going to be. It's FREE!! I have been yelp elite for the last couple years and I love giving tips, reviews and pictures for businesses in places I go. I literally use this app multiple times a day.
title: This is for the yelp app not a review for a random business

review: Two hours after calling ESA and speaking to Cole, he was at our house making repairs. An hour and a half later, he had our kitchen lights working, our porch light working, and an on-again-off-again socket working perfectly. To top it all off, he told me that based on the work he did, the price he‚Äôd quoted me on the phone was too high and he charged me only 75% of his estimate. Thank you ESA and Cole! It doesn‚Äôt get any better!
title: ESA Electric - Outstanding!

review: Like most people I fear the dentist. My entire staff goes here and I was forced to as well! I can‚Äôt ever go anywhere else now! The staff, professionalism, innovative technology, cleanliness and entertaining attitudes made the process oddly enjoyable. Elisa was my tech and I just loved her!!! Great personality and highly informative. Dr. Justin Namm was freakin awesome! Gentle, thorough, informative and handsome üòÜ. I want teeth like that guy!!! The crew at the front desk implements team work and the energy is so contagious. 10 stars
title: Amazing service

review: I would like to start off by saying, I‚Äôm new to the area and I was in desperate search of a Starbucks that was convenient for my long commute into Boston. I found this one for my travel needs and I‚Äôm so happy with my few weeks of experience. The staff is so nice and there is this one guy there that every time I pull up to the drive thru he greets everyone with a very loud and happy welcome! It always gives my day a good start!
title: New customer

review: I just recently moved into the area and had a dental emergency the day before starting a new job. Dr. Riley at New Heights Dental Clinic was wonderful! They worked me the same day I called in a panic. Raven at the front desk was gracious and willing to track down my insurance info as my card was still packed in some box with n my garage. The dental assistant and Dr. Riley were friendly, helpful and efficient. I had no waiting or unanswered questions! It was an excellent experience!

review: After a frustrating experience at Hertz,  I approached the Alamo counter at the Phoenix Airport.  I was greeted by a friendly Alamo manager who quickly quoted a great price and set us up with Mike, a counter agent.  Mike processed our paperwork and we were on our our way to our rental car in under 10 minutes. They gave us a fine selection but of vehicles and pricing that exceeded our expectations!  Alamo will be our first call in the future!
title: Alamo came to the rescue!

review:
I was told about Yelp from my son and I am indeed grateful. I like it for food and restaurant reviews but there is so much more that I had no idea.

If you want honest assessments by people just like you and me then this is the app. This is my biggest find because as soon as someone mentions a place I am looking to see what others have said.  

Occasionally I check a place to see if me and a fellow yelper have same tastes.  Not convinced ye? Try it for a couple of weeks and get back to me.
title: Yelp My Biggest Find

review: Is it possible to leave no stars? Yelp is the biggest scam ever. They allow anybody to post whatever they want wether they‚Äôve used your service or not. They let your local competitors leave you one star reviews to hurt your business. Even when have proof that nobody with the name of said yelper has ever contacted your business. I wish they had a yelp for customers where can tell the truth about how they lie. Yelp is a tool that scam artist use to get money back on their bill and make false claims. And yelp doesn‚Äôt help you at all. Because yelp is obviously managed wrong and promotes theft from small business I believe it should be shutdown immediately.
title: Yelp is a scam

review: Yelp is awesome. I've used it forever to find restaurants and various services. I just recently started putting up reviews myself. It's really fun and a great way to let businesses know when they're doing a good job. It's also a nice way to vent when things go wrong. Please remember to put up the good and the bad, it's always weird when I see a bad review and then see that every review from that user has been negative.
title: App works great

review: I choose Pizza nearby. Then I go to filters & sort by rating. Suddenly it‚Äôs now listing every restaurant, not just pizza places. Even though it still says ‚Äúpizza‚Äù in the search box. I hate the swipe to reveal map functionality as well. I‚Äôm just trying to scroll the list! I liked this app way better when it actually worked properly.
title: App has gotten way worse

review: I have been finding myself using yelp a lot more these days. I am a student and am always on the lookout for the best coffee shop to study or place to grab a bite to eat with friends. I started writing reviews a lot more because I find that I love reading a good review about places I am interested in going to. I rely heavily on the reviews because it decides whether or not I will take a trip to a new restaurant or location.
title: YELP is the best way to get HELP!

review: This was our first time and was excited to try a new pizza joint as we are always on the lookout for a good pizza. We got there and there were three people standing in line...we waiting quite a while before we got to order. We were getting the Brooklyn Best but I did not want peppers. I asked to substitute basil. I was told they would charge me for the add-on. I said I just do not want peppers and was charged almost $2 for the basil which ended up being about one pinch of basil. The pizza came out and the crust seemed WAY to overdone and had HUGE bubbles that were burnt. The crust had no taste and the sauce was no better. The sausage had good flavor but was greasier than ever. Needless to say I WILL NOT BE RETURNING.

review: Great app and features! I wish the reviews weren't recommended by yelp. It seems as almost their system of which top reviews go up first are extremely biased (towards bad reviews because thats what people want to read). Regardless I use the app to get discounts, build my reputation in the community, and become a strong yelper so hopefully my reviews are even considered in the evaluation of a company/business/consumer.

review:
I use Yelp constantly and I‚Äôm very thankful for the amazing service it provides, but the app REALLY needs to have the option of showing the most current reviews first instead of me having to scroll through every freakin review from 4 years ago when a place may or may not have improved! I hate having to log into the website on my phone or laptop to have this feature because that is very inconvenient. 

Sorry, first world problems, I know, but it seems pretty basic to me.....

review: Called to place order to pick up. I was on hold 6 minutes, I believe it was a manager picked up. I told him I wanted to order take out‚ÄîHE put me on hold. 4 minutes later a young lady picked up, she found I wanted take out‚Äî I was put on hold AGAIN for 6 more minutes, then I hung up. Since I was driving I Called Greenfield location. A young man picked up, put me on hold‚Äî a little over 1 minute later, Heather came on apologized for MAYFAIR‚Äôs delay, took my order‚Äî we are headed there now... smh I will travel out of my way for good customer  service and good food. Super disappointed with Mayfair‚Äî they may need more staff or something. They lost our business today....

review: I had the ribeye, Mac and Cheese and Garlic Mashed. I would have paid more a juicy tender steak like that. Cooked to perfection, excellent customer service, kindness and I could go on and on. You have to go for yourself to experience what I‚Äôm talking about. First timer, traveling 5 stars for Rene and Ashley. Don‚Äôt waste your time at other steakhouses. I hope your experience is just as good as mine. I don‚Äôt normally post  reviews.

review:
Especially for ordering local delivery/pickup. Yelp is still a reviews app. Ordering food is not prioritized at all and they have absolutely no way of contacting them if you have questions or issues. You can contact the actual delivery company but they are likely to point you to yelp for some issues.

In terms of UI - Order history is buried under ‚ÄúMore‚Äù doesn‚Äôt even show you order details or status - it just takes you to a new order page.

Bookmarked restaurants is also buried under ‚ÄúMore‚Äù. The view of bookmarked restaurants under the ‚ÄúMe‚Äù tab just makes it easier for you to write reviews.
title: Zero support, cluttered features

review:
As a veterinarian I pounded my feet daily until one day I slipped on ice and broke my ankle, tibia and fibula. I saw Taos orthopedic surgeons first and boy was that a mistake. They left my leg with an incision that was left open and was a mess. Long story short I found Dr. Janowak, what an Angel!!!!
She redid the screw ups that another doctor did and put me back together. Not only is Dr. Janowak an amazing person but one killer doctor. Hands down the best foot surgeon in New Mexico

review: I ordered the corn nuggets from Sonny‚Äôs.  There was a $3.12 upcharge to get them instead of a side.  They did not arrive with the order. When I used uber eats chat to report the missing item they only refunded the $3.12 upcharge.  Nothing to cover the missing side item. The cost in the restaurant is $7.99. After chatting with 3 different people they cut me off saying the refunded the correct amount.  They should have refunded 7.99 which is the cost of the missing side (including the 3.12 upcharge fee).   Uber acted like they did the best they could.  I will delete the app and never use this service again.

review: Maria is an the friendliest most amazing woman. She is always smiling‚Ä¶. I love starting my day with a green juice that she makes fresh right there. The egg, spinach w/garlic sandwich on the fresh baked bread is amazing. Along with the sauce she makes to dip it in. She also serves freshly made Moroccan food. The shushuka (if spelled correctly) is to die for. I HIGHLY recommend the spot. If you haven‚Äôt tried it get on over and do so‚Ä¶.. thank me later!

review:
I have learned that is a good idea to always check Yelp reviews before I go to a new place of business or restaurant. 

My husband and I also run a short term vacation unit, and I always tell our guests to check Yelp before they go out. It‚Äôs a great way whether you‚Äôre a local or from out of town to find out reviews, pricing, location, etc.‚Ä¶

review:
I am very unhappy with the clean up job that Boak & Sons, Inc. lacked to do at my home after they did our roof work this week. 

I found at least 15 nails so far within my driveway and throughout my back porch after they left and this was us not even looking very hard & I found all of these within 5 minutes of walking to my car this morning. We have 6+ cars & motorcycles in our driveway and I guarantee at least one of our tires will be flat by the end of this week due to this if I‚Äôm unable to find all the nails left behind. 

Most roofers I have ever hired or knew personally have a magnet üß≤ that they go over their work area with when finished so this is avoided but apparently Boak doesn‚Äôt follow behind that procedure...üôÑ

I will mention- the roof looks great & they did a wonderful job on that but it doesn‚Äôt excuse the lack of clean up after the job was finished.

review: This is the best app ‚Ä¶ exploring different places is my past time. I‚Äôm in business myself, so I‚Äôm always looking to learn something that will make our business better. review:

Tony not only offered me the same products but more. The workers were great!!  They only took a lunch break and one guy was constantly cleaning up. I am very happy with my roof, the workmanship and the guarantees. Call them today!!

review: We are currently on vacation and called to do a to go order was on hold for over ten minutes had to hang up and call back. We called back to speak to the manager and that was the manager we were speaking too. Excuse after excuse and all she could say was ok,ok,, ok then i asked do you not want our business. Italian , Chinese at PF Chang or cheese factory or decent place

review: I have been a yelp fan for a long time and never had any problems with their app. I have found so many worthwhile reviews on restaurants, both good and bad, that I find myself going there regularly to check out new places before I dine. This app is basically trash and I wouldn‚Äôt use it. Use google reviews because they‚Äôre coming from ppl with an actual google account at least or ask friends. Otherwise this is worthless and used to promote people who pay them. That‚Äôs it.

review:
I chose to delete the Yelp app after the announcement by Yelp leadership that it would be providing a special feature for racist complaints against businesses. 

The problem with this decision by Yelp is in the question of who decides what is racist and what is a legitimate complaint? Businesses across the country are being subjected to ‚Äúcancel culture‚Äù on very specious and highly subjective grounds, and we constantly see complaints against people and businesses by individuals who have no direct connection or knowledge. 

Mob rule by a vocal minority on social media is no way to run a business or society. How can anyone see the videos of innocent diners getting accosted during their meal by an actual mob and think that is a good thing?     

How can anyone read the reports and see the videos of small businesses essentially having to pay protection $ to the social justice lynchmobs and think that‚Äôs a good thing? Yelp is playing right into these hateful and divisive emotions which are tearing us apart.
title: Deleted App due to Yelp policy

review:

On google, it‚Äôs strait forward, reviews are not filtered, every review is visible and ranking of a website is determined by its popularity; if you want you can pay to get on top of search result, period.
On yelp, organic search is bogus by review filtering; Yelp deliberately hide reviews for businesses that decide to stop advertising. Shame on this company!
