review:
I love yelp! But only having an overall rating affects people ability to actually rate fairly. There should be different categories of ratings like food, customer service, ambiance, etc. and then we can either choose to have an overall score calculated or we can do it our selves. 

Some people will be like food was great the place was nice but then one thing will go wrong and they‚Äôll be like 1 star... so not really an accurate representation.
title: Different Category Ratings

review: I enjoy this app like i used to social media. it‚Äôs extremely interesting seeing the opinions and likings/disapprovals of not only my favorite places but also the all ones around me. i let this app take part in my choices of eateries, traveling accommodations, and everyday insight on somewhere i might go. it‚Äôs a good app where people can post what they actually think without being pestered with adds or pop-ups.

review: I use this app all the time and it rarely lets me down. I search for reviews on the most interesting restaurants and the most fun places for me and my family to visit. I mostly use it for restaurants. Attempting to be a foodie is a lot easier when you can search areas for popular whole in the walls and read how the locals love the place. Going to start doing reviews as well. Guess I‚Äôll be my own pseudo food critic.
title: Love this app

review:
Still one of my favorite seafood restaurants in Galveston Bay area but two changes have dulled my enthusiasm. Went to lunch last week.
(1) Saltines are standard on the table. If you ask for bread, your server will bring it for you. I forgot to look to see if I was charged for the bread.
(2) The new lunch menu is more expensive of course but my main complaint is the is no seafood pasta. They had a pasta with mesquite grilled shrimp that was awesome. It‚Äôs gone. üôÅ
title: Meaningful Changes

review: This is a great spot to eat good food at great prices.  I love their healthy spinach omelet is really good.  The wait time is minimum and the servers are very nice and efficient.  We eat there all the time and honestly coming from a big city we thought we were going to miss the good food back home.  It turns out that at Mountain View diner we found a great place with good food that feels like home.

review: What can I say? I‚Äôve used Yelp! for years now and have use it through all of my travels. I have discovered some of the BEST restaurants and had the best experiences from people I‚Äôve people in these communities. Some are our regulars in that city and we‚Äôve even had family and friends try some of those same restaurants when they travel to the city as well.

review:
I have been looking for a towing company that could help me with my special needs car.

From my vehicle documentation, it doesn‚Äôt recommend towing from the front or back. It has a single pull point with a specialized tool that gets placed on the passenger side front. That‚Äôs a tow point that is attached to the car frame.

Additionally, I have a 5 inch clearance from the car body to the ground.

O‚ÄôSung was recommended by a coworker and I was really impressed with their professionalism. 

Everything went smoothly and my car was delivered with car to my auto repair shop. 

If you have a special needs vehicle or you are looking for great service, I highly recommend this towing company.
title: Special needs car towing

review:
I want to brag on the Glenn restaurant 

They have have been amazing to me, from the owners Derek and Sheree and the GM Josh and event coordinator Jennifer as well as Jamie another manager there. They have been nothing but amazing their service food, and drinks is the next level. I look forward to making it a weekly or biweekly tradition to go have food and a cocktail there. 

5 stars doesn‚Äôt do this place. I was gonna say.

review: While the food is good the prices are up there for this place of business!  I like their wings!  What I don‚Äôt like is the way they distribute the condiments.  If you order a 20 piece, you can only get 3 sauces.  Their staff can‚Äôt give you more or it is deducted from their pay!  While the owners know it is not enough, but you will pay$0.60 for each additional sauces.  That‚Äôs the catch!  Business Practices!

review: I recently ordered a vegetable lasagna from Pepperoni Grill. It is a wonderful dish that I‚Äôve ordered from Mike, the owner, for special occasions. It was phenomenal ‚ÄºÔ∏è The lasagna was chock full of many different vegetables and the incorporated into the tastiest lasagna‚ù£Ô∏è It was SO DELICIOUS and SO BEAUTIFUL ‚ÄºÔ∏è The staff was very helpful and put the hot lasagna into my car‚ù£Ô∏èI appreciate how helpful and caring they all were‚ù£Ô∏è Thank you, Mike, for making my special occasion even more special ‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüëè

review:
Great location, great service, easy parking.
Food was good but not great for the price.
Pizza was excellent, the leek and pea soup was ok, lacked flavor, at least you would expect some bacon flavor in this soup but none to be found and the portion size was unexceptional.
Portion sizes on our orders was so small that we were still hungry when we left so we made some spaghetti when we got home. We are not gluttons, but the serving sizes were minuscule. This food reminds me of a French restaurant where they make the food look pretty but don‚Äôt give you much for quite a bit of money.
title: Brambles

review:
Quality of the food at Asian Paradise has deteriorated, and prices have climbed exorbitantly over the past several years. Now, if you‚Äôre in a group, there is a forced 20% gratuity per check and then they ask for more. Asian Paradise has lost another customer! I choose my own tip and frequently exceed a 20% gratuity, but I will NOT accept a demanded tip amount. 
Gratuity and the amount of such is to be offered NOT expected. I for one prefer to put meals on a charge card and hand/leave a cash tip separately.
Asian Paradise‚Äôs antics are nothing better than unappetizing and shoddy business practices.
Sadly, this used to be a top-notch restaurant.
title: Asian Paradise, Loveland, Ohio

review: I just wanted to express my appreciation for the fantastic service your platform provides. Whether I'm exploring new restaurants or finding local gems, Yelp has been my go-to guide. The user-friendly interface and detailed reviews make decision-making a breeze. Thanks for being a reliable companion in my quest to discover hidden gems. Keep up the excellent work!

review: Satay Bistro was very busy the night we went there. We had a reservation.  The service was good.  We started with cocktails and a satay, which was very good.  We ordered entrees and champagne   Also got the parm truffle fries, which were excellent. The entrees were both over cooked. A steak and halibut.  The plating was beautiful, but over done steak and hard seared dry halibut is no bueno. The champagne was warm.  I‚Äôm going to chalk it up to the kitchen being slammed, and try again, but was really expecting better prepared food and icy champagne.

review: We were told that our food would take a while because other diners came early for their reservation and the kitchen was backed up. We were encourage to order more appetizers and turned down one that was not ordered by our table. 1.25 hours later after being told to enjoy our water, our food came out. Food was ok, but would have preferred to have our reservation moved to a later time than to sit through a excruciating wait. Contacted restaurant twice about our experience and they never replied.
title: Bring a book

review: Can you keep a secret? Well I can‚Äôt, but just between the two of us this was the best experience that I have ever had at a Social Security Office. In and out in under an hour. I‚Äôd give it a full five stars but I don‚Äôt want them to get lazy.  Keep up the good work.

review: My friend and I always make Aga our first choice. for Indian food. The menu is extensive and the portions are generous. review: If you‚Äôre a business owner stick with google ads and google my business. Yelp give you horrible unqualified leads by putting any and every keyword they can. I shouldn‚Äôt even need to request closure, I didn‚Äôt need to request to open. AND above all this, all the reviews I was given by people where taken down. Absolutely horrible. review: Yesterday was my first time eating at this restaurant.  The food was very hot (heat wise) I ordered one of their combinations.  The food was good.  My complaint is we had to ask for tools for the crab.  She only brought one.  She said that that was the only one she had.  I was with a party of five. review: Went there recently with a party of 8. The food was amazing, the service was first class and they actually treat you like family no matter how busy they are. review:
Mr McGuire is one dependable and honest person, electrician. He replaced our whole Electric panel - our refrigerator would go out anytime we used the microwave- and our built in lights kept flickering off . He was on time, very clean and neat and affordable .  Plus he came in on his day off to help. That‚Äôs something you don‚Äôt see too often. 

I will recommend him to all my friends and family.

review: I wanted to recognize, and highly rate, the plumber, Doug, that was sent out to replace a water filtration unit in my home. While not necessarily the cheapest, the service is top-flight, warranted for a year, and there was no mess to clean up. In addition, he was able to diagnose and fix a handful of minor irritating issues. R A Dobson has a reputation that precedes them and I will definitely use them for all my HVAC needs.

review:
Service use to be good here but sadly, it  has been dwindling. On our last visit the waitress tossed down the menu and walked away. When coming back we placed our order. No water was given, after leaving our soup and waiting maybe 5 min we had to ask for cups for our bowl soup. 

 The two curries ordered were nearly identical even though listed as separate entrees and was shocked at the utter lack of service as we were regular customers, sadly after this experience we won‚Äôt be going back. 

I‚Äôd recommend another local Thai spot, unless you do carry out.
title: Service is almost non existent

review:
If I went by service alone and food delivery savings, I would give a 6 out of 5.

But the delivery settings are dismal at best. It will not let you choose your location with an address door (since it goes by GPS), and at the end of the order when you CAN enter it, it kicked me back to the main menu and erased my order.

No options at all to change your phone number and address unless you order, make the UI lacking, since most food delivery apps allow it. I hope the devs fix that oversight.
title: Great Service, Flawed App

review:
I like Yelp. I really do. I just don‚Äôt want the app. There is only a finite amount of space on my phone, and I don‚Äôt want to waste it on something I only use once or twice a month. So why must I have the app just to look up reviews on the rare occasion?

I can view google reviews without an app, which is why I turn to google so often instead of Yelp. Maybe if I didn‚Äôt have to download the app to find out if a diner is good or not, I might use Yelp more than google.

I got the seafood pot pie, and it was like a seafood chowder with very little seafood, and lots of breading. My husband had the ribs, which were dry with very little meat. Definitely overpriced, horrible service, and mediocre food at best, especially for the price. Will not return, and will not recommend to anyone! ü•≤

review: This place isn‚Äôt follow COVID guidelines at all!! The employees & customers are not wearing masks or social distancing, people are sitting at the bar & indoors for long periods of time eating and drinking, there are very large crowds gathering both indoors & crowding parking lots and when business manager is confronted about these issues he blows you off and ignores you. The manager & staff discuss with their customers that COVID is some made up phenomenon and don‚Äôt care consider customer safety by implementing COVID protocols. They need to be reported ASAP before they become a major COVID spreader if they haven‚Äôt already & I‚Äôm appalled that the health and safety services or property manager has not stepped in to shut these people down!!
title: COVID Petri Dish!!

review: This app is very helpful. I appreciate customer reviews in making my decisions. I know that the reviews can be skewed and negative ones can even be planted by a company‚Äôs competition (so sad). So you really have to be on the lookout for reviews that seem too mean when others are good. Be wise to trolls and newbies. And be truthful when you write your own reviews. Some of these people are small business owners and work very hard to bring a great experience to their customers.
title: Very helpful

review: Check out the website to see what time they were open it says 6 AM Monday through Saturday it‚Äôs 6:35 I‚Äôm standing at the door they are not open I sure would rather be laying in my bed watching TV and standing here waiting for a hamburger joint to open up if McDonald‚Äôs had a better biscuit and sausage and egg I wouldn‚Äôt be here but maybe the only thing this place has a good egg biscuit and sausage sandwich
title: Don‚Äôt listen to the website

review: I have never been a big fan of the dentist but I have now found a place that makes me feel comfortable and confident in my dental care. In the past I‚Äôve always felt judged and dreaded the lecture every time...this experience was so relaxing and seamless. You can tell how much the whole team truly cares about their patients. Thank you all again for the excellent experience! I‚Äôll be back in 6 months!
title: Awesome experience!

review:
When are you people going to understand that you perpetuate the exact racism you proclaim to detest and fight against in such manner of promotion? I‚Äôm not supporting someone just because they‚Äôre black (or white) owned. I‚Äôll support them because they do good business and are nice people. God knows if anyone dared to put on the front page of their app, ‚ÄúSupport white owned businesses‚Äù, you wouldn‚Äôt hear the end of it and lives and businesses would be consequently destroyed in proclamation of bigotry. 

What kind of message is this sending?! Color is irrelevant. Wonderful job in furthering what you believe yourselves to be fighting against. 

Absolutely disgusting and shameful.
title: ‚ÄúSupport Black Owned Businesses‚Äù??

review: Rolex tells you you will void the warranty if you don‚Äôt use their New York office.  However my watch is 35 years old and there is no warranty.  Thanh does an excellent job at a very reasonable price.  The same repair would be 500 at long‚Äôs but he does it for 200 and in half the time.  He is excellent and I will be back in another five years to have my forty year old Rolex serviced. Thank you t try Than!!
title: Excellent convenient and economical watch repair

review:
It‚Äôs weird that Yelp accept hateful reviews from users and hiding my 5-stars reviews I left to awesome businesses in the area!
I tried to block hateful review, which I don‚Äôt think even describes customer‚Äôs experience other than projects just hate! This review wasn‚Äôt deleted, because Yelp let users to stand with their opinion! But in the same time my 5-stars reviews to places I really like are being deleted! So if Yelp let customers to stand with their negative opinions, why Yelp doesn‚Äôt let customers to share their positive experience as well! 
I‚Äôm really CONFUSED!!!!
It‚Äôs really unacceptable and I don‚Äôt think I can trust Yelp anymore!
title: I don‚Äôt think I can trust Yelp!!!

review: This lady despite not being from this country is a racist. She treated my and my daughter horrible and wouldn‚Äôt even let my daughter sit down while a white lady and her fiend were able to come to my appointment and sit down with no problem. She has an ugly attitude and is very disrespectful and rude . I have never experienced such horrible treatment to a customer in my life . She at one point was all up in my daughter last face telling her to get out , she can‚Äôt be here , meanwhile other people are clearly allowed to sit and bring a friend even during my appointment. Please don‚Äôt go to this lady . Save yours money for propel who are not racist and know how to be professional.
title: Horrible

review: I cannot say enough great things about this company. I called two other heating companies to figure out why my thermostat kept dropping at night and no one could figure out why. It turned out it wasn‚Äôt electrical, but Tom came on a Sunday to check out my problem. He told me it wasn‚Äôt electrical and found someone who could assist me with the heating issue. I now wake up to a warm upstairs. They were punctual and reliable.
title: Shafnisky Electric

review:
i wanted to change my first name, but ‚Äòprofile‚Äô isn‚Äôt listed under account settings. I searched support and was able to use a work around - the instructions contained a link that went directly to profile settings  then I tried to change my email address, but got a ‚Äú403 forbidden‚Äù error message.
I tried posting a question about it in ‚ÄòTalk‚Äô but I got another error message ‚ÄúWe had trouble getting to Talk. Please try again later‚Äù

Has Yelp had a security breech?
title: 403 Forbidden & Profile settings is missing

review: This place is horrible and my child will never back!! His shoes were stolen and when my son inquired the manager about the situation she was rude and pointed to the sign that read not responsible  for stolen items and walked away. I called to speak to the manager and was placed on hold for 10 minutes only to be told that the manager was speaking to police officers due to an incident. The establishment obviously is not being monitored on teen night when it should be on high alert. They didn‚Äôt seem to care when I spoke to them and asked how they would feel if it was them or their child that got their shoes stolen. MY SON WILL NEVER GO AGAIN and advise parents to do the same.
title: Horrible

review:
We‚Äôve been coming to the Hawaiian islands every January for the last 12 years ....and this is one of the best tours we have ever had! We experienced seeing and being in the water with spinner and spotted dolphins ! This trip is a highlight! Afterward we stopped in a special and beautiful Water reserve area and it was like being in an aquarium!!!

The crew was terrific! Captain Wayne and Trevor and Arthur were caring and knowledgeable and taught us a lot about the sea wildlife.

We were on a Norwegian cruise ship and booked this while we had a stop in Kona. After our tour, the Iruka driver dropped us off to Turtle Beach so that we could see turtles before heading back to our cruise ship!!!!

Thank YOUUU ‚ÄúIruka Hawaii Experiences‚Äù for our best trip ever!!!!

Sisters, Cee Cee & Kathy Shinn from San Francisco
title: Iruka Kona ‚ÄúKibou‚Äù Dolphin & Turtle Snorkel tour is the best!!!!

review:
Yelp is the best for looking at reviews and ratings for places to eat in my yelping opinion. I really like how you can look at photos of the menus posted by fellow yelpers for potential places to eat... this way you can see the prices and specials like happy hour! Without extensive searching! 

I feel one downside is people tend to either post very positive or very negative reviews after one time dining or visiting that location. I think this can be misleading but also may be important for the overall rating of a place.

Establishments seem to have Yelp profiles that have automatic replies after a certain star level review. Sometimes this has been helpful and other just seems impersonal. 

Good luck yelpers!
title: Yelper reviews Yelp - Yelp just got Yelped

review: Just had a fabulous meal this evening. The food was fabulous and the service was outstanding.  We arrived at 5:00 pm and were seated immediately. We told our server, Charley, that we needed to be finished by 6pm because we had tickets for a 6:30pm show.  Even though the restaurant was very crowded and Charley also had a very large party at another table, he served our food by 5:15 and we were done and out the door before 6pm.
title: Lobster Pot Restaurant, Provincetown, Ma.

review: The very best part of reading all these reviews is finding that a great deal of them have been written by people who clearly have no idea that they‚Äôre reviewing YELP and not some local business.  One star for that horrible restaurant!  One star for the crappy nail salon!  Although it doesn‚Äôt make much of a difference to the huge, soulless, moneygrubbing Yelp machine, it‚Äôs nice to see that they, too, are forced to keep their undeserved reviews, just the same way they force small businesses to deal with terrible reviews that are obviously written for a completely unrelated business.  I know it‚Äôs childish of me, but I sincerely hope Yelp dies in a fire.
title: A bit of your own medicine

review:
For over 8 years, Yelp has been spamming (it‚Äôs unwanted and not asked for) the vegan community with steakhouse ads and pictures of meat. For those of you that don‚Äôt know, it‚Äôs akin to sending Christians pictures of two men kissing, or drawing pictures of Mohamed to Middle Easterners... 

Now, I‚Äôm a grown man so I don‚Äôt get triggered as easily as some of my vegan friends, but from a business perspective these small businesses are WASTING HOOD MONEY to show ads to vegans like me... that‚Äôs kind of a bad deal to paying customers  if you ask me. Just imagine if you paid Yelp $1,000 to promote your used RV lot and they targeted college students.. It‚Äôs not intelligent marketing.
title: Yelp throws vegans under the bus... Again.

review: We stopped in for pizza at a slow time on a Saturday early afternoon and upon entry every single table was dirty and three of them still had platters, dirty napkins and dirty dishes on them. The floor was filthy and had liquids and food all over. The salad bar was disgusting and nothing had been wiped or cleaned for a long time which was obvious. We were there approximately 1 1/2 hours and not once did any of the 3-4 workers come out to clean or even wipe anything down. Totally disgusting and thank god I didn‚Äôt go into the bathroom, I can only imagine what it would look like. Overall the place was filthy, disgusting but the pizza was good.
title: Filthy

review: Why is it mandatory to download an app to see photos that I can easily see if I use my laptop?!! Why when I actually cave and say fine I‚Äôll download JUST SO I CAN FLIP THROUGH PHOTOS, does the app crash??? Why would it be updating as soon as I download it?? Sooo many why‚Äôs. None of this makes any sense and makes me take a personal grudge towards yelp lol. It‚Äôs ridiculous. I wanna get the review, see the photos, notate which ones are helpful...but if I wanna stay on my phone I better get that app..not just utilize the mobile freaking version of the site. Everything about this irks me. Thank you anyway yelp.
title: Whyyyy(with fury)????

review:
Yelp has removed all 31 positive reviews(put it in not recommended section) for my business and left only one negative review in which the customer was not even the one receiving service and also using profanity.
When I contacted yelp they said that using profanity is ok because this is an adult site and customers have full rights to express their experience.
While I‚Äôm understanding the rights of free speech of this one person protected, how are the rights of the 31 other clients to  freely express their experience put in the do not recommend section.
I will never advertise with Yelp and I hope soon something can be done to protect small local businesses.
title: Reviews

review: Yelp is often about finding restaurants and other businesses which are NEW TO ME. Since a restaurant is likely to be unfamiliar to me, it is essential that it doesn‚Äôt disappear for no reason. Many many times I am about to drive to a new restaurant I had just spent a good deal of time looking up in order to decide to try, but when I get in my car and want to go to it, I open Yelp again and all I see is the home screen with no trace of the restaurant or my recent search history. The app should never have changed what was on it unless I wanted it changed.
title: Frustrating

review: We typically love going to Reilly‚Äôs and never have had issues doing impromptu work happy hours. For whatever reason the individuals that I spoke with both an employee and manager didn‚Äôt know their reservation policies, nor would they accommodate a group of 20 people to reserve a table ahead of time the day of even with table availability. I‚Äôve never experienced this and unfortunately it has left a bad taste in my mouth about this place. It‚Äôs too late to change our original location for tonight, but if you want to go somewhere that it is going to provide great customer service for your family or friends- I wouldn‚Äôt come here.
title: Happy Hour

review: What else can I say? Very useful to know ratings of places, however... Yelp should watch out for disgruntled people who impulsively give 1-star ratings. I‚Äôm not sure how yelp can monitor this, but I have seen some irrelevant reviews that complain about how far away a person may live from a business. If an individual is unhappy about how far away they live, they should not be allowed to make unrelated reviews that potentially damage the reputation of a business.
title: It‚Äôs yelp. Almost perfect.

review: Make this app a part of your decision making process. This is a powerful tool that puts consumers in control but also highlights great businesses. Reviews are continuous so no need in visiting a place that received 4.5 stars a year ago and operates at 2 star capacity today. Believe me, someone will have an up to date review and photos.
title: My go to for everything. The Virtual Yellow Pages and BBB reviews combined.

review:
I visited 3516 W. Airport Fwy, Irving Texas, June 27, 2019, for the first time. I received ‚Äúworld class service!‚Äù While the establishment was very busy, Rolando Galvan exceeded my expectations. He was courteous, professional and he took the time to educate me about my vehicle needs. 
  
In addition, David Martinez, provided outstanding service as well. He is truly a team player. They worked tirelessly to accommodate each and every customer. Great job, Discount Tire! I am a customer for life.
title: Senior Assistant Manager, Rolando Galvan & David Martinez

review:
Never pay for Yelp. I have many unsatisfied friends that are business owners that have been locked into very expensive contracts they can not get out of. If the business wants to go back to the basic free yeps service they can not and will loose their business page on yelp. Yelp posts your business is closed when the business stops using the service with Yelp. 
Then when people look for your service through Yelp, yelp marks your business as closed and misleads the public in thinking your business is gone out of business, for which your business has not gone out of business.
title: Business Owner

review: I got a new iPhone X at about the same time this last update happened. But same phone number, but my Yelp app literally has started over. It‚Äôs acting like I‚Äôve never had Yelp ever. All my reviews and friends and collections are gone. At least seven years of data wiped out. I‚Äôve uninstalled and reinstalled, and restarted my phone etc.  Nothing works.  üòûü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

review:
I have visited many times, but lately feel that the wait staff service is just minimal. Food arrives fast and is usually good, but good luck getting refills on anything because you will never see your waiter again. Last time there were several very aggressive flies that kept trying to share my food. When I told the man at the register he just smiled, laughed and that was it. 
I hope they correct this because they are truly a very good restaurant with the exception of these two items.
title: Need to work on service and environment.

review: My family and I were just there and thought both the food and service were top notch.  We ordered the seafood boil (wasn‚Äôt on the menu but our waiter informed us of it) which was outstanding.  Victor was our server and was very well informed.  They put a strong emphasis on customer service and verifying you are satisfied.  I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a place to eat.

review:
Went to a site that said I could see all 12 photos of a bookstore (only 3 were first available). So I clicked to see the nine more. NOTHING. NO PICS. Just this rating thingy of yours. You don‚Äôt want me to see the pics, JUST rate you instead!?!?!?! I would give you ZERO stars for this, if I could, but couldn‚Äôt add my disgust of the way your site and app really works! IT NEVER WORKS FOR ME! So there! 

This was my last review:  You are disgusting! I experienced a rude person a good time ago when you did a setup or promo in Whole Foods and never forgot it. Now you control your pop ups when I am looking for something else. Just tried 6 times and I DID NOT SUMMON YOU! Ugh!!!
title: Yelp Control ...

review: I appreciate how amazing Yelp‚Äôs service is to use and to find the best places to go. That said, I have rated Yelp 4 stars for not including an option to find unionized workplaces. I would absolutely expand to 5 stars if that were added. I really appreciate many of their recently added filters. In an era where organized labor is under constant attack, I would like to know where I can prioritize my patronage without having to google for 15 minutes. Thanks!
title: Mostly perfect

Thanks again and we hope to see you on Yelp!', 'modified': '2018-10-09T15:45:06Z'}

review: Always felt like I was taken advantage being a women getting any work done. Went to this place that I saw while out running errands. There was no wait. It was drive up, so I stayed with my vehicle the whole time. The technician explained everything he was doing, gave me options and explained each one. Showed me that things were done properly and correctly. Will be coming here from now on!

review:
This place is awesome!  Excellent quality, very people friendly customer service! 
Brought my truck and my wife‚Äôs Camry , Junior gave me a great deal both cars!  Perfectly done, I should have came sooner for other cars I‚Äôve owned.  I would highly recommend this business to  anyone!  No need to wait, my truck is so much cooler without a.c!  The shop workers are very experienced, you‚Äôll be very satisfied too! 
Thank you Junior! 

C.E. Ramirez
title: The Tint Shop , 11th/ Benson Ave.

review:
I‚Äôve long been frustrated with how when trying to user the Yelp app on a mobile browser, it forces you into the app via deeplink if you tap ‚ÄúRead More‚Äù to expand any review.  While that‚Äôs annoying enough, what‚Äôs worse is that it doesn‚Äôt even open the app to the review or business you were looking at, it just opens the app at the Yelp home screen.  Which for me always equals close app and give up.  Today, I figured I‚Äôd just delete the app and only use mobile browsers to avoid this.  But, nope.  It always sends you to the app store so there‚Äôs no way to expand reviews.  

Horrible horrible user experience.
title: Stop forcing users into the app

review: I really love ‚ù§Ô∏è yelp, have used for years. Lately I have been frustrated with being forced to put a business in collection whenever I want to bookmark and to make matters worse the collections are not alphabetized just In random order which takes even more time to locate a logical collection. Went into settings no option to turn off feature. I preferred yelp when it was user focused now it just feels like it‚Äôs all about collecting analytics and has lost it friendly user interface. Come back to the light Yelp.
userName: Use to be ur biggest app fan
title: Use to be my fav app until forced to use collections

review:
Yelp is my ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù app for everything. I mean everything! I check ratings for restaurants even before I enter the door. I check reviews of all kinds of businesses and services. 

I would be lost if it were not for Yelp. In fact, one of my fav parts of the app is that it allows me to check my current location. It‚Äôs been helpful to find good places while out of town for work (often). 

Yep for Yelp!
title: Yep for Yelp!

review: Very good I love how useful and convenient this app is.  I just put what I‚Äôm looking for and the reviews are what I pay attention to . Also pictures that other people have taken also help a lot it‚Äôs not your average google look up it actually shows you what is around even hidden spots in my area . It also supports the smalls businesses which is why I got this app in the first place. I love it
title: Helps small businesses

review:
Went there a few days ago.  Had a cheese-cherry pastry.  After eating about one-third of the pastry, found green spots of mold in the cheese.  Opened up the rest of the pastry and there were green mold all through it.  Took it back to counter where clerk seemed completely diffident to what I showed her.  Said she would ‚Äúspeak to the baker‚Äù but did not offer me my
Money back nor did she throw away the five remaining cherry cheese pastries.  I noted the cherry cheese pastries were not refrigerated nor were some other cheese pastries.  I asked for my money back and it was returned but only after I asked.  No apology of any kind.   Had considered buying my mom a strawberry shortcake and so glad I didn‚Äôt.
title: Cafe Bonjour

review: Sat there for 20 min when the host pointed to who our server was, then we watch that server pawn us off to another server who was in the  middle of talking to another table...mind you there was literally five servers chilling having a good time talking to a different manger ... totally disappointed in the service. Then this place advertised the Astros and Red Sox game and then to find out they closed at ten and turned the TVs off in the middle of the 8th inning!!! Why advertise for a game you can‚Äôt show till the end??? Won‚Äôt waste my time again to watch an Astros game on a ‚Äúbig new tv‚Äù that don‚Äôt exist, with bad service and a place that won‚Äôt show the full game!!
title: Bad service from Jorge Benitez

review: I purchased an S63 from there yesterday and it was an extremely smooth transaction. Ken the salesman was sincere, honest, inviting and professional. He didn‚Äôt come across as just trying to make the next sale. The entire staff greeted me to include the owner. Formula One Imports is a class act dealership, and frankly I don‚Äôt know how they can be topped. We can do business anytime, and I will have already highly recommend them to someone else.
title: Formula One Imports

review: My husband had written a negative review of Meerkat after a misunderstanding on rates. Very simple miscommunication. They have more than made it up to us with a comp visit to lay mouse traps, as well as a personal phone call from the owner explaining the error. I feel everybody is entitled to make a mistake and the proof of the pudding is how you handle it. Meerkat went above and beyond in their attempt to make me happy. I would recommend their service in a heartbeat.
title: Meerkat in Hudson

review: The Yelp app itself is pretty good and easy to use. My main complaint is when coming from safari, if you hit open in yelp it directs you to the App Store, which prompts you to open app. When Yelp opens it doesn‚Äôt open to the business you were looking at before, so you have to search it up again. It‚Äôs a little thing, but can be annoying bc I‚Äôm usually searching on safari first. If this were corrected my review would go to 5 stars, bc the app itself is great.
title: Disconnect when coming from safari

review: The only two things I dont like about Yelp is that They allow AI's to write fake 5 star reviews. Also, you cant filter for only the negative reviews. I read the negative reviews because they are REAL and I understand some people are just having a bad day. However, if there are several about the same thing such as cleanliness or rudeness of the staff then I make my decision on whether or not to visit that location.
title: Great app..

review:
Now that I‚Äôm traveling quite a bit for work I‚Äôm always using it for ideas on what to eat. 

Sometimes asking a local isn‚Äôt a great idea because some parts of the country just have bad food and they don‚Äôt know any better. 

My only wish is that I could somehow integrate it into the navigation app that I use. Seems like it‚Äôs hardwired to Apple maps and I can‚Äôt change it. (Apple Maps is crap)
title: Helpful

review: This app is no longer useful. I tried to search a specific area and all I got was places over 10 miles away. I know there is at least a dozen places in the area I was searching and I only saw three in the top 20. If I am searching a certain area I expect to see that certain area at the top. Not sending me 10 to 20 miles away. It would be nice if there was sorting options add it to the program to make it easier to search in a specific area instead of being pushed all over the place and out of the area you want to look!
title: All about the advertising

review:
Service, quality, service....did I mention awesome service. I purchased/commissioned a Carr II model for my daughter in 2016. The bass gets compliments from piers and music leaders alike. She plays weekly in three ensembles, so the bass is moved around quite a bit. She had a luthier give it a checkup after 1 1/2 years of use and the setup was still ‚Äúperfect,‚Äù in his words. Says all there is to say about the quality of craftsmanship that goes into Upton products!
Eric Tier
title: Service!!!!

review: I‚Äôve been going to Dr. Campano for around five years. She is the Best! I have Botox every 4 months and fillers every year or whenever I need them. She‚Äôs very gentle and does an extremely good job. She takes her position as a Doctor seriously. Yet she has the cutest and most down to earth personality!! I really love this Doctor. Also had cool sculpting twice works great! She‚Äôs in Palmdale and now has a Valencia office as well! üòäüòä I just pray I out live her! But I think I will. üòä
title: I Love Dr. Ru Campano

review:
My husband and I started coming in 1992 and because my husband loves the lazy river, we come back almost every year so 20 plus times. (I don't plan to return.) It has had very few updates and those were poorly done and are already in bad shape. The decor and furniture are original sadly. (Last year's couch had a mound in the center of the pillow like mold growing in it.  The fridge had ice so bad that it couldn't be used.  Tile was missing on bath walls.  
The park bathroom has no handicap bathroom which is bad.  Do not expect quality.
The lazy river and the buffet breakfast are the only good things, but they need help. The plaster is cracking in places on the lazy river. You will be disappointed.
title: Bad choice

review: My first time and all can say is WOW! The location in Cicero is bright, airy, and busy..but you would never know it. The welcome order techs are incredible and make you forget about the fast food rudeness. The chicken sandwich, my first, was delicious. Amelia- you were right- the sauce did add to the experience. The wait was short but well worth it. I will be a returning customer and will be telling everyone about my great experience. Jimmer, the Owner and his team‚ÄîWell Done!
title: Chick-fil-A

review: I finally stopped here to celebrate a graduation.  Food was delightful and beautiful . . . Well-portioned as well.  The waiter, Jeremy, was professional and attentive.  He made our night special.  I really wanted to eat inside but chose the patio bc if the weather and LOVED it!  Thanks for a wonderful night!  BTW, the restrooms were clean and well-maintained.  My go-to spot for future occasions and out-of-town company.  Don‚Äôt change a thing.
title: Fantastic food, charming atmosphere, wonderful waiter.

review: I LOVE THIS PLACE. My family and I came in 30 minutes to closing on Mother‚Äôs Day and they were so kind and greeted us. The service was amazing. The FOOD was sooooooo good. We‚Äôve tried the other poke bowl places in town and we were so happy to find this new gem. This one is def. our favorite poke bowl place in Chico. I will recommend to all friends and family and strangers. I love the variety options other than poke bowls. We will be back.
title: This place was AMAZING

review:
You have some of the most valuable data in the world. And you have one of the crappiest applications and flaky backends serving it.

As a traveler, I live and breathe yelp. 

We are left constantly waiting for data to load regardless of how fantastic your Internet connection might be. Their back end is simply unable to handle the current usage.

Reviews and photos are not listed by date so they have zero relevance. 

They post to Facebook even when you have that feature turned OFF.

And they force you to use Apple Maps. No one wants to use Apple‚Äôs stupid maps app, ok. 

Yelp is proof that you can be absurdly stupid, and still get your app into the App Store. 

There is so much this app could do with all this data. But we have uncreative, lazy developers that just don't care about their own application anymore. And nothing changes. They only update to market their app. There is no development anymore. Someone needs to buy them out.
title: Possibly the worst developers in the world

review: Yelp disables so many features in their mobile site that they force you to download this app. Want to read a full review? Hyperlink to app store. Want to see photos? Hyperlink to app store. Features and searches? You get the point. I don't want more apps on my phone. I actually prefer the mobile site. This is the only business I have ever come across that literally forces customers to download their lame app. Also it seems like almost everytime I post a negative review on Yelp it gets deleted. Many other reviewers have said the same thing. Positive reviews stay, negative reviews get deleted. It's a very corrupt platform.
title: Forced by Yelp to download unwanted app

review:
Dear Yelp, 
I use you for everything! I honestly forget I have a separate app called Google Maps to look up addresses :) but hey, by using you I also get reviews and coupons in the same go! Such a convenient tool! Really don't know what I would do if you were gone one day! So don't leave me. Okay? Okay. Good talk. 
Love,
Ms. Stage 5 Yelp Clinger
Ps. Maybe try to update menus and business info a little bit more often, thanks!
title: Can't live without you!

review: It's fast and user friendly! One of my favorite apps. I use Yelp daily. I love the ROTD's(reviews of the day). I truly enjoy the Yelp monthly events and the Yelp Elite events at different restaurants. Places I might not of known about before. I enjoy meeting new people through Yelp events and on the site. I always use Yelp to locate different businesses, or to call. Kudos' to YELP! Our Jacksonville Community Manager, Matt C. Is da bomb! The best we've ever had. Give that man a raise!
title: Review of Yelp

review: I use Yelp quite a bit, and if t weren't for recent events I would have given a much better review. My family orders food through Yelp at least a couple times per week. Our last orders were not processed, and there was no notification. So, we sat here waiting for food for over an hour before digging through the app to see that food ordering was not available. So maybe don't let people place orders, enter payment info, and click process order. Poor functionality.
title: Food order fail

review: My friends recently took me here for dinner, knowing that I love Paella. The place is charming and one feels like you're visiting family in Spain. The staff is most friendly and willing to please. The starters are most popular and reasonably priced. The sangria was delicious. The Paella Marinera was presented beautifully with the classic lobster topping the delicious rice dish! The desserts were authentic and the whole experience was reminiscent of  my trip to Spain last year! Kudos to this great gem in Newark!
title: Amazing Food at a Great Value

review: Walked in for a nice family breakfast, guy at the front was trying to rush out on his electric scooter (blocking the walkway). We were set at a table crammed in with other families while 3/4 of the restaurant was empty. Half the booths were dirty. We set for about 15 minutes and no one came to get our drink order. We decided to leave to get food somewhere else. No one even asked why we were leaving. We nicely said, ‚Äúwe‚Äôll try again another time‚Äù and all the manager in the blue shirt said could muster up was ‚Äúare you sure?‚Äù - hahaha are you sure? They wouldn‚Äôt serve us and acted confused when we left. Pitiful.
title: Christmas Eve Tragedy

review: I was building clients in a new location while I was only seeing existing clients in the old. One review was posted in the new location prior to the official move. Yelp promised to merge my listings, but that girl moved on. Everyone else at yelp screwed me over by not merging the two and calling it a move they continued to charge me for a listing that only had one review versus the one that had over 20. I repeatedly asked for it to be reviewed but after 1.5 years they said No. messed me up. Clinets dont see me anymore as there is no point paying for one review to be advertised.  Still begging for help.
title: Screwed up my business.

review: Yelp is not only a platform where you can leave reviews. Yelp is a vessel. A source of community. A way to get the word around on new experiences whether they be food related, experiences, occasions, Yelp allows us to find exactly what we need. Date night spots, fun community events. Where you can support your own and endless others! I absolutely love and appreciate Yelp.
title: Yelp is amazing

review:
We have eaten at many restaurants, this was a good experience . We went to Deanie‚Äôs on Sunday the food was delicious and we had the Best Server we had in a long time . Her name was 
‚ÄúFelicia‚Äù she was Fantastic ! we didn‚Äôt have to ask for refill on our drinks. She brought it before we ran out. The food was delicious when we go back to Deanie‚Äôs,we will make sure to ask for Felicia.
title: Fantastic Service

review: I for therapy on Jog road. They were all so wonderful and helped with the pain.  Taylor and Lori were terrific both were traveling therapist.  Such a shame they taught me a lot how to help myself.  The rest of the therapist are good anxious to see if the take the time and understanding of older people and the changing pain. I highly recommend this place And Ed is a great guy really understanding. Thank you so much for your help.
title: Wow!!

review:
Dr. Fries is the best.  I was so nervous about getting these two teeth pulled. I was so nervous I almost walked out. 

After talking to the Assistant, she made me feel better. I cannot believe how quick he got these teeth out.  Long story short, I had braces. Braces broke my bridge and broke the teeth all the way down to the root.  

I was so upset with the fact that I now lost my bridge. Dr. Fries came in talk to me, numb to me very slowly, and then proceeded.. 

After the first tooth was out, he let me wait and sat me up until I was ready to proceed.

10 minutes later, the second tooth was out. 

I just want to give that whole office a round of applause a great big shout out.

Thank you Dr. Fries for being patient with me. 

Cheers,

Elena
title: Great Experience

review:
Pam at the Glastonbury CT location is always our waitress. We always ask for her table and we know our service will be excellent. She knows our drink orders and delivers them immediately. 
She has an excellent knowledge of the menu!!
We appreciate all she does for us with her knowledge of what we like and what we might want to order.  Our food is always hot and right.  
Thanks so much Pam.
title: Fridays

review:
I‚Äôve used this since the beginning, and love that new features are added regularly‚Ä¶ which is why I‚Äôm surprised there‚Äôs still no ‚Äúlive activity‚Äù feature when you place a (food) delivery order. 

Hopefully, that feature will be implemented soon instead of constantly having to check the app for updates.
title: Love It!

review: Went there for a singles activity. Waited for over an hour after orders were placed. One of our group was told that being a bigger group, they were prioritizing the smaller groups.  Food was a 4. Service was a -. It took 25 min to get a water refill after I asked for a refill. Then, they tried to charge an automatic 18% gratuity since we were ‚Äúsitting together‚Äù without telling us. Some of them had left tips on the table. I am generally a 20%+ tipper when the service is good. After speaking to the manager, my tip was returned.  I‚Äôm not sure if I‚Äôll ever go back‚Ä¶, but definitely not with a group.
title: Disappointed

review: I recently had the pleasure of receiving massage therapy from a skilled professional, focused on pain management. The therapist's intuitive touch and tailored approach effectively targeted my specific areas of discomfort. Their expertise not only provided relief but also left me with a heightened sense of relaxation. I highly recommend this massage therapist for anyone seeking a holistic and effective approach to pain management.
title: "Pain-Relief Mastery: A Transformative Massage Experience"

review: What can I say? This place kills it by far. OMG!!!!! We came here when we were headed home after I yelped a place to eat like I always do. I ordered the asada enchiladas with eggs and choribeans and hubby ordered the chilaquiles with eggs. Salsa was bomb. Oscar was our waiter and he was super attentive and nice. Don‚Äôt know when I‚Äôll be back since we‚Äôre not from this area but definitely recommend it. Thanks Oscar

The app is now unusable. 

For the past few months the Yelp app hasn‚Äôt allowed me to add to or access my lists. I get an error message whenever I go to my profile. (‚ÄúSorry, we couldn‚Äôt complete your request. Please try again in awhile‚Äù) It keeps telling me on the home page that it works better if I turn on location. 

I have deleted and reinstalled the app multiple times. I‚Äôm so sad I‚Äôve lost all of my lists. Screw yelp and the high horse they rode in on where they extort small businesses and also expect their users to divulge private information.

review: I had an emergency with my dog and brought him here for care. I honestly thought he was going to die. Everyone over here was so caring and kind and helpful. I would recommend this place and would consider returning.

review: Noticed the sign when we walked in that basically said pack your patience, we are short handed and can‚Äôt get people to work due to government handouts. Sat down, looked at menus. Waited. Waited. No problem. We will play some songs on jukebox. Played 3. Still not even acknowledged. Looked like only one guy was working and every time we looked over he was talking to people at the bar. He finally came over and said - be right with you. We smiled and said okay. And then waited. Waited. Total time at restaurant = 28 mins. We left. Went to Rose‚Äôs River Tavern. SO much better! They even had Bingo (Wednesday night).

review: I‚Äôve been going to Flo‚Äôs since I was a child. We lived a few blocks away so we went there a lot in the summer. I‚Äôm a senior now and like to go for the clam cakes. The last two times which was recent the clam cakes were barely warm and had shells in them. The second time which was yesterday the clam cakes were hot but still had hard crunchy pieces in them and the chowder was 75% broth, barely a potato. I will definitely not be going there any more this season. What a shame! Service to take the orders is getting extremely slow too!

review: Approx 2 hour wait time on a Tuesday morning. Went in for a sprained ankle and the doctor verbally said he could participate in PE as he felt better, then wrote a note that essentially said he could not participate in anything which means not even sit ups. For an ankle sprain. That we had to do ANOTHER doctor visit‚Ä¶ which means another bunch of $$$ and day off school and waiting at another office just to approve a note that said ANY PE was not banned altogether and he could participate as he felt better. I regret taking him here and should have just given him a couple days and a home written note myself.
title: We went here for a sprained ankle-

review:

They genuinely cared about making me happy and they did! I will not hesitate to use again and highly recommend them.

Barbara

review: Unprofessional, careless, irresponsible, that‚Äôs how they were with me, I took my car to service to fix one tire, rim, and something underneath, they replaced the 4 tires when It only need 1to be replaced, when I asked why they just said ups it was a mistake on my estimate but I sent it to you, sorry we can‚Äôt do anything, can I have my other 3 tires I asked (tires had 15,000 miles on it from 60,000 miles rated) the answer was ups sorry they are gone. review: Passed this place too many times before finally stopping to have lunch. My partner and I had the Chicken burrito and the Chicken Empanadas, with the cheese sauce and chips. review:

review:
Pearl nail and spa is my favorite nail salon in the North Shore and I have tried a lot of them. Phoebe takes great care of my ingrown toenail, she is professional, kind and does a great job. Everyone else is great there too. I have sent so many people and everyone had the highest praises. 
The salon is big, beautiful and very clean. I go every 3 weeks and I love it. Try it and you will love it too

review: I ran to Alteration Specialists in a panic, having less than a full day to get a suit hemmed for an event 48 hours later. It was a gamble I thought I'd for sure lose. review:

I texted him to ask when he could come back to secure the rod and his response was not until the following week. 4 days later, he was scheduled to arrive at 8 am and at 9 he was still MIA. No call, no text. I texted him and asked where he was. Sorry, I can‚Äôt come until 3 today. Fine, I said. You can probably figure out the rest. 
I will never use this service again.

review:

review:
Recently, I‚Äôve become aware of Yelp‚Äôs ridiculous policy of exposing ‚Äúracist‚Äù restaurants.

review:
Event:  50th anniversary Rome reunion
We came from everywhere for what is

Location easy enough to get to. Event held in handsome, wood paneled banquet room.  
Service perfunctory and brisk, not as professional as promised- all first and second courses brought out at the same time, crowding the 10 top tables.  Hurrying us along.
Food adequate but not wonderful in any way.  Checked the boxes and served. Dessert sloppily presented and the coffee was particularly weak. 
The evening was overwhelmed by a loud band and boisterous wedding party in the adjacent room.  Our guests were loudly speaking across the tables in an effort to  meet and greet.  No effort was made to accommodate our event.  
I‚Äôm sorry but it‚Äôs almost a zero star review due to the management‚Äôs disregard of our event and needs for a conversational environment. 
Not not not a place for excellent food or ambiance!
Find somewhere else to go or check to see if there‚Äôs a wedding already scheduled.  Otherwise forget this place. Poor management.

review:
Shame on you Yelp for controlling and influencing what reviews are easily read about businesses. 

Unfortunately, Yelp is the only platform that I‚Äôve come across that filters reviews by hiding both positive or negative reviews.

Yelp is a directory that requests the consumer to review a business and then doesn‚Äôt treat all reviews equally. They claim their automated filter is there to hide and protect us from automated reviews. Instead, they hid reviews that are left because someone wanted to voice their experience. It is unfair and frustrating for both consumers and small businesses. 

- Yelp should not dictate what reviews are readily available.
- Yelp should not have a grayed button at the bottom of the screen that has to be found in order to read the hidden reviews.
- Yelp should not influence what reviews are available to the public.
- Yelp should not be able to decide what review is real, fake, or worthy of being visible.

Good and bad, all should be readily available.
title: Dictating reviews

title: Veggie thin crust pizza

review: My family used Moving Ahead for our move just this past week.  I can not even begin to explain the amazing professionalism, hard work and great service we experienced with this company. The guys were fast, neat and respectful.  They worked together as a team and moved us with ease. Nothing arrived broken and we couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied. I highly recommend using Moving Ahead.
title: Moving ahead

review: I have so many different waxes but she is the best.  I opened up about my pr wax rituals, and she was so honest. I love her I feel like we are friends. I would never go anywhere else, I actually told my nail people about her. Btw it‚Äôs not all her they have so many services in a very zen environment. Come in and tell them Carrie sent you. I don‚Äôt know more than I can say right now. But I‚Äôm getting some eyebrow work on Wednesday, I will update!
title: Stephanie, is awesome!

review: We ordered granite for our bathroom and was very pleased with service and help. But when we realized we were short one piece we went back to order more they told us two weeks for the new piece. So we waited and waited. 3 weeks later we called and no one could find the order. And the girl on the phone kept on saying she would call back and let us know when it would be ready. She stopped answering the phone when I called and when my husband called main office they said they could do it in three weeks!!! My husband needs the piece to continue to work on the bathroom!!!! Going somewhere else now!!! Very aggravated!!!
title: Atlantis granite

review: We travel several months each year and use Yelp to find great places to eat and enjoy during our exploration of the USA and the world. I can honestly say that no resource has been more valuable than Yelp!! Of course, we sort by ratings and look for over 100 reviews before we make a decision, but Yelp has very seldom been off the mark. Great app, and thanks to all the great reviews that Yelpers have written!!!
title: Yelp is da bestest!!!

review: This app along with the website need to do some major work with dealing with fake reviews both positive and negative. I cant trust anything on Yelp and have better results asking locals than using the apps. Also I've found other sites/apps like trip advisor to have more honest reviews with less trolls (for now).  Something sites and apps like Yelp should do is verify that the people writing reviews have actually been to the business. Right now someone from half way around the world could write a review and Yelp will do nothing to validate or protect the integrity of the reviews left about a business.
title: Frustrated by the number of fake reviews

review: Sandra and her staff did a fantastic job for our rehearsal dinner. The service and food was exceptional! The front room and patio area was perfect for our dinner. Everyone at Parker‚Äôs was very professional and friendly and eager to make sure our evening was everything we wanted it to be. They were very accommodating! The steaks were excellent and our guests were extremely complementary of the evening! Highly recommend Parker‚Äôs for a dinner event.
title: Rehearsal Dinner-Exceeded our Expectations

review: The waitstaff was very friendly and the food was amazing! We started with the BBQ shrimp as an appetizer. My husband and I shared the seafood platter, which was more than enough food. Our friends had the classic burger and Mardi Gras pasta. Everything was delicious. I had a Bloody Mary which was also delish!!! We will most definitely return. Our waiter Chandler took really good care of us. Took dessert to go but haven't tried it yet, too stuffed right now.
title: Great food & service

review: Yelp has been a great tool to help in being a more informed consumer. I've had nothing but great experiences in using Yelp and the Yelp app. If you shopping for anything and want to get a feel for a business you may be working with, the Yelp app is a must. Not only have I benefited from using it, I've helped several friends avoid some close calls. Use it and you'll appreciate you did.
title: Awesome Consumer Shopping Help!

review:
I LOVE this app, use it frequently to look for places to eat & also check out pics to decide on meals.  
HOWEVER, wish the Bookmark section was better.  I Bookmark a lot of places (recommendations, places w/ good reviews, etc) Would be so much useful if i can type in City of places I have in bookmarked section & only those would pop up.  Only searches with names & type of cuisine pop up currently.  
Fix it and I‚Äôll update it to give you 5 stars!   Really hope someone is listening....
title: Love Yelp, but Bookmark section is not good

review: I love this app, but the updated one resets to the top of photos page after you've viewed on photo! So a popular place that has 500 photos, if you scroll and see something you like and click on it, it will reset to the top of the page after you've viewed the photo. I already scrolled through 50+ that I don't want to see and have to do it again. It discourages me to look at all the photos since I'll have to scroll all the way back down to find where I left off!
title: Please fix photo scroll

review:
I enjoy using Yelp, but the check-in button is now gone from the home page. 
Used to be you could open the app, hit the button, and the business would be one of the three closest to you. 
Now, you have to actively search for the business by name, and check in. Sometimes, the location isn‚Äôt even in the top three; supplanted, I‚Äôd suspect, by businesses who‚Äôve paid for presence. It takes too long. 
I‚Äôve definitely checked in less, and may discontinue using this app.
title: Check in button

review: Started as a fun thing to do to share the experience, moved into being able to truly see your journey with food, and now I want to do more and really provide information to help others with the experience. Looking foreard for this next step in utilizing a great platform as it is intended. I just needed to be ready to see it potential! Thank you Yelp!
title: Share more

review: In August of 2022  I visited this establishment The COFFEE HOUSE by Chomp and I was fortunate to be served by the owner Amber. I told her the shop had a great smell of precious coffee. She then told me to try the French Riviera Blend and I did, from that point on I just got stuck on that rich robust flavor, from that point every time I visit Solvang, Ca. I must come back home with 2 packages of coffee as I visit Solvang, Ca. Every 3 to 4 months in the year. Her snack also incredible.
title: Jozy

review: This is the third visit where I noticed that this location is struggling.  Their signature beer, Dirty Blonde, was out for the third straight visit.  It looks like they are trying to manage struggling food costs.  The Twin Peaks sampler was so empty, very little of the fried pickles and mozzarella blocks: you can tell they‚Äôre using some measurement for pirtion control now.  The hamburger patties are now some frozen patty and not handmade, making the size of hamburgers look depressingly small.  Someone from corporate is controlling inventory, and the result is horrible.  Expect Twin Peaks to disappear from the Chicago market just like Tilted Kilt disappeared years ago.
title: Twin peaks is struggling

review: I would like customer service to be able to address issues when we leave reviews and the business tells us to remove the review because we have done something that we have not done.  Yelp should address these businesses properly and legally.  Yelp is getting away with a lot imo by not dealing with real issues.
title: Customer service for direction when leaving a review and being told be the business to take it down.

review: I recently had the pleasure of experiencing Erica's service, and I must say it was perfect. From start to finish, she was attentive, professional, and genuinely cared about making sure everything was just right. Her attention to detail and willingness to go above and beyond truly set her apart. I highly recommend Erica for anyone looking for top-notch service. She exceeded all my expectations!
title: Erica‚Äôs excellence service

review: I have been a fairly active Yelp user for over 13 years and one day I was not able to post any reviewers and pictures without any explanation. I tried to call Yelp customer service number but apparently the number is exclusively for Yelp business and the representative simply directed me to Yelp support center. I also tried Yelp account inquiry and did not even hear back from them. It is unfortunate that all of customer support goes to business side and Yelp completely ignores the most important base - their consumers and regular users.
title: No Customer Service for Yelp Consumer Account
developerResponse: {'id': 48003615, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to review the Yelp app. You can reach our team directly here for assistance with any questions, comments, or concerns: https://bit.ly/3mOxzpv', 'modified': '2024-11-06T19:25:14Z'}

review:
This was so good I wasn‚Äôt expecting this in Orland. The service was amazing we wanted for nothing. The ambiance was perfect the interior decor is so on point. The food was so amazing we left saying we are for sure coming back again. And the spicy mayo was so good. We loved the potstickers. This is definitely going on our list of favorites. 
I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this place.
title: Amazing must try

review: I called to ask for assistance with an electric recliner that wouldn‚Äôt recline. I knew it might be likely that furniture stores only service items purchased in their stores, but Sondra at the Pensacola store gave me the name and number for someone I could contact. I spoke with her manager, Jeff, and explained that we had bought from Hank‚Äôs many times and would remember their help and friendliness when it was time to purchase new furniture!
title: Helpful Service

review: We went over to Naruto and it was just a small gem. Great food. Three of us popped in just for a quickie and ended up being pleasantly surprised. We started off with three nicely cooked beers and dipped into the spring rolls which were perfectly golden and and some Takoyaki. Nice. From there we had Shashimi, a yummy roll, Dumpling ramen, BBQ pork ramen and some seafood fried rice. There was not one complaint ya‚Äôll. We will be back. Thumbs up!
title: Great Time

review:
We had a wonderful dinner at Morton‚Äôs steakhouse.  The steak was phenomenal and seasoned very well. Our meals came out quickly. Our server Nick was very attentive and personable. He made our experience more enjoyable. Of note, the Apple margarita was delicious. This is the first time I had it and I will definitely get another one next time. We will be back again.

Thanks for exceptional service!
title: Morton‚Äôs steakhouse

review: Very pretty restaurant, waiters nice. Food not so much. I ordered the eggplant  rotellini and my husband pasta in vodka sauce. His was fine (not great). Mine was black on top and tasted burnt, the middle was warm and the bottom cold. Seemed like something frozen precooked and warmed up in an oven. When I told our waitress it was burnt I  got comment ‚Äúoh really‚Äù not an apology, no action, no explanation nothing! I left way more than half of my food so it was obvious something was wrong. Anyway, nice meeting you Capriccio but won‚Äôt be seeing you again!
title: Capriccio restaurant at Blue Lagoon

review:
Soul play offers amazing classes for all levels and styles (strong flow, restorative, beginner, meditative, vinyasa flow, Pilates, strength training with weights & SO much more!) 
Additionally, soul play is a wonderful, safe and welcoming community where everyone is welcome and invited to practice in a way that works for them, whatever their needs or goals are for that day, Brooke & all the teachers are AMAZING! And I‚Äôm so thankful to be a part of this special place!
title: Soul playa yoga

review: I every time I come here I get the Singapore noodles, the orange chicken and the chicken fried barbecue rice on the Singapore noodles I get with the chicken and the shrimp and I‚Äôm telling you it is delicious. I am never disappointed in the delivery guy. His hair is so pretty. It‚Äôs always perfectly permed. I‚Äôve been ordering from here for at least 10 years and it‚Äôs always good. I‚Äôve never been disappointed.
title: The Singapore noodles are on fire

review: Whenever I‚Äôm about to go eat or check out a location I instantly go to this site. It has introduced me to a lot of different things that I may not have chosen on my own without doing some further digging. So overall I appreciate the folks that take their time to leave a comment and take pictures. Keep up the great work folks!
title: My Go To

review:
Mistakes happen but the manager at the Beavercreek Ele bakery really made up! She gave us a free substitute cake and unicorn candle when our granddaughters cake hadn‚Äôt arrived at the store. When the cake we ordered arrived  she delivered it to our home which was Mid-party and just in time for the birthday girl to have her gorgeous delicious cake! ( the extra one will work for her actual birthday during the week!)
Thank you for saving the day!!
title: Ele Bakery, Beavercreek Ohio

review:
I am a a small business owner. Been constantly contacted by sales from Yelp to add advertising for a low daily fee. Been asking them to stop doing pushing this and will get in touch at the appropriate time. 

What happened next? They kept calling me and now suddenly I do not have any reviews on my site due to ‚Äúsoftware review system‚Äù. 40+ people had reviewed my business for months, why would software think they were fake? Also, do not even have a yelp logo or anything related to it. 

Only after I told them to stop calling and bothering me, this happened. üôÑ
title: Sales team needs help ASAP

review: My daughter and her fiance went in to purchase a diamond and a wedding band.  They are 24.  After a few negotiations they were advised when picking up the ring that they owed money.  That was not the case.  It was paid in full and it was a mistake in their part.  But that was after a lot of back and forth.  Now the wedding band shows up sized to my daughters finger and it doesn‚Äôt match the engagement band.  So they returned it and was charged a restocking fee!  It was in the cabinet!  What a rip off.  Then the owner assists them and she is not helpful and not courteous either.  Beware- this business is NOT what it claims!
title: Poor customer advice and guidance

review: I had high hopes for this place and was very disappointed!  They brought chips and salsa to the table and never told us it was $1.99 for them!   In addition the chips were overcooked so they were hard and burnt so we ate very few.    We ordered fajitas to split and they brought 3 small shells (didn‚Äôt ask if we needed more).  The meat and veggies had no fajita seasoning so it was very bland.  When they brought the bill they had tacked on 3% before they knew if I was paying with cash or credit.  I love Mexican food so I go out frequently for it and this was my first and last time for this place!
title: Disappointed

review: I ran in to get some supplies for a 90th birthday party. The manager was awesome. He personally walked around with me suggesting items that would make our event more special and memorable. His staff was the most helpful and well trained I have ever experienced. Best Party City I have ever been to. Organized, friendly, well-trained staff. I was so impressed. I do not live here but on the east coast.  Thank you for all your help.
title: Best Party City Ever

review: Wow this place was fun. Went in to use the indoor Range and shoot some automatic guns we do not have access to back home. The gentleman working there we‚Äôre terrific. This was my son first time shooting a fully automatic and the employees were very professional and helpful. I have been to many gun ranges and this is one of the friendliest ones yet. Great store and great employees. Thanks for the experience.
title: Great experience

review: My nephew wanted to meet me here I have never been. Looked at the menu the night before. Couldn‚Äôt wait to get some lemon, blueberry pancakes. Met them there got my pancakes. They were delicious. I would definitely go back again. The service was fantastic. The place was clean. I would definitely recommend it to all my friends can‚Äôt wait to come back.
title: Fabulous Gem

review: I visit this one every day and there is seldom a problem, staff are very friendly, they learned my name, and always get fast, efficient service, when anything goes wrong they are quick to correct, the Sip club and rewards really add up fast and therefore I Usually get a very good price, love sitting outdoors as well in just about every season, so it‚Äôs ideal in every way.
title: Excellent

review: I chose Rosati‚Äôs over Beggars in Plainfield today. I am so conflicted about eating this slice of pizza I just purchased because  I can‚Äôt believe the ( nice) woman at the front who I observed cleaning/ working/ straightening up in the bar area as I walked in came around ( I am quite sure she did not wash her hands) to serve me and she lifted my slice of pizza out of the  tray with her bare hands. I kid you not no gloves in sight. She really thought that was okay to do.  To top it off the pizza was cold and when I commented about it, she said it was okay something is wrong with their pizza warmer but it is good. I just wasted $5.17 because  I will have to throw it away now.
title: Conflicted

review: I had contacted two Mexicans and made an appointment to obtain a quote for ground cover removal and a large honeysuckle bush. I was immediately contacted and the appointment set. Today they provided the service, Marcus came and did a beautiful job in the removal and cleanup. I could not be happier. This young man really put great effort into making my dream for my front yard come true. I am so happy. Extremely reasonable! Thank you, Sandy Cowell.
title: Two Mexicans

review: This store is stocked very well the only problem is when you walk in it stinks the toxic fake fragrance of a nasty plug in or scentsy is so overbearing I get physically sick going in the store to shop! Ugh it would be better to get rid of that nasty fake smell and just let it smell natural if pet food instead then I can give it 5 stars too
title: I would give 5 stars if they would get rid of synthetic fragrance

review:
Was interested in a Jeep Wrangler. Sales guy totally unmotivated. Zero patience and unwilling to give me information. Only push push push.
As I told them that this is very unpleasant they was laughing. 
Went next day to Miami Lakes Jeep on 826 next to CarMax. Totally different story. Nice friendly people. I felt welcome and a young Sales Guy approached me. He showed me different models and explained the pro and cons. I did not buy that day but went back the next day and got a 2023 Willys Hybrid Wrangler. They offered me a good deal and I am really happy. Don‚Äôt wast your time with Hollywood Jeep. By the way, the name of the young sales guy at Miami Lakes Jeep is Mateo.
title: Bad experience, totally unprofessional.

review: When we are away from home we use Yelp to find the local favorites or if we‚Äôre passing though we use it to find the closest. Also we use yelp at home to find places we haven‚Äôt been to or haven‚Äôt been to in a while. I like that tell the hours. I hate traveling to a place and find they‚Äôre closed.
title: My go to app for restaurants

review: I had several scuffs on my car from parking lots. I booked an appointment with Phoenix 36 Detailing online. I received an immediate booking confirmation. They showed up on time and made my car look brand new. They were very polite and professional. I‚Äôm saving their number in my favorites. I will definitely use them again and refer them to everyone I know!!! Excellent job!!
title: Phoenix 360 Detailing

review: Definitely the best kept secret in North Georgia! We have been riding our Jeeps right past this place for years. A friend told us about it last weekend so we went to check it out. So glad we did! You will not find a better value anywhere! The food is excellent, beer is cold, prices are low and service is outstanding! Loved it!!!
title: Outstanding food and service!

review: We arrived at 10pm and they were so kind to sit us down. We spent the day at the beach and were really hungry. They were super friendly and informative, helps us to decide what to eat and gave us good recommendations because WE LOVED THE PASTA AND THE ROS√à. It was our friend‚Äôs birthday and we sang and laughed. What a great experience! It was our last night in Italy and they made it the perfect last meal! ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüèºüé∂ü•∞ thank you!
