review: Wanted a new Apple Watch Band. Went upstairs to second floor, was directed back to first floor and told they are on display and any associate can get the desired band for us. So we went back down only to be told to go back to second floor as there was no one that could assist on the first floor. Folks working there were more occupied with telling stories about their weekend than assisting. Terrible.  Employees didn‚Äôt even acknowledge customers. Should definitely form a Union to ensure this poor treatment of prospective customers can continue unabated.
title: Poor Customer Service

review: We‚Äôve been coming to this daylight a couple times a month for years. The owner Amy is so sweet and always remembers us. I am annoyingly picky when it comes to donuts and these are the best I‚Äôve had in Tulsa. They are always fresh when we‚Äôve gone and are absolutely delicious. We also get the birthday donuts for our kids to take to school and the designs are so detailed and beautiful!
title: Best donuts in Tulsa

review: Not only was it easy to get same day appointment, the service was the very best I have experienced. I recently lost my husband and he always did all this stuff, and I was very relieved at the ease and quickness of it all. Also, the very kind man pointed out a few things needed to be addressed in future for my sons truck. Restored my faith in humanity, and the price was very low!
title: Wonderful above and beyond! üôåüèªüôåüèªüôåüèª

review:
Want to improve the app, separate the ratings of those the take-out/delivery vs the dine-in customers.   Have a separate logo for restaurants that claim their business on your app. 
And MOST IMPORTANTLY : instead of looking up RESTAURANTS, have a section where I can look up the food item and compare prices. Example: tonight I am in the mood for chicken parm and spaghetti!  I would prefer to compare that menu item by price instead of looking at each restaurant.
title: Look up by food item, not by restaurant.

review: Honestly it‚Äôs so helpful in trying to pick a restaurant. I always look at reviews and see what the people like. Sometimes you have trolls that aren‚Äôt happy with anything so you have to filter out the reviews that don‚Äôt make sense but all in all I love this app. I have all my fav restaurants and places bookmarked so when people visit I have some fav go to places.
title: Such a gem of an app!

review: Went here to see how close They were to authentic NJ bagels. They nailed it. Been a regular since.  Their bacon and egg breakfast bagel was freshly made -no precooked heated egg there. Freshly cooked. Great breakfast sandwich. Will be trying their other breakfast and lunch sandwiches soon. My husband also agreed their bagels better than competitors.  Staff is great. Always cheerful. Greeted warmly. Very efficient. Owner even comes out to greet patrons. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.
title: Sclafanis Bagels

review: There just aren‚Äôt words enough to describe how thankful I‚Äôve been over the years for Theresa and her staff! Even as a military family, I could call and know they could help. We‚Äôve fought everything from colds to infertility with natural healing methods that God intended. Ever so grateful that I literally pray for their safe operation and provision. Don‚Äôt hesitate- just go.
title: You will always get well after a visit here

review: This bar is fraud . Dont go there especially if you are a tourists . We ordered two beers ,left 5 bucks tips and next morning she updated my tips to 30. This is insane ,they probably hoping that people is so drunk there or something so they wouldn't notice. Such a scam . We wasn't drunk and this is redicilus updated tips by themselves . I called them to figure it out but they are ignoring my voicemail multiple times. They even responded on Google reviews that they never got those voicemails. Stay away from that place! If they can update tips and no one controls it it's could be any amount.
title: Fraud

review: These people have worked hard and earned a wonderful reputation! They work to please each and every customer, one at a time! I have an old 2000 Isuzu Rodeo 185+k and I will be their customer for life. The folks at T and T Auto Center are honest and deserving of my trust! They always treat me with respect and take great care of my vehicle for a very fair price, in a timely manner!
title: T and T Auto Center LLC is the Only Auto Care I Need!!!

review:
Yelp has been vital in helping to choose what to eat in the many restaurants around my area for the past couple years but now that app just seems to have gotten worse!
They‚Äôre missing some nice restaurants when searching and now very often, not rare, the app crashes a couple minutes into usage. The app is now infuriating to use with the freezing so I have uninstalled. I‚Äôm gonna miss those nice detailed yelp reviews but the app developers need to improve or leave it as it was before.

review: My husband and I took the kids here on Tuesday night to try something new & boy are we glad! The attendant was very nice and didn‚Äôt seem bothered by us taking our time to figure out the menu. we all got the soft serve in the ‚Äúfish‚Äù cone, and word to the wise, it‚Äôs a lot of soft serve! Easily could have split it between two adults. 10/10, we will be back to try more yummy treats!!
title: Hidden gem!

review: I‚Äôm appalled that I even downloaded this god awful app. I bet forcing me to download this app and write the review is so much better than just using yelp in browser. Too bad the devs won‚Äôt allow users to use yelp for anything more than a sneak peek at actual reviews. review: So much more than books! It‚Äôs truly a community resource and gathering place. The foyer holds a bounty of information on dozens of entities and events. Inside you can borrow ebooks, cds, dvds or print books. You can work a crossword puzzle, read or bring home magazines of every description or go on-line with your computer or theirs. Oh, and the staff is very friendly and helpful.
title: Cottonwood Public Library

review: Ahhmazing service, incredible dining experience, astute and knowledgeable servers,and chefs, ‚Ä¶but not just servers- people who truly desire that we have the best moments of ‚Äúfoodie loves‚Äù‚Ä¶ seriously, come see Anthony at Bistro by The Tracks! Not only will you be wowed but you will leave feeling more at peace with a tumultuous world around you that is crying out for a good glass of wine‚Ä¶or an Old Fashioned-inspired cheesecake!
title: Bistro By The Tracks Is Right on Track~~Knoxville, TN

review: I worked in the salon as a hairstylist. I loved working there with the residents The staff was very nice and compassionate to everyone. They are on top of health concerns. I started in October 2019 till March 2020. There were signs about Corvus-19 in the elevators and when you got off the elevator there was another sign with a satirizing station. I just want them to know they did an excellent job of preparing with getting the word out
title: Excellent Place

review: The girl/lady that did my massages was amazing.  Very few masseuses can find your trouble spots without you telling them.  She did a great job of finding and working them out.  She did ask several times if I was ok, sunce I had ask for deep tissue work.  It is rare to find a masseuse that really seems to care.  A lot of them just seem robotic to me.  I will be back anytime I am in the area.
title: Amazing!

review: I met Kevin through a friend and though I had always enjoyed his company I rarely hire friends due to past dismal outcomes.  I couldn‚Äôt have been more pleased with his service.  He went above and beyond by creating three specialty cocktail options, he brought his own professional set up and he was very attentive with my guests.  I highly recommend this business!
title: Best Bartending Service ever!

review:
1. "Nearby" should filter by places I've checked in to or by actual distance. I don't know what algorithm is used currently, but it often skips the business in front of me. I'd even be happy if my bookmarks showed at the top of the list. 
2. "Tips" should sort by date. I don't care about a tip a friend left last year. I care that a stranger is leaving helpful current information.

I love Yelp, and use it every day.
title: Great app, but...

review:
It‚Äôs bad enough that Yelp is filled with asinine and worthless reviews like ‚ÄúOMG I was like sooo drunk and the waiter was cute. 5 stars!‚Äù or ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never had this type of food before and can‚Äôt find the country on a map, but I thought it was really authentic!‚Äù, but with its new, even uglier logo, this app is an assault on the eyes as well as on the intellect.  

Yelp is good for finding the location of restaurants and little else. And it doesn‚Äôt even work in Europe. The least they could do is make the logo (i.e. the app icon) look okay, but for some reason they just changed it to something horribly ugly.
title: Ugly new logo has to go

review: I ordered the fifteen pieces of chicken strips family meal and told the manager that I wanted it cooked fresh and I was willing to wait in the parking lot for it and she said no problem then told the only cook in the store the same he said it wouldn‚Äôt be a problem. We waited close to twenty five minutes! the cook instead of the manager brought us our food and because they were really busy and he was the only cook we tipped him ten dollars to him thanks for working so hard and left only to get home to find that the chicken was old and dried out I‚Äôll never go back or recommend this place to anyone.

review: DO NOT BUY ANY PRODUCTS FROM WDC. They are crooks!  I purchased a brand new full priced $2,600 freezer from WDC and the ice maker never worked.  The freezer is defective now WDC is refusing to replace the freezer with a fully functioning one.   I have had 2 repair man look at the freezer and they confirmed that the ice unit is bad.   Instead WDC has been evasive and rude. The manufacturer and WDC have been passing the buck to each other. WDC keep insisting that I should be satisfied with a repaired freezer. review: I enjoy all who contribute to help with their first hand experiences and opinions when it comes down to deciding to try a new place, or a new product! I recommend checking out Yelp reviews if you‚Äôre unsure of a business or product and want a second opinion before you decide to spend your money.
title: Yelp is so helpful when making a definite decision

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for many years to select any place that provides service. It has helped to make traveling more relaxing because I can search and save places to visit while there. I‚Äôm new to my area so it helps us to discover different places we may not know about. This is a great app to have.

review: Our daughter first brought us here about a year ago & we just love coming back. We live in West Covina so it‚Äôs a bit of a drive but well worth it!! I LOVE their crispy chicken tacos stuffed full with moist white chicken. Their rice is wonderful but their retried beans are the best I‚Äôve ever eaten. I always make sure to get a prickly pear margarita & it‚Äôs heavenly! Service has always been outstanding, friendly & prompt. Love this placeüíï.

review: We stopped in the other night after my son‚Äòs baseball game. Both of us were starving. I like to support local businesses and I‚Äôm glad we did. review: Autobahn Inc in Castle Rock is fantastic. My car had been anonymously hit and I was heartbroken. I worked with Blake who gave me an estimate and actually got the car in the following week. review: I broke my eye glasses; one of the arms broke off and the place I got my glasses couldn‚Äôt do anything. The tech guy had to drill out a small screw and do some other altering. Excellent work excellent service and this saved me $600 for a new pair!

review: Yelp just might be one of my top used apps. I use Yelp for everything whether it be reviews on restaurant, salon, repairmen, dentists you name it. I also like that on Yelp you can create a community by adding friends and seeing other people‚Äôs collections of top spots. Yelp is also my number 1 tool for traveling. I rarely go to a restaurant in a new city without looking it up on Yelp. You must get his app!
title: Yelp for Everything

review: Jacksonville recently got a Shipley Donuts.  Having been to several in the Dallas area I was looking forward to this new addition of donut choices in the area.  Went shortly after they opened but was disappointed.  Went this morning with the intent to get treats for my wife and church staff and I did.  Prices are exorbitant and overpriced. Donuts were a major disappointment when I got home with my coffee.  No taste or consistency difference in the bear claw(no almond flavor or nuts), old fashioned cinnamon roll(little cinnamon and no distinctive flavor), or regular cinnamon roll.  Doughy, very sugary and overall a major disappointment.  I will not be returning and will not recommend Shipley‚Äôs in Jacksonville
title: Shipley Donuts in Jacksonville FL

review: I‚Äôve been a good and loyal customer for almost a year now. I ordered 2 meals and a dessert. The order was filled but wrapped incorrectly. It was a delivery and only one order was delivered. The guy delivered the second order later, but it was missing the bread which is actually the best part of the meal. I called and spoke to the owner and explained I had wanted the meals separated because my husband has been exposed to Covid. He said that I didn‚Äôt ask for the bread separately. I tried to explain that I got the salad separately, so why wasn‚Äôt the bread separate? He got very nasty with me and I said you just lost a customer. He hung up on me. The food was cold and tasteless.
title: Very disappointed and aggravated

review: We have a trial on Thursday trying to evict a terrible tenant who‚Äôs lease expired months ago and owes 20k+. Hired Mr. Block. We are in the dark about our appointment on Thursday ( where to go , how to identify our lawyer, etc.)but today ( Tuesday ) during a phone call , Mr. Block was so busy that he couldn‚Äôt answer those basic questions and h hanged up on me . He was highly recommended by a very decent and professional property manager, so I expect that it was just a bad day for Mr. Block ( we all have those )  and he will be the good lawyer he promises during our court day on Thursday . Keep you posted ! Have a n√©e day .

review: This app is absolutely terrible. People give bias reviews after one encounter with a business. There‚Äôs also no check in process to verify the reviews therefore anyone can write a review even before if they‚Äôve never visited the store. The app just promotes a way for people to feel heard if they‚Äôve had a bad experience as most reviews that I read are negative. It‚Äôs very hard to find a legitimate critical unbiased review on is app. If you are going to use this app, learn how to tell when someone is being a selfish jerk who‚Äôs only way to cope is to rant about it online. review: I‚Äôve been to the Marina Bar & Grill several times & I‚Äôve been impressed w their service & the quality of their food. Salads are huge! Every time I get one, I take half of it home for the next day!  The appetizers are excellent & such a wonderful selection.  Where most HHs end at 7p, the specials at the Marina continue until 8p. There‚Äôs live music on weekends & the atmosphere is fun & casual!

review:
The bongo drums and loud music made it impossible to enjoy dinner conversation with our friends. I asked the ‚Äúmusicians ‚Äú to lower their volume.  Two minutes later the SINGER came to our table and said I was yelling at him and he was going to order us to leave his restaurant.  The SINGER turned out to be the owner of the restaurant. 
     We had already ordered our dinner and had eaten our salad and we could not leave.  Our evening was RUINED. This was my worst dining experience.  We never imagined an owner would yell at us, scream in my husband‚Äôs face and expose him to the  possibility of getting COVID.
We will never go back  and you should never go there either.
title: We will never go back!

review: As a vegetarian who has had to travel quite a bit due to having sick family members, I am grateful to have Yelp and the Yelp community. review: Yelp is Awesome. I absolutely love the places that yelp recommends and having the ability to find businesses that are similar to what I‚Äôm looking for is convenient. Also when new businesses open yelp alerts you. The greatest thing is being able to read the reviews of others and seeing through their eyes and words. I love this app

review: No problem getting a table inside at 7 pm Saturday as outside appeared to have most patrons. A short wait for our drink order but service not too swift. Once we had our drink, placed dinner order. 45 minutes later no food. Asked another waitress to get our waitress. Eventually she came surprised we did not have our order! After checking with the kitchen she said our order ‚Äúwas being plated right now‚Äù. Another 15 passed. No food, no waitress. Left ten dollars under the eight dollar drink and left. Only regret was leaving the inefficient waitress the extra two dollars. Obviously won‚Äôt give The Shack the chance to do that to us again.
title: Whack The Shack

review:
When they request proof of age to purchase alcohol, instead of looking at the license this store is running the magnetic strip of your drivers license. Essentially they are mining information from their customers whenever they run your drivers license. It allows them to get your personal information DOB, warrants etc. This is a highly unusual practice that a convenience store has no business accessing. As soon as their database is hacked all of our customer information is accessible. 

Most of the staff are really nice so I don‚Äôt want my review to reflect badly on them. But this is something customers should be aware of. Thanks!
title: Don‚Äôt hand over your driver‚Äôs license

review:
The only app I go to that actually is so helpful!! 
The reviews are from real people like me. With honest experiences that can make or break where will my husband and I spend the day. In places like Miami, we need to value quality over quantity. There are so many options and this is helpful when supporting local businesses! The cozier and best service giving places make our dates better and stress-free. Yelp is the best!
title: GREAT TIPS

review: If You‚Äôre hungry around town or in a place you‚Äôve  never been before, Yelp is there for you. If you think you‚Äôve been everywhere there is to eat in an area, Yelp is there for you. review:

They even charged us for the extra rice and bean side. And they can‚Äôt even give you the table you want, claiming it‚Äôs for reservations, who never showed up. Won‚Äôt  go back here that‚Äôs for sure.

review: Very UNPROFESSIONAL. I was dismissed as a patient for not even being explained why. When you leave urine for testing there was the patients before me sitting in the bathroom. ATTORNEY said that should NEVER HAPPEN.  They sent me a letter in the mail after being a patient for 4 years and couldnt even tell me in person.  You maybe should meet with your clients and explain. review: Would be awesome if you can see how many miles it is away from you, without having to click on the business page. review: I highly recommend Bella Salon.  Fahimeh is an excellent hairdresser. She is very patient, pays attention to what the client is requesting and does it to the customers satisfacton. review: Tired of the same old breakfast?  If you are looking for a truly unique breakfast experience MaMa Clemenzas is the place to go. You will pay more, but it is well worth it. review: Yelp has become a fantastic tool for me to use when consider a new restaurant for the first time. The ability to leave detailed reviews and narratives makes Yelp much more helpful than just a simple star rating, and can tell you dishes to try, time slots to avoid, and servers to request. review: I stopped a friend off to have her meal and decided to check it out. review: I have had a business account with SunTrust bank for over 25 years I took two checks in there that was written out from SunTrust Bank customers to me they want to charge me seven dollars per check to cash them because I do not have a personal account I have a business account I don‚Äôt know if this is normal practice for a bank but I am no longer bank at SunTrust bank but I will be asked of these questions when I open my new business account I don‚Äôt understand why you would have to pay a charge to cash a check written on that bank you cash it against their customers account not against your account

review: Yelp is a phenomenal platform for being able to write, and view reviews for local businesses and companies. It makes the process of choosing where to spend your money much easier. However, this does cause problems for any business that doesn‚Äôt want to pay Yelp for this service. If you don‚Äôt give in to their somewhat extortionist tactics, you‚Äôll never show up in searches and will ultimately lose out on a lot of potential business

review: Everyone uses Yelp to check out authentic reviews. I love being able to check multiple reviews to get a baseline of what any place is REALLY like. We would all be lost without Yelp. Thanks for making businesses transparent.

review: Scott Roofing has been an amazing company to work with. review:

review: I love yelp sometimes it‚Äôs helpful for looking into locations but other times I feel like it‚Äôs a mellow drama. Some people take things way to seriously and it‚Äôs obvious (even if they state it) that they have never worked in customer service and so on. review:
I usually open Yelp by clicking from Google maps or other apps, sometimes from the website of a restaurant or other business. 

Yelp opens up, but the business I was researching doesn‚Äôt show up. I have to search for it again, and sometimes I can‚Äôt find it. This is annoying, and it‚Äôs the number one reason I don‚Äôt use Yelp way more often.

These other apps and websites are bringing Yelp a ton of free traffic. You‚Äôd think Yelp would want to make their app compatible with these sources.
title: Would be better if it opened to the place I was already viewing

review: When you just want to read a quick review on the internet, yelp redirects you to open the App Store and wants you to download their app or you can't see full reviews or take advantage of all their features. Not everyone has the extra space on their phone (or the time) to download another app or wants another app taking up valuable space on their phone! Give your users a choice! I've since stopped using yelp and now only use google where their reviews are more reliable and google makes it simple to post a review or read other reviews without extra hoops to jump through!!!

review: Dr Hoyt and his staff are a rare find! Not only is he a great dentist but his office and staff are stellar! review: They would ‚Äú0‚Äù stars but the sales people were so nice. The place is clean, you would think this is a well oiled place but you would be very wrong. review:

When I heard they opened snooze 15 minutes from me, excited can‚Äôt begin to explain how excited I was. We went late around 2. No line. Perfectttt. At 3:15 the manage realized we weren‚Äôt happy cause we were still without food. I would say the best thing about the visit was the way he handled the situation. Food was probably forgotten about. But service and food was a C+ at best. 

Guess I‚Äôll have to wait until I go back to Denver before I get excited about visiting here again.

review:

Gerson

review:
Excellent Food.  Excellent Service.  Great for conversation.  

First time at this restaurant on July 19, 2018 for my wife‚Äôs birthday.  Our server was personable and very welcoming.  Her name is Ashley Baird.  Ask for her - she is exceptional.  

My wife had the Fillet Minion.  I had the Rib Eye Steak.  Both were prepared as we requested.  Their Table-side Salad is very good.  It‚Äôs accompanied by warm Pop-Overs.

Our server Ashley was so kind to bring my wife a dessert with a lit candle to help her celebrate her special day.  So kind.  The dessert was Chocolate Lava cake with a bit of whipped cream on the side and hot fudge drizzled over the plate.  OMG !  Nice presentation and extremely kind of Ashley and her Manager.

We will return to PRIME Serious Steaks in the Fall.  

Make a reservation, ask for Ashley for your server, and enjoy a delicious meal.

John Reing
Englewood, FL

As with anything, everyone‚Äôs experience is different, but I have found I can always count on a good number of reviews to get an honest feel for a place or service. Yelp has a group of ‚Äúelite‚Äù Yelpers who give well worded reviews instead of gushing praise or a screaming rant.  App is user friendly.
title: Beat app for finding reliable reviews

review: Yelp helps me find places to eat and places to shop. If somewhere has too many awful reviews I know to stay clear. I also find it helpful and reassuring when I see someone that has the same experience as me at a business, makes me feel as though it‚Äôs not a fluke and something must be done. Thanks YELP for helping me when it comes to businesses that I give my business too!
title: Love Yelp

review: Yelp at some point decided to be an advocate for bathrooms that don‚Äôt identify as male or female.  I didn‚Äôt know that bathrooms could choose what gender they facilitated; I thought society had always pressured bathrooms into a binary and that people have just accept it as the norm.  The idea that a bathroom could be considered valuable not despite its lack of gender designation but because! of its lack of gender designation is groundbreaking.  Yelp has proven its forward-thinking approach to public defecation and shown us all that when we are presented with a full bladder or bouts of diarrhea; find the nearest ‚Äúgender-neutral‚Äù ‚Äúthing‚Äù and empty yourself all over the ignorant, grateful, and non-conforming pile of crap.
title: Gender neutral question fallacy

review: I had a water leak at the water meter. Called insurance and they stated a plumbing company would call as a follow up. Just 20 minutes later I received a call from Anytime Plumbing and they sent out Rick next day. Rick, thank you, you did a very profession job. You explained what you were going to do to find the leak and how it was going to be fixed. Fixed leak in no time. Thanks again Rick, great job, very professional üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº
title: Anytime Plumbing

review:
A couple of things:

1. People, this rating system is for YELP, not for the restaurant in which you just ate or the nail salon that just did your nails. How can anyone possibly take your rating of anything seriously when you don‚Äôt even know what company you are rating.

2. Clearly, some of these reviews have been written by YELP staff, as they read like a press release. Yelp supposedly does not allow those types of reviews on its site or its algorithm will block them, yet they obviously have no problem writing their own reviews on somebody else‚Äôs rating system.

As for me, I‚Äôve never cared for YELP, and a few of the reasons I don‚Äôt care for YELP are the ones others have listed here. I will say, however, that I don‚Äôt have much use for the complaints here from people who have businesses that have been poorly rated on YELP. If your business made a mistake, it‚Äôs not YELP‚ÄôS fault or its place to censor your ratings because you don‚Äôt like what somebody said.
title: PEOPLE, YOU‚ÄôRE RATING YELP HERE

review: I have become fluent in the yelp language and this app has changed my life. I'm always finding the best quality businesses to accomplish any of my daily outings. Whether it's taking my family out to eat or just finding a local mail drop off.. I always check yelp first. I love that people can share experiences and swap stories about their visits, makes decisions a lot easier that's for sure.
title: Love Yelp!!

review: Really love this app. I use it in my own city and while traveling to get a good pulse on a place, whether it's a shop or restaurant. It's easy to find things based on your location, simple to write reviews from the app, and the collection feature lets you organize your bookmarks by neighborhood, city, topic, etc. I'm struggling to think of ways the app could be improved because it works so well for me.
title: My Go-To App

review: We enjoy going there every Sunday for coffee and something to eat. Recently there had been a less and less of a choice of food. They use to have a big selection of pastries but in the last 4 weeks there has been less and less.  This last Sunday  the kitchen was closed and they had only 2 choices of scones.
title: Nice place but

review: Yelp has been my travel guide for quite a few years now.  I like being able to find restaurants, grocery stores, antique shops, and things to do and see - with reviews and ratings to help with decisions.  There‚Äôs been many unique and great restaurants I‚Äôve tried because of Yelp that I never would have known about otherwise.
title: My travel guide

review:
I‚Äôm noticing a lot of reviews are for experiences with one business or another‚Äîso don‚Äôt let the vast number of 1-star reviews turn you off. 

Overall, I really like the Yelp app! I value being able to not only read reviews but also other information about a business. For example, is the business cash only? And users often post photos of restaurant menus, which is extremely helpful if the menu isn‚Äôt provided by the business itself. 

However, the app has a bit of a learning curve since I don‚Äôt find the interface very intuitive.

As a Yelp Elite (I write a lot of reviews, and the reviews are of high quality), I use this app a lot. I may provide more specific feedback directly to Yelp.
title: Reviewing the Yelp app

review: I came in for a margarita and tamales .. the bartender Juan was rude and had an attitude from the time that I walked in to the time I left. I will not be back. I usually go to Mariano‚Äôs way better quality of food and drinks . Poor poor service ‚Ä¶ I started to cancel my order and leave but instead decided to write my review while I sat here. I met the owners years ago super friendly guys and eager to provide customer service .. either it‚Äôs been sold to new owners or the level of service has declined drastically.. the tamales looked old and greasy . Super disappointed.. I do not recommend this place to a dog ..
title: Horrible service

review: I‚Äôve been using Yelp for over 10 years and its still one of the best sites to go to to find an assortment of various sites to pick from o either ‚Äútry‚Äù or choose from for the ‚Äúfirst time. If you‚Äôve seen my other reviews, you‚Äôll note that in wheelchair bound. Yelp helps me to decide if help or hinder my enjoyment experience to go there. Keep up the great job!
title: My Review

review:
Terrible app design - whoever greenlit this UX deserves to be fired. 

I found a good moving company (from Reddit, not Yelp) that I wanted to submit for a quote for. Turns out if I did this on the business page in the yelp app I‚Äôm actually submitting a request to all moving companies in my area?

Yelp as a company has been rubbish for a decade at least, but at least their app was ‚Äúfine‚Äù. After accidentally sharing my private information with who knows how many unscrupulous moving companies and bots, safe to say I‚Äôll never have this trash installed on my phone again.
title: Awful UX leads me to share private data publicly

This restaurant gets 5 stars because the food is delicious. I‚Äôm sad to say I have only eaten real Cajun food once in my life, I live in California. 
After I told Nick,our server, story he sat us down and recommended the crawfish and shrimp with the perfect spices. We also had 6 raw oysters with their delicious cocktail sauce. It was top shelf. Everything was. 
I‚Äôm still singing praises about the Juicy Crawfish. What a wonderful find.

review: I have never been so angry that an app has made itself permanent in my life. Every single time I look up a restaurant‚Äôs reviews, it opens in browser but then MAKES ME open in the app. Once the app opens, it doesn‚Äôt even open to the restaurant, just the home page. So I then have to search for the restaurant again, and 9/10 times it won‚Äôt come up. The Yelp app brings me such anger that I have never felt in my life. review:
This reasonably-priced Mexican Restaurant serves plentiful authentic food in a great Mexican setting with Mexican pop music. 
The service is wonderful! Chips and salsa were liberally replenished at no extra cost, and the chicken fajita order my husband and I shared was plenty of food for two. review: Excellent service & very pleasant phone booking of services. We had our front sidewalks power washed along with sides & front of chimney. What a beautiful  job the pleasant team performed. I paid by charge over phone.

review: We hosted our son and daughter in law‚Äôs rehearsal dinner at Casey‚Äôs New Buffalo, 136 N. Whittaker on July 13, 2023. It was fabulous! The food was great, the service was great and the atmosphere was fantastic! A special shout out to Kendall who coordinated the party. She was wonderful to work with. Also a shout out to Brandon who kept the drinks coming to everyone! Casey‚Äôs was reasonably priced compared to other venues in New Buffalo. We highly recommend them!
title: Casey‚Äôs New Buffalo

review:
I told them up front I had no insurance.  Two hours later I was told they would treat my migraine for$700. 
Dr was an absolute jerk.  I told him I did legal nurse consulting and he was clearly offended. His arrogance spoke loudly, a physician could NEVER be guilty of malpractice!!!!  After an offending joke (which he said he would deny telling) he preached, lectured, and told me plan of care.  I was then told I could either pay $700 for treatment or $159 if I left.  This is the most disgusting example of healthcare I‚Äôve ever witnessed!!!! I suggest you stay away from this ELITE hospital unless your pockets are full of hundred dollar bills!
title: I wish I could give a NO star!

review: I had been in the middle of an 8 month long project for my parents with another company and I decided to give Semper a chance. I met with Dimitri and we chose to move forward based on the fact that semper Solaris was local and we heard about them through a family friend ! My parents are more than satisfied with their solar and battery installation.

review: Bought my granddaughter a dress last week. The lady told me I had 10 days to return for a refund. I went in today to return and the owner, Gail, told me it was sales merchandise so I could only exchange. I explained what the lady told me last week. She said I had to exchange  the romper. This romper smelled musty, and I couldn‚Äôt give it to my granddaughter. Gail would not smell it. The whole store smells musty. As soon as you walk in the door, you smell the mildew (musty) smell. I guess why the clothes were on sale. Gail was very rude! I would never go in there again.

review: Yelp is a great platform for businesses, consumers love it, the app is easy to use. Now the reason for the 2 stars is everyone that writes a review should be treated the same. Because if someone is a yelp reviewer, meaning they write a lot of reviews on Yelp, and they have a personal issue with you they can abuse there power and ultimately ruin your business. This is a huge problem for thousands of businesses, believe me I‚Äôm in business development. America needs businesses to grow its economy. Be part of the solution, not the problem.
title: People change!!

review: My truck was dirty due to me driving to Reno and Utah with all this snow and rain mud and slush from the snow. Brian and his dad came to my place and wash my work truck. All I have to say it put a big smile on my face. My truck looks like I got it from the dealer. Clean and shinning. Thanks a lot I‚Äôll see you again in a few months. review: I have visited this location several times. Each time rude service, extreme wait time regardless of number of customers. Asked the cashier to use my gift card and I would pay remaining amount. Cashier charge the entire amount to cash and placed $0.88 on gift card. I went in to talk to the manager but was greeted by another food person who said they always charge gift card first then remaining is paid by another mean‚Äôs. No apology for their error just wanted to argue. I will never visit this location again. The worst service I have experienced at Wendy‚Äôs. Absolutely horrible!!

review: First time at this place, and the experience was better than great. The place is upbeat staff and customers all look happy. The staff was fast, friendly, and accommodating, and they are all working together, which is why this place is doing great. The food was absolutely delicious, and I will visit here more often. I highly recommend this place!

review: This place is a gem. We got the hamburgers. I got the one with green chilies which was fabulous. We came on the day that they had chicken fried steak. It looked so good. Almost everyone ordered it. They also had a shop where my wife bought a few things. She loved the shop. I will certainly make this a stop next time I come to north Texas even if is out of the way.

review: I‚Äôve been going here for years since I work down here and every since we came back I can say you don‚Äôt get your money‚Äôs worth.  I use to get fish tacos with a least a half a piece of fish now I get least then a fourth or you can bearly taste or see the fish. It‚Äôs just terrible I‚Äôve trying going back to see if it was a one off, but nope it‚Äôs just sad sad
title: Terrible

review: The pictures on the menu look absolutely amazing along with the pictures on yelp. Don‚Äôt be deceived though. Their inability to produce what is in the picture is very obvious. After spending nearly $40 on just a burrito chips and cheese with a drink I was definitely not impressed. The burrito was so overstuffed that I needed a partner to help me pick it up and eat it. Overstuffed burritos is a great value if you don‚Äôt have to convince yourself to continue eating it. The burrito flavor was ghastly. I certainly will not be going back ever again.

review: I‚Äôve been to the Southlake store several times and always had a good experience. Today‚Äôs was not. We ordered a Reuben sandwich with fries and the fries came out cold as if they just came out of the refrigerator. When we notified the server, he made an effort to get them replaced but it was over 10 minutes before we received the fries. This was not an issue with the server. He did what he could and we appreciated that. We also ordered oatmeal and it was medium warm at best. It looks to me like there was a real problem with quality control in the kitchen and there was no manager on site.

review:
Kenya and her team provided myself and my husband with personable and professional service that specifically addressed  all of our needs. 
We were so thankful and impressed that we brought our cousin in for an Anniversary band, and our son in to purchase his engagement and wedding bands. 
Thank you Kenya and team for a phenomenal experience over the years!

review: This is our go to when trying to locate new places to eat or visit. Sometimes you have to weed through the disgruntled employee posts or the owners friends and family posting reviews but it‚Äôs pretty easy to spot those reviews and get to the real reviews. Plus some of the reviews can be pretty entertaining!

review: My dining experience here at the Outback in stuart, fl all because of the exceptional hospitality of Nikkie Perkins! She went above and beyond to make our time here extraordinarily phenomenal. She definitely deserves whatever will make her happy here because she goes overboard making everyone else have an amazing time here at the Outback in Stuart. The manager, Jared was also great making everyone happy.

review: My husband was VERY apprehensive about using a CPAP, usually the mask on his face. Adam did an excellent job explaining everything to him, showed him several times how to use and let him sit with the mask to get used to it. He was very patient with him. Tim was also very helpful. We both were shocked when we saw such low ratings. A five plus in our mind.

review:
I was ripped off to the tune of $7,000 plus for replacement of the sunroof on my 2016 Hyundai which became detached while we were driving on the GSP. This is the same sunroof that was recalled shortly after we purchased the car and was the subject of a Class Action Settlement. 
We wrote a letter expressing our concerns to Hyundai America and carbon copied the manager of the dealership. Never received any response from the dealership. And this treatment from a dealership which, in its response to customer complaints, of which there are many, stresses its commitment to customer service. Be very wary when considering doing business with Paramus Hyundai.

review: The staff will welcome you as you go in, seat you, and get your drinks while you review the menu. Because I occasionally want to ask questions, I appreciate that the staff is quite  knowledgeable about the menu. Both their surroundings and their restrooms are clean. I loved their A+1 and their delicious chicken salad! Overall, I think this restaurant is fantastic and I highly recommend it.

review: I appreciate that Yelp is there. I can honestly send a review to applaud a business, or constructively criticize what needs improvement. Yelp provides a great service to all of us by giving us space to talk about the good, the bad, the ugly. Thank you Yelp.

review: The customer service at this location is excellent. My daughter lost her favorite sunshades here. Needless to say my daughter was overjoyed. This location is also very organized and neat.

review:
while visiting Oregon from out of town , I had a dental emergency. While being near Mcminnville I went to Gentle Dental .. They were so accommodating to me . I felt like I was home . I don‚Äôt recall all of their names but I remember an office gal named Lori . she was wonderful and made what could have been an uncomfortable experience absolutely amazing.. I wish these folks were where I live ! Thanks Lori and your great staff .
STC , Idaho
userName: T i r e G u y
title: Great Experience

review: I ordered one special chicken biryani for delivery today at 8:30 p.m. The person who took the order stated that the order would be delivered in half an hour for an extra $5. After waiting for an hour, I called at 9:25pm and the response i get is one biryani would not be delivered.  I'm not sure who this manager is or how he got his title, but he responds to my call without taking responsibility. Owners must be aware of this and concentrate on the services. Food quality has also deteriorated in recent years. Chicken is occasionally undercooked. If this continues, I will file a complaint with consumer affairs.

review: Constantly finding myself in new places looking for the next meal.  While I can look around and see the usual suspects, I‚Äôd prefer to duck a block or two past the main drag to find a good place.  Yelp does just that.  Yelps directs me to places ‚Äúrecommended by the ‚Ä¶everyone‚Äù who have made their way through an area before me.

review: Took my family to the McDonald‚Äôs on Pearl Street to get ice cream. It took 12 minutes at the window before we were able to get our order. By the time they gave us the ice cream it was dripping. I asked for them to be remade and they requested me to pull forward and waited an additional five minutes. When we got home to eat the ice cream there was paper in the cones. This happened May 5 at 8 PM at night. The young girl who answered the phone said she was the manager and would do nothing to replace them and then hung up on me. No I was not rude I just wanted a replacement and she refused. Then she refused to give me her name.

review: Last night I celebrated my birthday at the Red Door. Not only were they extremely accommodating (had a party of 24) but they went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of the entire time. The server was so patient and helpful and the food was delicious! Everyone was so happy with the staff and meals. Such a great place to be with friends and loved ones.

review: Just stopped on our way home (back to MA) from skiing. Great food, great beer, extremely clean and family friendly place. Staff was super friendly and I loved it all around. Worth pulling off the highway my fellow MA skiing/riding peeps (6 minutes off 93)!! Food came out fast. The brisket was so tender it didn‚Äôt even need to be chewed because it melted in my mouth. Nice sized portions so I even have leftovers! I will be back!!!

review:
It used to be so easy but over the years it‚Äôs harder to get where you want.

For instance, I google searched a restaurant I just saw on tv.  To see more than the 3-4 pics that showed up I have ‚Äúclick to see all photos‚Äù which takes me to the yelp app page, not the restaurant review like it used to.  I tried 4 times with the same result.  So I guess now I‚Äôm supposed to search for it.  Not doing that and here‚Äôs why.

Multiple times in the past I‚Äôve done searches on yelp only to be told ‚Äúno results‚Äù.  I don‚Äôt bother searching your app anymore because of this malfunction.  Every time I have found the places are on yelp so why do the searches come up ‚Äúno results‚Äù?

There needs to be a new and truly improved yelp or someone else needs to develop something easier and better.  This app has grown tiresome!

So, blowing off the restaurant I was looking for and will go somewhere else instead.
title: What‚Äôs wrong with yelp

review: I ordered a refrigerator and delivery was today. The drivers backed up my driveway into our 70 year old walnut trees and busted major branches off.  I screamed for them to stop!  It was too late.  They cleaned up our branches.  I called for the store manager but got out to voicemail twice.  The 3rd time I explained what was going on.  We heard driver talking to his supervisor on his cell phone.  The driver apologized but you can‚Äôt replace the branches. To my dismay I didn‚Äôt receive a call from the store to discuss the matter.  The refrigerator is installed but it‚Äôs making an annoying humming noise!  Let‚Äôs see what happens when I call tomorrow.

review:
This was the best pho I‚Äôve ever had. I ordered the #9 - duck leg, egg noddle, wonton - with both kinds of noodles. The meat fell off the bone without any effort. The broth was silky clear and flavorful without being too rich. I have never wanted to finish an entire bowl of something so badly.

review:

review: We visited this location for a special anniversary dinner. We have dined at several of their restaurants at other locations.  We were particularly disappointed in the quality of the steak. My husband ordered the filet and I had the steak medallions over rice and vegetables. The meat on both dishes was very tough in texture and gristly. Every bite of the steak medallions contained fat and gristle . The filet was not any better. We were not happy with the Dining experience . Service was okay but the food was just not up to the standard that you would think you should receive  in comparison to the price of the cut of beef.
title: Redlands Grill on Edmondson in Cincinnati Ohio

review: My husband made an appointment with covert Ford to have some safety recalls attended to. He drove his truck in for service yesterday morning and was given a ride home. review: Excellent service.  Duane cleaned my dryer vent all the way to my roof, and checked out my dying washer. review: they made me feel really comfortable both times i got oral surgery here! I feel like they actually care about how we recover and our fears before the surgery. review:

review:

My dog Leo had an injured hand and was in horrible pain and no other vets had walk in opportunities available so I googled vets in the area and found Beach Vets and they were able to see him right away. 
After getting to the office, Leo and I were immediately comfortable. The environment is calm, peaceful, not at all like a typical antiseptic clinic. It was very relaxing and, cozy and homelike. 
Dr Ena fixed Leo up and he was happy and smiling- no more trembling, whimpering puppy. 

I can‚Äôt thank Beach Vets Hospital enough nor recommend it highly enough. They‚Äôre the best. And on top of that they‚Äôre very low priced- helping out us pet owners during this crisis. 

Thank you again
Suzanne Ott

review: I woke for a company where we are required to get yelp reviews in order to receive incentives. review:

review: I‚Äôm Bridget B. and I‚Äôve been using Yelp for years for everything from restaurants to yoga studios to playgrounds. It‚Äôs helped me save time, find new places and support good businesses. review: This is my second time renting at The Nolen Apartments. The staff is great here, which is very important in choosing an apartment. review:
Yelp prides itself on accurately presenting reviews of businesses, especially restaurants. However, their value is nil. Madison Cafe in O'Fallon, MO. Recently refused service to a lesbian couple. Now this is a reflection of the business SERVICE, a very important aspect of their business reputation. But Yelp decided to freeze the page and not allow postings.

My solution is to no longer utilize this app (which is mostly populated with 'staged' reviews in any event), with the single exception of waiting until the freeze is opened and I can properly blast this business.  Then I will delete the app and post negative comments wherever I can. Goodbye Yelp.

review: I recently called the website phone number and spoke with a delightful woman, Katie, who welcomed me to Austin and explained that the website phone number was incorrect and she kindly gave me the correct number and wished me well. review: I want to thank the folks at Yelp for providing a forum for regular folks to express their opinions about good and bad service. review:

review: I started using this app and leaving reviews of the places I liked or didn‚Äôt like and using it to find new places to go to. review:
Kirkwood hopped on a Saturday..
Head of a great new BBQ ,, let‚Äôs give it a shot.

Clean..it‚Äôs new.. boxy.. yeah.. a little franchisee..MOD super nice ..everyone else in their own world.. if you know what I mean..

Manager interactive .. friendly.. signs people up for rewards.. not so much everyone else..
MOD needs to replicate his enthusiasm..

(Asked two other employees for knife ..still waiting)

Anyway .. food was awesome.. smoked turkey, spicy sausage, brisket, ribs, pulled pork..
Mac & Cheese and green Brenda were exceptional!

Here is the rub..and I will do this kindly..
Honey Pit should concoct a weekly BBQ contest‚Äù with a new recipe.. until they find one
That really stands out..we will be back.. but probably not for dine in..

We will come for the meat and sides and head home for the sauce.. come on a place named Honey Pit has got to live up to it..

review: Once again, Andiamo in Chelmsford Center disappoints. Restaurant has nice atmosphere although we were unable to sit in the bar area as the hostess told us that there would be no table service in that area. To get drinks and light fare we were forced to sit in the main dining room.  Too bad... there is some potential here but they are just not hitting the mark. I won‚Äôt be returning as a patron.

review:

I know what the prices should be cause I eat at different Chipotle places three times to five times a week. I will find another restaurant to go to instead. 

The staff is also very rude too. Also please put soap in the bathroom. People can‚Äôt wash their hands. No wonder people are getting sick there.

review: Wow! Has this place changed!! Talk about rude. review:

review: For the avid traveler, apps like yelp are highly useful. You can find local restaurants, shops, and activities. This becomes super helpful when your traveling internationally and don‚Äôt know any of the stores. The app makes it easier to search and research reviews wherever you are.

Don‚Äôt have a website to just be sneaky and tell people the experience is better on the app or something, and for that 1 sneaky reason I‚Äôm done with the app and I‚Äôll just use that thing that sounds like ‚Äúoogle‚Äù and read reviews from there..

review: I was in a party of 4 that wet at 6:30 PM on a Saturday night, expecting a long wait. They said 35 minutes but it was more like 15. review:
The iPhone app is the best thing ever.  It's constantly being updated and is your gateway to finding wonderful places in your own backyard or where you are travelling to.  I use it constantly and find it incredibly useful.

The iPad app is the most frustrating thing ever if you wish to engage in the social aspects of Yelp.  Basic functionality such as the talk section, news feed, and viewing the details of a person's profile are all missing (and have been for years).
title: Great but social aspect needs work

review: Yelp,  what can be said that has not already been said.  This is the premier platform for community, unbiased reviews and, a great place to tel you where in your community to spend some money.  The app seems flawless,  I‚Äôve not experienced an issue and as long as I‚Äôve been using I‚Äôd highly doubt an issue will arise.  Simply put-  this is the go to app stop for your information needs.

review: I had my carpet cleaned by Alamo and I was, and still am, extremely happy. I have a big dog and I didn‚Äôt take my shoes off inside. It‚Äôs a cheap carpet, light beige in color. review: I visited several locations of a the same restaurant and posted my reviews of it. Because they were all consistently bad experiences, the reviews were also bad. Then said ‚Äú she ain‚Äôt a little girl‚Äù. WOST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!! Dunkin how can you allow this to happen in your stores!!!  I want my tip back!!!!!

review: They opened in middle of Covid.  They need your business! The staff is very friendly.  The location is very nice and clean.  Complimentary drinks.  They temp screen you when coming in and have you sign that you are experiencing no covid like symptoms.  Staff and customers wear mask and they have protective shields at pedi and manicure stations. review: First of all, I am a good Wendy's customer. I usually shop at the Murray 9th East and 5400 S. Store. But today I drove thru the store at 6100 S on Highland Dr. I asked for a Dave's single with cheese. I got a dry bun with a very old overcooked piece of meat that was burned on the edges and had obviously been sitting around keeping warm, plus a slice of cheese. The girl taking my order could not understand English enough to take such a simple order. No lettuce, no mayo, no tomato, just a dried out piece of meat and a dry bun. I will never go there again, and neither should anyone else. BTW the store on 9th East and 5400 knows how to make a Dave's single with cheese, go there instead.

review: I was a customer at this Service King in late December. The work completed was done very well but poor communication from the service department lead to an extended rental car period that ended up costing me over $400! I tried to resolve this issue with the store manager with a flat out we won‚Äôt help you! I also reached out to their corporate VP and area managers both of which never returned my call. Will not be giving Service King any more of my business!

review:

Spa was immaculately clean and staff was friendly and welcoming.  I will def start going more often now that I‚Äôm feeling safer.  Didn‚Äôt realize how important massage was to my body (and mind).  Highly recommend!

review: Spending 5 days at Worldmark Inn at The Park in San Diego.  Absolutely my favorite place to stay. Rooms are spotless, The location is perfect, and the manager Maggie is outstanding!! review: I have come to rely on the reviews from Yelp on a daily basis.  I always appreciate the reviews and photos taken.  Usually the photo of the spot or plate of food makes all difference. review: A bit expensive, but the food was tasty. Worth it?  Yes‚Äîuntil I noticed an extra 20% charge on my bill. I can‚Äôt imagine how that warrants an additional 20% on my bill anyway!  There was a table for four already set up! So disappointed!  My daughter just moved into the neighborhood and we‚Äôd have enjoyed this as a regular stop‚Äîbut nope‚Äîwe‚Äôll explore other places in the area. And we‚Äôll be more careful.

It looked good in the case but was mediocre at best. This sandwich was the final straw.  I have never written a negative review of an 2establishment until now. review:
I have dozens of friends who are business owners and have heard a very similar tale from all of them:

They get their clients/customers to leave reviews, they have a solid 4 or 5 star rating, and then they start getting the phone calls from Yelp asking the owners to fork over money for ‚Äúadvertising‚Äù. When the owners decline, they noticed that Yelp‚Äôs ‚Äúalgorithm‚Äù removed lots of their positive reviews and leaves only the negatives.

This is scummy, shady, immoral, and just a trash way to run a business. If you are thinking about downloading Yelp, DON‚ÄôT. What‚Äôs the point of researching reviews if they have been tampered with?
title: From all accounts, Yelp extorts business owners

review:
If you are looking for delicious food that has tasty healthy options without screaming ‚Äúhealth food,‚Äù then add this spot to your list. 

Food: nothing fancy, but it is delicious. My favorite is the stone bowl bibimbop. If I am going grain free, I get it without rice and ask for extra veggies and it is fantastic. 

Ambience: clean. Bright. Limited seating but usually sufficient for the crowd. It‚Äôs a hole-in-the-wall type of place in a good way. 

Location: walking distance from BYU campus. Next to other good food spots. Parking lot is shared by other businesses, so it can be rough parking there. 

Service: limited, as fits the needs of the restaurant, but very kind, helpful, and efficient. It‚Äôs kind of a hybrid between a sit down and fast food lunch spot, and the service matches that feel.

review: Not good customer service. I purchased nail polishes and was never told when purchasing that they were final sale. Went to return nail polishes (because none of them were ever opened) and they said I can‚Äôt return them. There‚Äôs a small piece of paper taped to the wall behind the cash register that says nail polishes are final sale. Great signage and thanks for telling people when they make a purchase. Same prices as everywhere else. You don‚Äôt save money by shopping here. You mine as well shop somewhere that lets you return and actually has professional signage.

review: I love when you get to review the reviewer‚Äôs. I enjoy yelp without a doubt. I traveled extensively and use Yelp all the time to find restaurants and hotels. review: I love this app it brings transparency and the customers can tell the real truth about there stay at areas and different food places and businesses the only reason business owners do not like this app is because it puts bad business on blast and customers can tell others about it this app gives real reviews besides the fake payed review that are fake reviews

review: I cannot say enough about this wonderful shop. We had an alignment done at a different location in Florida and unbeknownst to us, they did not tighten anything down. When they did my disability they messed up the paper work I didn‚Äôt get anything for 3 months and I had to keep calling them for months before they even fixed the paper work. review: How can you go and remove reviews that legit tell of your experience and what you saw and heard as a customer with the reason being conflict of interest when there‚Äôs no proof. review: I have been a patron of all of their locations for many years. The food has always been consistent. It is always delicious and fresh. Everyone was hustling, drive thru seemed to keep moving.  There was definitely some hiccups with service and time, but everyone was so nice, and manager seemed to really care, and the food was hot and fresh.  Definitely if I lived here we would go back

review: Owner Henry was extremely helpful. Henry the owner came out promptly and discussed my situation and a resolution for 40% of the cost  for repair compared with another hard sell AC company. This operation is totally competent, honest and dependable. My highest compliments to Henry and his team.

review: John and his team at Discount Tire on Mobile Highway are excellent! We arrived in Pensacola with a flat tire, called several well known tire places and no one could help us. We called Discount Tire and John had us in and out within the afternoon and it was a holiday too boot‚Ä¶. Please visit Discount Tire on Mobile Hwy for all your tire needs. We will definitely be back. Thanks guys! You‚Äôre awesome.

review: Has Great features, it‚Äôs a great app. When searching for something or location I never sure if I could trust Yelp, Because the truth is it‚Äôs not about who the top 10 really is it‚Äôs all about who pays them the most in advertising and truth sometimes hurts it‚Äôs reality, as a Business if you pay the most your on top even if your across the street you may not get on the nearest to me, That‚Äôs when consumers loose trust, abut anyways they have a great engine and awesome features.

review: Showed up at 11:25 with my 2 dogs for our 11:30 grooming appointment (that was made weeks ago) but they said they had to cancel my appointment because someone called in sick. On top of that my vehicle has been losing power and acting up, it started literally as soon as left their establishment which is making me think that they put some knock off product in my car or they screw something else up.

review: About a year ago I was broke with not much money so I came to eat here‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ seeing all the older folks gather each morning for friendly socializing and conversation I figured it was a good place to eat‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. as I‚Äôm paying for my steak and eggs TO GO ORDER I gave the dude what little change I had left as a tip $.38‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ and he sarcastically says ‚ÄúWOW THATS ALOT‚Äù‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. then when I get home to eat my food the steak tasted unusually  tough like an old catcher‚Äôs mitt‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.. it looked like it still has the whip marks on it from the jockey whipping it‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.I THREW IT ALL IN THE GARGAGE‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶FELT LIKE I WASTED MY MONEY‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.ESPECIALLY THE .$.38 TIP‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶...ABSOLUTE WORST UPTOWN WHITTIER FOOD IN MY 45 YEARS LIVING HERE !

review:
After receiving the most recent COVID-19 booster shot I treated myself to a too-late-for-lunch*too-early-for-dinner meal at Pho D‚ÄôLite on Great Mills Rd. In Lexington Park. Darlyn greeted me with a bright friendly smile. She provided me celebrity style service- attentive and helpful with menu recommendations. 

If you haven‚Äôt tried the Asian Poppers, I suggest you order this appetizer. It‚Äôs a unique, tasty and crispy ball of tofu, mixed with onion and cilantro along with other ‚Äòspecial flavors‚Äô that I can‚Äôt quite identify. It is served over lettuce and with a mild curry dipping sauce. Yum! It‚Äôs my favorite item on the menu. 

Another favorite is the Thai iced tea.  I confess, I had two! 

Check Groupon! They advertise price specials there from time to time.

Thank you Darlyn! I will be back.

review:
1. Can you please fix the app crash issue, when scrolling through pics and suddenly it halts. The app need to be killed and reopened to get it working again.

2. If the goal is to make Yelpers like each others, than why the app makes it so difficult to put likes on images. Is it possible to add a thumb in the images that we as thumbnails, so that each individual images don‚Äôt need to be opened to put a like on them?

review:

review:

review: Yelp used to be helpful, but now I have to filter through so many low quality user reviews to extract useful info. In addition, the app has leaned in hard on tracking everything you do and is essentially data harvesting spyware. The solicitation (unwanted push notifications) and the irrelevant sponsored results that muddy up search make Yelp susceptible to being dethroned as I use the app less frequently in favor of alternatives.

review: Fun App to use. Post reviews and read reviews. Good way to check out places I will visit. review: I use yelp to search for everything from services to professionals to food. I recently moved and Yelp has been incredibly useful to get acquainted with my new area. The reviews I find in Yelp are reliable and so far have recommended great businesses. I try to pay it forward and leave reviews as often as I can.

review: During a recent wind storm in Las Vegas , our neighbors wall was taken down , taking part of ours with it.  I called our insurance company & they highly recommended UNIQUE RESTORATION . They came & inspected our wall & work started shorted after the inspection .. I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with the work done & calls were answered IMMEDIATELY if I ever had any questions . review: We went in for fish snd chips and found the restaurant to be extremely cold!  We walked toward the back and there were two unoccupied tables!  It was warm and nice so we sat there while waiting for our order.  We got our order and were enjoying our dinner when an employee came and pointed to a sign stating it was for employees only.  I told her it was extremely cold everywhere else so we would need sacks if we had to go,  She gave us our sacks and we left!  Hard to believe that the employees are more important than paying customers!!!  Needless to say, we won‚Äôt go back!!!!

review: If I‚Äôm interested or curious about where to eat, where to take my dog or even traveling looking for a spot to shop or eat I go straight to Yelp and look for the business in mind. No, they said and explained the reservation was incorrect.    Then I asked for another table somewhere else in the restaurant.  No, then they again explained the reservation.  Then I asked if there was anything they could do.   No, the reservation.  There was nothing they could do to help me, the customer.  In fact they attempted to shoo us out of the restaurant before I spoke with my family.  Very rude people

review: I recently attended a wedding out of state and received spectacular service from Michelle and Kelly.  The tuxedo was fit to me personally by both ladies and arrived on time and perfectly pressed and ready for my travel. The whole process which had some difficulties was handled seamlessly and professionally by Michelle. The tux looked terrific and received many compliments. I fully recommend them and will be using their services again.

review:

review: Took my car to Southwest Ford for an Oil Change. Next thing I know I am told that ‚ÄúFord recommends Brake Fluid Flush at 60,000 miles‚Äù. I tell them to go ahead with the flush. Then I read my owners manual to find out there is no such requirement. I tell the service writer to cancel the flush and they told me it was already done within 15 minutes of bringing it in. Turns out it is not a ‚ÄúFord recommended‚Äù but a way for the dealership to make money. I remembered reading my manuals showing nothing due until 100,000 miles but took their word for it. Shame on me but be careful what they pitch to you!!

review:

I originally chose this apartment complex because I needed a 2 car attached garage and couldn‚Äôt find any others in the area.
Overall I‚Äôve been very happy living here. The complex is very well kept and the apartments themselves are very spacious.
  I‚Äôve had very few maintenance problems and anytime something needed fixing, the maintenance guys were there literally within 1 hour if not sooner.
The Ladies at office couldn‚Äôt be nicer and have always been extremely helpful with anything I‚Äôve ever needed.
If you are looking for a clean, quiet, crime free apartment complex in a great location I would definitely recommend Oxford at Sonterra.
Mike M.

review: I remember when yelp was a thing then it wasn‚Äôt. Most transitioned to google or at least I did. Since all the updates I‚Äôve changed back to using Yelp for all my searching for the best place to eat or drink. The locations are streamlined to highlight what I want to read and not what I don‚Äôt. review:
To Dr. Faubert and Dr. Rife, Jeremiah, Jackie and all the wonderful staff at ShoreHaven Vet Hospital. Thank you so much for Caring for our Pup and our Family today. review: I use this app all of the time and I find it is quite reliable but when you see a bad review actually check out who is doing the reviewing. Drill down and see if they are just snarky or trying to be clever. Those people when you look at their personal posts don't like anything.

review:
A year ago, we were always there every week and and last year because of our busy schedule we didn‚Äôt go for almost months. When we went back last Wednesday? I can‚Äôt believe that Best still remembers us and greeted us with a ‚ÄúWelcome back‚Äù Food is of course is as always, Excellent!

review: I have been going to OptimisSport physical  therapy in Pacific Palisades for a couple of months because of a knee injury and have been extremely pleased with the experience. review: I have used Yelp for sometime now as I travel for work. I can see what foods a city offers, and know exactly where to go for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. review: But I have to with Ydlp. I‚Äôm forced. Simply put, content on the Internet is only available for a moment and then I am forced to download this app.  I don‚Äôt use it that much... it‚Äôs not horrible or even bad but the messages and data it takes up get annoying. Yes I turn the notifications off, the data is still stored.  I just don‚Äôt think I should HAVE to download the app to get to what I am looking for especially if I am doing several searches at once and Yelp is not all I need.

review:

review: Sunday garage door cable snaps. Neighbor says call my ‚Äúguy‚Äù.  His guy was BDK and they actually answered the phone üòÄ with a real person. Said they could come out today but it would be more expensive and if we could wait until Monday morning they would be there first thing. review:
Yelp extorts businesses and holds their pages hostage accordingly. If you don‚Äôt buy ads, your page loses visibility quickly. I had a new business location for which we created a yelp page. We were inundated with non-stop high pressure sales calls from yelp. When we finally had enough and told them to stop calling, suddenly when you googled the business name, the search snippet showed we had one 1-star review on yelp, even though we had ZERO reviews because the page was brand new. 

I go out of my way to avoid yelp and tell as many people as I can about their gang-like practices

review: Yelp is only a place for people to complain about things. Most people already know sometimes restaurants. Why would someone complain after they have left. Any well behaved adult would talk to a was manner while they where still there and have their issue addressed. The people that do the complaining are just dumb. A good example of this? Look at the reviews for the actual app itself, you will see the dummies comparing about their meals instead of the app. You won‚Äôt even see the names of where they where. I hope yelp just goes away and all of the complainers will just shut up East and go home.
title: Useless

review: I enjoy using yelp but why on earth would they have a gender neutral bathroom feature (who tf cares except for like .1% of the population that is scared of a regular bathroom) and they don‚Äôt say which ones have changing tables, which every parent with a kid under 2 needs to know? I‚Äôve been stuck changing my kid on a table in an uncomfortable situation more than once. I don‚Äôt care if the bathrooms are for men, women, or unicorns, I just need to change my baby‚Äôs diaper. Is that so hard?

review: I recently traveled on Southwest Airlines and was denied boarding because my small pug barked ONCE at a cat as dogs will do. The supervisor on duty, a certain Campbell told me very rudely that my dog couldn‚Äôt board because he wasn‚Äôt a service dog although I had the official paperwork! My wife began to cry, but he was oblivious to that. When I insisted on boarding he called the POLICE!!!!! The upshot is that he allowed the cat to board while we had to wait for the next flight!!!! We arrived 2 hours late, missed our ride and, at great expense, had to hire a taxi. Whether he was right or wrong, his arrogance and rudeness was beyond beyond belief!!!!! To top it, their head office indirectly told me to shut up!!!

review: This was by far the best car buying experience I have ever ever been through. My salesperson, Robinson was very professional, knowledgeable, courteous, and friendly. I told him what vehicle I was looking for and he found the perfect vehicle. Tori, who did the financial transactions was also knowledgeable, friendly, accurate, and fast !!   Go to Carmax and ask for Robinson! He will go above and beyond to help you find the perfect vehicle!

review: We have been staying here for the past 17 years when I come to UCLA for treatments. review: After spending 2-3 hours on their website trying to save a design, their website kept kicking me out. I called several time when they were closed. I didn‚Äôt want to waste anymore time on the website if it would be too expensive to use anyway. She seemed irritated and just very unhelpful. I hate I wasted so much time with this company. review: If you know how to utilize this app, your golden. Tells you and shows you many things the list could go on and on. review:

review:
Yelp knows it‚Äôs hold in market. I did not authorize them to advertise for me as the rep called me in evening that she could not secure the promotion of $150 worth of free advertisements unless I sign up for for $25 a day. In very same morning when she had promised me $150 free advertisement promotion with $10 a day package. review: I find it shocking that a 7 yr old review which involved a previous business owner (3 owners ago!!!) and a disgruntled customer is still part of our reviews after numerous contacts with yelp. .

review:
While food and atmosphere was good, after explaining I have Celiacs Disease, I was served cross contaminated chips. After I had a bite, I asked if the chips were friend and cross contaminated and they were!  I was super disappointed. 

I was charged for the item and on my way out, I seeked out the hostess to express my disappointment. 

While the manager gave me $20 he shared with me that I shouldn‚Äôt give the feedback to the hostess as she was a teenager. (I was not rude at all). He then educated me about how I should always ask for a manager and basically placed the blame on me. 

While I could have done those things, I assumed stating my Celiac Disease and having the bartender tell me he checked was enough.  

I guess I was disappointed by the response. It‚Äôs a bummer because the food and atmosphere was nice. 

If you have Celiac or an allergy ask for a manager and don‚Äôt trust the staff.
title: Gluten allergy beware

review: I rely on Yelp for restaurants and services. I have found it to be pretty accurate and insightful. It captures the culture of businesses when you read multiple reviews. review:

review:
If you don‚Äôt give a flip about servers who do not wear a mask, then Mark‚Äôs City Grill might work for you.

We have had great food from Mark‚Äôs, but this was our first visit since March and COVID 19. The hostess was very professional and wore her mask. We were seated at the table closest to the entrance. Patrons ordered at the door takeout orders, te takeout orders were taken by a waitress wearing a mask on her elbow. At first I thought, she forgot. No! She went into the kitchen, talked with the cooks, visited with customers at the bar.

When we complained to our sweet waitress she apologized, and we said we would like to speaker to the manager. Manger comes from the back, explains that the waitress is running in and out to take orders. Ha! There were 2 waitresses wearing masks packing the food and delivering it to card, and they wore a mask. 

The manager said I will talk to her, it was obvious that the manager was young and intimidated by the employee. 

Not willing to jeopardize health due to the backbone of a timid manager!
title: Questionable Practices But Good Food

review:

review:
If I recall correctly, I've never reviewed an app before. Put simply, this latest update has ruined the key feature I use Yelp for: bookmarks.

1. The bookmarks map used to show all of my bookmarks. At ~2000 bookmarks, I could give recommendations to friends traveling in cities around the world easily. Then this update comes around and now I can only see bookmarks within like a 5 mile radius around me. If I wanted to see what's nearby, I'd just use the nearby feature. There's no way to get the map to update as you move the map nor can you set a location prior to opening your bookmarks (both of these options would be terrible compared to just showing all bookmarks). 

2. When clicking on a bookmark "bubble" on the map, I can no longer see if the establishment is open or closed unless I go to their individual business page.

The style of this update is fine, but please fix the bookmarks map.
title: Bookmarks Map Pointless - New Update

review:

review:

review:

review: I used to rely on Yelp to find restaurants and local businesses that were rated well. Within the last couple of years Yelp has become useless. The default view after a search is ‚Äúrecommended‚Äù-i.e. businesses that pay. If you try to search within your area for highest rated businesses, I find that about 75% of the time there are zero results, which makes no sense. If you switch back to recommended-well, a ton of businesses magically appear. Yelp used to be trustworthy, but now it‚Äôs just a paid ad service.
title: Not useful or trustworthy

The only 1 star I‚Äôm giving is for the wine, which we enjoyed, although it was $58/bottle. I will never go back or recommend this establishment to anyone.

review: When they're on the food is actually good. BUT BE WARNED!! review: I‚Äôm the type of guy that‚Äôd never leave an app review. I have my reasons from partying all night and waking up hungry or just being hangry and not knowing what to eat. review:
I love yelp but I hate the fact that I cannot copy and paste from notes to yelp. For me it‚Äôs much easier to type my review in notes or even do a business reply in notes and then paste it because I can check my spelling and grammar better. 

Also I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs a bug or glitch but when I try to write a review with my phone it seems that yelp types in random words and capitalizes random letters or skips to the bottom. I‚Äôve noticed this happening in the last week.

review: Yelp as a service is a great way to discover restaurants. In app reservations and ordering take out are two huge features that are executed fantastically. I‚Äôd love to see improvements on the search functionality. Taking more inputs for location, filtering out reservation time slots better, and reducing glitches due to location services overriding user input are all areas the app could improve.
