review: Yelp is a terrible company that uses a pay to win business practice. If you don‚Äôt pay for adds yelp removes your good ratings or buries them pages deep on your page so that won‚Äôt be seen. They then blame it on their ‚Äúalgorithm‚Äù like an algorithm is this mysterious thing that can‚Äôt be controlled. Algorithms are written by human coders who program the algorithm to do what they want it to do. Yelp waits until your business has a high number of good reviews. Then they start blowing up your phone trying to sell you adds. If you don‚Äôt sign up for paid adds or don‚Äôt respond their ‚Äúalgorithm‚Äù decides all your good review are fake.
title: Terrible service

review: I‚Äôve been a committed jcrew shopper for the last 20+ years. This store has the absolute worst customer service. They both focused on their conversations with each other rather than their customers. I had to ask for them to please check me out. No offer of help with dressing rooms, sizes or even a hello. review:

title: Why can‚Äôt reviews be rated?

review:
Love this app for finding great restaurants and shops near us. However, as a yelp reviewer, the app can be a glitchy which is annoying. Photos don‚Äôt always add, so make sure to check out your review once you‚Äôve posted it. I always have to go back and edit my review to add the pictures which is a little inconvenient. 

I‚Äôm also not a fan of how they force you to download the app if you‚Äôre checking out yelp on an internet browser (especially if your phone has low storage). 

I wish they also had the ‚Äúsearch photos‚Äù option on the app. When you‚Äôre at a restaurant and want to look up a picture of a specific meal, you have to scroll through all the photos or reviews which is usually too time consuming. 

This app needs some work but I love the concept.
title: Pictures don‚Äôt always add to reviews

review: Arrived in Glenwood Springs, Colorado by train and expected a person from Enterprise to pick us up as was prearranged. No one was there to pick us up. Called and was put on hold multiple times. Finally reached the agent with help from a kind area resident. Was then told there was no car for us even though we  had reserved a car 4 months prior. Also we were informed that a reservation doesn‚Äôt guarantee a car. Really!! We were essentially abandoned in a town with no access to our destination. The atrocious customer service provided by Enterprise reflects poorly on the very customer friendly city of Glenwood Springs!

review:
5 Star Beach Rentals misrepresented our vacation rental. There were many health and safety concerns with the property. When called to managers attention, we were accused of sabotaging the home, lied to and threatened with being evicted. 
We were told the home was scheduled to be torn down in July, so nothing would be done. 
At the time, we never asked for compensation or reduction in cost. 
We left the place in cleaner and better shape than we found it and she has the audacity to give us negative review on VRBO. 
Save yourselves from the abrasive behavior and rent from a reputable property manager. 
I wish I had investigated the many reviews prior to doing business with 5 star. 
The reviews are all very consistent as to managements bad behavior so don‚Äôt let her failed attempts to discredit vacationers reviews sway you. 
Seems everyone pays full price upon contract and payment and then she likes to call it a great deal or budget property when the issues arise. 
RUN!!!
title: Find another rental agency in Bonita Springs.

review: I went for the first time, 3 young adults tended to me and help with all my needs even took supplies to my car. Very helpful and reasonable. Definitely will use them again. I feel people who give. As bad reviews go that I‚Äôve read I just don‚Äôt agree with their statements. I gave them 4 cause their is always room for improvements. üëçüèΩ

review: I rarely used Yelp to begin with because a large number of reviews are clearly fake, submitted because someone got their feelings hurt. Now Yelp is going to allow others to accuse a business of racism and is going to ‚Äúflag‚Äù that business as racist.  That‚Äôs not the your job Yelp. Your app should be used for HONEST reviews and then let  people make their own decisions about whether to go to a business without your interference. This is extremely dangerous for both consumers and you. Innocent businesses are going to be hurt because of accusations of perceived racism and you‚Äôre eventually going to face multiple lawsuits over this.

review: i typically don‚Äôt like bww and rarely provide customer feesback; however, our server (Lyss) was outstanding.  she hustled the whole time and super friendly to my entire family.  we even screwed up what we asked for a couple times and she rolled with the punches.  i may have to give bw3 another chance due to Lyss.  thank you for turning our crappy, long travel day around.

review:

I find reviews are better organized.
It still has problems with filter, no matter how many times I enter my preferences it has to be re- entered each time.
I find Yelp is quick to work with patience and not too much expectations.

review: Isn‚Äôt the point of Yelp to get info from a place, restaurant or business? And that would mean their address too, sometimes you want to get this info for someone else and the address is for a business is NOT displayed within the app, I have to go to directions; and then an extra step also to get the address as the Maps app will display the name of the business instead of the address. I really don‚Äôt understand how can these things can be overlooked.

review: I absolutely love tell! I use it for basically everything. Trying a new restaurant? Let me check it on Yelp. Nail salon? Nah, they don't have good Yelp reviews. Just had a crappy retail experience at a chain store? Let me go to help and see if others had the same issue. It's such a great way to see what others think about places before you go and spend your money there
title: Such a great resource!

review: Yelp is running a for profit business masquerading as an unbiased review forum. If you are a business owner who refuses to sign up and pay them their extortion fees they will automatically move any positive reviews to the ‚Äúnot recommended‚Äù list. They claim that the reviews are sorted by an algorithm but when pressed about how it really works a sales rep will slip up and mention it‚Äôs different for paying business owners. Yelp is scam and should be regulated or put out of business all together. When it comes to a business reviews there should be no money‚Äôs involved. Yelp is corrupt and most educated people will realize this.

review: It‚Äôs almost 2020 and you don‚Äôt use Yelp? Ok I just started not too long ago. Yelp has helped me 95% solve the problem that many have while deciding ‚ÄúWhere do you want to go for Dinner ?‚Äù Trust me use Yelp when this question comes up and before long the only problem you may have is coming up with the money for wherever your date wants to eat!!üòÇü§£

review: Hello, viewer! I‚Äôd like to talk to you about this joke of a company. So, I recently reviewed a restaurant, with the most honest review I could make about it. I wrote a complaint about the bad service, and overall food in general. After looking upon my email, I have seen that my review was reviewed by Moderation Staff. I never swore, I didn‚Äôt call it anything! All I had said was that it wasn‚Äôt recommended. Clearly this is biased. The company probably was paid by said restaurant to review our bad review. This is one of the most stupidest emails I‚Äôve gotten before. I don‚Äôt recommend buying this app, as the staff will remove your review if the owner pays them.

review:
If someone in the Medical field complains about an insurance company it's most likely they've had a bad financial experience with that company. Their reputation should not control your needs for comfort nor pain relief in any way. 
 
Dr. Zhu is excellent at what she do and she has compassion and empathy towards my pain. I've been going too her for quit some time now, and her care contributes to my chronic condition by giving me more comfort than any pain meds I take.
title: My Acupuncture experience with Dr. Zhu

review: Had to get a new battery for a Dyson I have had for awhile.  Santos greeted me immediately at the door and helped me out ASAP.  The service was quick and spot on .  Gave me explanation of some of their other devices and the deals they we‚Äôre having. Ended up buying a second machine for a great price. review: We spent 2 weeks in Vegas and my husband and I went to this restaurant 3 times! It‚Äôs the best kept secret on the strip! The food and drinks are really good and reasonably priced! Yes, the girls are tastefully scantily clad... but they are also very professional... and they are amazing bartenders! They take care of their guest in a sincere friendly manner (they are not just trying to make good tips).... Shout out to our girl friends at the bar: Nicolioli, Nesha, Taylor and Mel... we love you!

review: My friend and I staying at Hotel Nichols across from restaurant told food was great. As soon as we walk in greeted by I presume owner/manager. As we sat down, got passed by several waitresses, everyone avoiding eye contact. No one offered us a menu fur 15 min until other told one of then to wait on us. Several others walked in got seated and waited on immediately, we still waited for menu or even someone to acknowledge us except owner. Funny thing, I am Hispanic and never seen this poor of service. Food was great!

review:
You can never ever find a CLEAN shopping cart. They are dirty or trash in them always.
They are out of everyday items daily. This week it was Yoplait yogurt, Tang, Countrytime lemonade, eggs. Among other grocery items.
The front of the store had dirty and full trash can with spills on the front sidewalk. This is the entrance to your store. This is your first impression.
Target we shop at your store every week and we expect a clean and well stocked store. It‚Äôs time for a change. There are other places to shop but we prefer Target since you are convenient.
I must say the pharmacy goes above and beyond in their customer service. I give them a ten.

review: I went to get a propane tank around 6:15. The guy working said his co-worker went on break and had to wait for him to come back since they can‚Äôt leave the store unattended. I go back when I see the guy re-entering from break at 7. The sun was just setting as I walk in, the guy claims they can‚Äôt do it at night and the worker I talked to earlier just left to go on break. Sent me to the market next door. Terrible service. We carried the propane tank and everything twice (four times counting walking to and from car) after the guy said he could once his friend got back from break. Lovely communication and huge waste of my time.

review: Truly a great place, forward thinking and ahead of its time. Wonderful staff, quick response. Willing to work with you on what you need. Very nice selection of EV machines, great place. Would recommend to anyone. A++ in my book anyday. Jessica is a force of nature. You will not believe the deals and amazing people you deal with. Go and see for yourself.

review: I was involved in a car accident and Dr. Cooke was recommended to me.  Dr Cooke and his staff made me feel at ease as soon as I walked through the door. review: Absolutely the worst small business I have ever run into in my life, that owner needs to learn what it is to give customer service. If you‚Äôre going to allow orders to come over the phone, I suggest to pick them up and let them be able to place the order. And when it‚Äôs not picked up to answer when you‚Äôre laying down on the counter for nearly 15 minutes and he gets on the phone and says, and I quote , there are kids working here if you don‚Äôt like it you could go somewhere else! Way to run your business to YOUR LOCALS! The ones that KEEP YOU IN BUSINESS ALL YEAR!!!!! Most unprofessional experience EVER!!!!!

review: I would love to give this company a minus five review!! Worst moving company I have ever used. The reviews online make them sound great and was a major reason I decided to go with them for my move. From being 6 1/2 hours late for the scheduled move time to wanting to deliver my furniture at 2:00 am in the morning to over charging me what was quoted ( by a huge amount) by not wrapping my furniture to prevent scratches ( and there are many scratch marks) to asking me to give them a 5 star review online after knowing everything they did wrong. I suggest you do not even consider using this company. Horrible experience!!

review: We recently had to put our 13 year old dog Domino down.  He was a great pet and friend. Part lab, part greyhound. Dr Andazola and staff were empathic, respectful and professional above and beyond what I could have hoped for and we will forever be grateful and in their debt.  Highly recommend them .

I‚Äôve been getting my nails done for years and have never had this happen. We went in and ask them to fix it and they refused to fix my daughter‚Äôs since they said they can‚Äôt be sure she didn‚Äôt abuse the nails even though they could see all her others nails were lifting and coming off. Do not use this place. They do not do good work nor will they try and make things right!!!!

review: This app periodically makes recommendations for new restaurants. I have a lot of dietary restrictions, and most of the recommendations don‚Äôt work for me. review: I had made an appointment to see a car I seen on their website, when I was able to make it in the car was sold. review: Negative reviews are given preferential treatment unless you subscribe to their advertising services. Anytime you call or contact them, they relegate all decisions to a computer algorithm that fines reviews that are taken down. This is not only in accurate but also biased. However if you pay for their services, you will get nothing but glowing reviews, and the negative reviews come down. There is no rhyme or reason why certain reviews are flag and certain ones aren‚Äôt. Their policies clearly state that former employees and competitive business owners are foot to be flagged, but this has never been true,

review:
Yelp is a great tool in helping to make purchasing decisions. It is important to read both positive and negative reviews to determine what others liked and disliked. I have found some people give negative reviews for things that I am happy to overlook while others have made me feel like I have escaped a nightmare experience by not choosing the company they are reviewing. 

Thank you Yelp for providing a much needed shopping tool.

review: Fantastic experience. Ambience is great, food delicious and the BEST part of the experience was our host/bar tender/waiter, SCOTT! He manages everything with ease and an incredible sense of humor. He made the four of us feel we were his favorite table as I‚Äôm sure he did all the patrons there that night. Tuesday is Magician Night and that was an additional treat. Can‚Äôt wait to go back! Haven‚Äôt enjoyed a meal or laughed that loud in years.

review: I sold cars for a living I work really hard to get great yelp reviews since some of my customers don't use Yelp on a daily basis they don't consider their recommendations ballot so I have 14 great five-star yelp reviews that they won't allow for my business but they will count all the one star reviews I think they're trying to get people to pay for their services the and pay for better reviews on their Yelp app, It seems like every review that they don't count us from buddy who doesn't it's from a guest who does not use the app for Yelp very frustrating for  Working folks who reviews mean alot

review: Yelp is the worst site for business owners. He was friendly and professional and reviewed with me what I needed done on my truck.  Later in the day he contacted me and explained that my tires would pass inspection but were just at the acceptable limit.  I appreciated his honesty and I decided to have the front tires replaced. Overall a great experience!

We ordered $60 worth of pizza and asked for a simple order of jalape√±os on the side so we could control the heat on each siice to our liking but didn‚Äôt receive the jalape√±os. The delivery driver said they would send some out.
 38 minutes later they showed up with us left with cold pizza and a manager on the other end of my phone that told me that (it is what it is!!!).

So hopefully the powers to be a Yelp will revisit this anomaly of feaster famine and take the time to look at the one store givers to see how they rate everything else some people just like to be trolls.

review: I've been using Yelp for several years because I traveled for work a lot and it was the easiest way to not be steered in the wrong direction. Now that I've relocated permanently, it continues to help in my decision making. Very rarely do I end up at a spot where the stars don't match the location. Keep up the good work Yelpers. review: Tracy has been my hair stylist for over 4 years now and she never seems to disappoint me in any of her new creations.  She is considered The Best of the Best. I have baby fine hair and wear extensions.  The styles she creates on me are gorgeous and where ever I go I get a lot of fabulous compliments.  She is great with color, haircuts, etc.  She is very friendly and yet professional.  Anyone having their hair done by Tracy will leave the salon a happy camper.  Marlena

review: I use Yelp all the time. It is especially helpful when we travel out of our home area but I use it in my own city. Site who benefit by advertising the business are not too reliable but I find everyday people reviews the very best.

review: I absolutely love having Yelp on my iPhone but wish they would include some really basic information about the businesses we look up: hours. I like having the option to call the place, but i know that hours are listed in Yelp online, so why not on the app? Also, I've been having trouble with the directions feature lately. It doesn't always map it to the listed address for some reason. Love the concept, though.

review: Great for kids because they love the outside, but get a monthly or annual family pass because if they are too young you have to go in with them.  Also you can bypass the line of people waiting to pay.  Just be mannerly and announce it though. Not so hot for adults though, having to be out in the hot sun.  There is no family hour anymore and swimming is done by the time most parents are home from work.  So I say 5 for the looks and upkeep.  4 for the kids.  3 for the parents.  0 for families.
title: Allentown Splash & Fitness

review: I‚Äôll start by saying I‚Äôm not the cleanest person in the world by any means, I travel with an 80 pound malamute so hair is expected to come with me everywhere I go. That said, the rooms at this particular ESA are less than desirable. I‚Äôve been in two rooms here, both smell of smoke so much so I smell of smoke when I leave for work. Ill try to post two pics below of what I cleaned off the floor with both my vacuum (I emptied the collection bin before vacuuming) and on my hands and knees cleaning the ‚Äòkitchen and bathroom‚Äô area. Keep in mind I cleaned my first night so my dogs hair wasn‚Äôt everywhere just yet. Just saying...not he cleanest place in the world.

review: I absolutely love Yelp. I am in NYC for the summer and it has been a blessing. Whatever you are craving or looking for, Yelp has all the categories listed. Included in reviews are pricing, menu, tips, hours, website link, and business phone numbers. Not just that, it is easy to use and the reviews that customers leave for businesses are very helpful as well

review: Why some people over rate the red lobster ultimate feast as the price go up the plate get less and less. The lobster tail is most of the time over cooked. Calling it a feast how? No scallops  no clams no type of fish. So what feast. 30 dollars for what? About 8 shrimp in the scampi. Broccoli about 4 very small crab legs. A very small dry lobster tail and about 5-6 fried shrimp and melted butter. The small amount of rice is to make the plate look like it‚Äôs full not working. You all can give them your money but this meal is not what you paying for you are being ripped off order something from the menu that‚Äôs worth it. look for yourself not good. And look again. Rip off

review: I love everything Yelp does to continually find innovative ways to enhance the customer experience, from in-app delivery to discounts to check ins and easy ways to advocate for your experience (like witty, pre-written fb posts after you get your order, let alone the peer reviews, which is the foundation of the app)!
